Description:
Instance Rules and Information

  • Introduction
  • Additional Rules
  • Legal & Privacy Policy

Introduction

The following is a list of rules you must follow to participate in this instance. The rules are harshly formulated and orient themselves around the mastodon.social CoC and German Law&Legal Code.
In general this instance is Pony and Nerd themed. Topics such as Ponies, Ponies, Technology, Programming, Science, Ponies and even more Ponies are welcome! However, Pony is not required to participate, everyone should feel free to participate!

Additional Rules for Clarification

This instance operates under German Law. This means hate speech of any kind is prohibited under all circumstances as per §§130 StGB. Other infractions will be handled as if the German Law applies in spirit which means all content which constitutes a criminal offence or is illegal in Germany is prohibited as well. Ads and Spam is prohibited under all circumstances.

In case of rule violation the administrators and moderators may take immediate action depending on the severity and urgency of the situation. In non-urgent cases you may be asked to stop or otherwise warned or reprimanded. In urgent cases we may lock your account and contact you via email. In especially severe cases we will ban your account without further discussion. If you feel like you have been unfairly treated or banned, contact the administrators, we will try to make a fair case and find a fair solution for everyone if possible

Promoting groups, organisations, parties or ideologies that have been deemed contrary to peaceful democratic order by the German government is strictly forbidden. This includes National Socialism.

Should we find that a users actions are damaging to the instance and it's standing in the fediverse, we reserve the right to suspend access temporarily or permanently.

Additional Legal Information

  • This instance is operated under German Law and Regulations, the EU GDPR and ePrivacy regulations apply to all users
  • No private data is stored beyond what is necessary. You can inspect the exact data processed in the source code of this application
  • Moderators and Administrators may ban users if they violate the rules of this instance, decisions may be repealed by emailing cultpony@protonmail.com
  • There is no legal uptime guarantee but the expected maximum downtime of operation will be less than 20 minutes per month, the expected actual downtime less than 2 minutes per month
  • You are responsible for what you post, the operators of this instance take no liability or responsibility for what anyone signing up to this instance does beyond enforcing our rules, legal requirements and keeping the timeline clean.


Support our hosting costs via Liberapay or Github Sponsors


Impressum / Legal Contact
Do not abuse our communication channels.
Short:
Ponies on the Fediverse, Ponies on the Timeline, Ponies Everywhere.

No horsing around.

For nerds, LGBTQ+ or just people looking for a comfy place to call a home in this wild internet.

Description:
Welcome to Yづドン！

Yづドンとは

YづドンはYoheiづほ(@Yohei_Zuho)が、サーバーの勉強をするために建て、PCGFが管理するマストドンインスタンスです。規約違反しない限りの自由な発言の場として提供しています。ご自由にご参加ください。
アップデートはメジャーアップデート(できればrc版も)に追従しています。

Yづドンの独自機能

Yづドンはマストドンの原型をとどめつつ、若干のソースコードの改変を行っていくつかの独自機能を実装しています。
今現在実装されている独自機能は以下のとおりです。

  • 定型文投稿
    トゥートボタンの下にあるボタンです。Yづドンのスラングをボタン一つで入力できます。気軽に押してみてください。

  • 下ナビゲーション
    モバイル表示時に下にナビゲーションボタンを表示できます。

  • 引用ブースト
    引用ブースト機能が利用できます。 独自機能実装協力:@ProgrammerGenboo
    Yづドンのソースコード:Y-zu-don-maintenance-org/mastodon

寄付してくださった方々(順不同)

  • めしださん(@meshida_0217)
  • 黒糖の欠片さん(@BrownSugar)
  • naokiszさん(@naokisz)
  • 森林さん(@ReSinnRinn)
  • xanacさん(@rk_asylun)
  • のえる@DTP鯖缶さん(@noellabo)
  • おささん(@osapon)
  • cookieさん(@cookie)
  • 8mitsuさん(@8mitsu)
  • 枝本さん(@edamoto)
  • nieさん(@nieein56)
  • blank71さん(@blank71)
  • ryutotoさん(@ryutoto)
  • rintanさん(@rintan)
  • 二宮エリーさん(@kyokolisianthus)
  • 烏蛇さん(@crowserpent)
  • (他3名)

寄付はこちら

  • fanbox
  • booth
  • liberapay(Pixelfed.Tokyo)
  • ほしいものリスト

運営

Yづドン operated by

Description:
【箕面どんの行動規範】

＊日本国憲法と日本の法律を遵守してください。

＊自分の「ことば」には責任を持ってください。
ネットは「ことば」のやり取りです。不注意な言葉を使って、不用意に他人の人権を侵害したり、傷つけたりしないように、細心の注意を払ってください。

＊参加ユーザーへの罵詈雑言、迷惑行為があった場合、予告なく当該発言を削除したり、アカウントを凍結する場合がありますので、あらかじめご了承ください。

【詳しいルール】

＊ポルノ関係の画像、動画、リンクなどの投稿はご遠慮ください。

＊投稿の内容に合わせて、CW（Content Warning・内容の警告）、NSFW（Not Safe For Work・職場では危険）を適切に使ってください。

＊もし意見や感覚が合わない人がいる場合、マストドンにはユーザーを「ミュート（相手の投稿が見えなくなる）」「ブロック（自分の投稿も相手から見えなくなる）」という方法があります。すぐ相手に論争を吹っかけずに、これらの方法を上手に使って、コミュニティを育ててください。

＊自分の楽しいこと、面白いことが、相手にとっての楽しいこと、面白いこととは限りません。自分の見方を相手に一方的に押し付けることはやめてください。ネタとしての笑いも同じです。

以上を守って、ハッピーなマストドンライフを！

【公認クライアント】

TheDesk
（使用環境：Windows・macOS・Linux）
（作者：Cutls P）

箕面どんの「公式クライアント」として、積極的なサポートが保証されています。
「マルチインスタンス」「マルチカラム」に対応しており、箕面どん以外のインスタンスを平行して使用するのに、大変便利です。v2.8以降の「アンケート」にも対応しており、カラムごとに色を変えることができるなど、便利な機能が満載です。
ちなみに、管理人のtonejiがmacOS版のビルダーをしてます。

【サーバーの運営方針】

箕面どんの「行動規範」や「ルール」との関係上、以下のサーバーとの接続を制限しています。
登録される際にはよくご確認ください。

＊pawoo.net（メディアの拒否：画像やアイコンが表示されません）
＊mstdn.jp（サイレンス）
＊mastodon.social（サイレンス）
＊mastodon.cloud（サイレンス）
＊humblr.social（ドメインブロック：箕面どんからはアクセスできません）
＊gab.com（ドメインブロック：箕面どんからはアクセスできません）
＊sinblr.com（ドメインブロック：箕面どんからはアクセスできません）

なお、箕面どんはサーバー運営費を抑えるために、投稿されて30日以上経過したメディア（画像・動画など）を削除しています（本文は削除されません）。
あらかじめご了承ください。

【特記事項】
箕面どんは、総務省・近畿総合通信局より「電気通信事業者」として認定されています。
届出番号：Ｅー０１ー０４３７５
Short:
大阪の奥座敷「箕面」のように穏やかなMastodonサーバーです（大阪府箕面市とは無関係です）。箕面の話題に限らず、好きな音楽、映画、コンピュータのことなど自由に投稿できます。特に参加資格はありません。
箕面どんが大切にしていることは、「ネットでの居場所」になることです。安心できて、穏やかで上質なコミュニケーションを提供します。
ネットでのやり取りに疲れた方こそ、是非ご登録ください。

Description:
About the Club

Liner notes are the printed text and graphical content often added to the packaging of musical recordings. Sometimes they contain little more than the list of songs and the people involved with recording them. Other times they contain fantastic inside looks at the recording process for an album, the song lyrics, critical reviews of the recording, mixed media explorations of the music's themes and content, and more.

Liner Notes Club is a Mastodon instance dedicated to providing fans of music with a place to socialize and share their love of making and listening to music.

If you are looking for a Mastodon instance without a strong local theme, we recommend exploring other options using the tools at https://instances.social/.

The Administration Team

The Club is owned and operated by:

  • @djsundog

The Moderation Team

The Club's moderators are:

  • @djsundog
  • @dustin
  • @evilchili

Moderators also share administration duties, though final authority rests with the Administation Team; refer to section 5.3 Accountability for details.

To contact the Administration team with questions or concerns, please use the contact email address listed on https://linernotes.club or message the Moderation Team directly on Mastodon.

Terms of Use

PLEASE READ THIS TERMS OF USE AGREEMENT (THE "TERMS OF USE") CAREFULLY BEFORE REGISTERING OR PARTICIPATING IN LINER NOTES CLUB ("THE CLUB") AT ENTRY-POINT URL https://linernotes.club. BY USING THE CLUB, YOU SIGNIFY AND ACKNOWLEDGE THAT YOU HAVE READ THE TERMS OF USE AND AGREE TO BE BOUND BY AND COMPLY WITH THE TERMS OF USE. IF YOU DO NOT AGREE TO BE BOUND BY THE TERMS OF USE, PLEASE DO NOT ACCESS THE CLUB.

Governing Law

Liner Notes Club is located in Georgia, United States of America. You agree that these Terms will be governed by the laws of the State of Georgia, excluding its conflicts of law provisions.

Age Restrictions

Registration and participation on the Club is restricted to those individuals over 18 years of age, emancipated minors, or those who possess legal parental or guardian consent, and are fully able and competent to enter into the terms, conditions, obligations, affirmations, representations and warranties herein. By registering or participating in services or functions of the Club, you hereby represent that you are over 18 years of age, an emancipated minor or in possession of consent by a legal parent or guardian and have the authority to enter into the terms herein. In any case, you affirm that you are over the age of 13 as the Club is not intended for children under 13, per the requirement of COPPA (Children's Online Privacy Proteciton Act). If you are under 13 years of age, do not use the Club. In addition, those who wish to register and participate must meet the minimum requirements laid out in the Terms of Use (this document) herein. If you do not qualify or do not agree to these terms, you may not use the Club.

Right of Modification

We reserve the right to change or modify the Terms of Use, including the Code of Conduct and Server Rules, at our sole discretion at any time. Any change or modification to the Terms of Use will be effective immediately upon posting by us. For any material changes to the Terms, we will take reasonable steps to notify you of such changes. In all cases, your continued use of the Club after publication of such modifications, with or without notification, constitutes acceptance of these modified Terms of Use.

Code of Conduct

Music is universal. Music unites across all cultural, linguistic, and ideological differences; we are one nation under a groove. What moves you? What gets your body twitching, your head nodding, your jaw hanging open in disbelief? What inspires you to create? We created the Club to celebrate the joy of experiencing music in whatever form your experience takes.

Whoever you are, wherever you are, if you love music, you are welcome here. Please help us ensure that everyone is welcome, by following these guidelines. This is not an exhaustive list of what we can and cannot do on linernotes.club. Take it in the spirit in which it is intended -- a guide to make it easier for everyone to participate in this community.

This code of conduct applies to all users of the Club, including its administrators and moderators. Violation of this Code may result in suspension from the Club. Additionally, violation of this code outside the Club may result in user suspensions, instance silencing or blocking (defederation).

1. General Guidelines

  • Be welcoming. We strive to be a community that welcomes people of all backgrounds and identities. This includes, but is not limited to members of any race, ethnicity, culture, national origin, colour, immigration status, social and economic class, educational level, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity and expression, age, size, family status, religion, neurodiversity, and physical ability.
  • Be respectful. Not all of us will agree all the time, but disagreement is no excuse for poor behavior and poor manners. We might all experience some frustration now and then, but we cannot allow that frustration to turn into a personal attack. Members of the Club should be respectful of each other and of other users in the Fediverse.
  • Choose your words with care. Be kind to others. Do not insult or put down others or belittle their experiences.
  • Make it easy for others to moderate their experience. Liberally use Content Warnings, hashtags, and unlisted/"Followers Only" posts so others can choose whether to engage with your content.
  • De-escalate. In general, if someone asks you to stop, then stop. Avoid microaggressions such as "not all men," white/man/cis-splaining, knowingly using the wrong pronouns to address someone, posting about particular individuals without naming them ("subtooting"), and so on. If you make a mistake, apologize.
  • No Gate-Keeping. We love all kinds of music in the Club, including much that you may not love. Accept and celebrate that we love it.
  • Be friendly. Don't be a dick.

2. Content Guidelines

2.1 Examples of On-Topic Content

As the Club is a thematic instance, we distinguish between on-topic and off-topic content. Examples of on-topic content include (but are not limited to):

  • Album reviews
  • What you are listening to right now (see #NowPlaying)
  • Five records to introduce yourself (see #MyFiveRecords)
  • Discovering new music (see #CrateDigging, #BandcampFriday)
  • Song lyrics that are meaningful or interesting to you
  • Photography, clips, and media from live concerts
  • Cool album art
  • How Stevie Wonder's Superstition is the greatest groove ever recorded

2.2 Posting Off-Topic Content

Off-topic content include anything not directly related to music, musical production, consumption, listening, or playing. Off-topic tooting on the Club is permitted, provided you adhere to the following guidelines:

  • The majority of your toots are on-topic
  • Off-topic toots are a combination of Unlisted/"Followers-Only", marked with a Content Warning, and/or tagged with an appropriate hashtag so folks can easily ignore, mute, or filter them.

2.3 Sensitive Content

Apply a Content Warning to any toot depicting or discussing content that may be upsetting or triggering to others. Examples of sensitive content include but are not limited to:

  • Violence
  • Blood / gore
  • Nudity
  • Sexually-explicit material
  • Abuse

2.4 Prohibited Content

The advocation for or promotion of the following topics is expressly prohibited on the Club:

  • Advertising (except promoting your own original works)
  • Spam
  • Racism
  • Sexism
  • Ableism
  • Fatmisia
  • Transphobia
  • Homophobia
  • Xenophobia
  • Violent nationalism
  • National Socialism, Holocaust denial, or Nazi symbolism
  • Discrimination against any group, including but not limited to gender and sexual minorities, those who are neurodivergent, physically disabled, or mentally ill
  • Sexual depictions of minors
  • Content that defames, harasses or threatens others
  • Content that infringes or misappropriates another’s intellectual property rights, including, but not limited to, copyrights, trademarks, or trade secrets
  • Content that otherwise harms other users in the Fediverse
  • Content that interferes with or disrupts any user, host, or network, for example by sending a virus, overloading, flooding, or spamming the Club or other users or hosts
  • Content that plants malware or otherwise uses the Club to distribute malware

Users are permitted to discuss depictions of these topics as they appear in media, provided they are treated as Sensitive Content; see section 2.3.

Content Warnings are not expected on posts made by historically or socially marginalised people about their own marginalisation.

2.5 Accesibility

In addition to the liberal use of Content Warnings for Off-Topic Content and Sensitive Content (see sections 2.2 and 2.3), we have the following accessibility requirements:

  • Images and videos must be captioned with a description suitable for users with limited vision.
  • Hashtags composed of multiple words must be composed with CamelCase, to make them accessible to assistive technologies such as screen readers.

3. Platform Restrictions

3.1 Cross-Posting From Other Social Media Platforms

Cross-posting from other social media platforms to the Club is not permitted.

3.2 Bots

Bots are permitted under the following requirements:

  • Bots must be pre-approved by the Club Moderation Team
  • Bots are restricted to on-topic content only; see section 2.1
  • All toots by bots must be tagged with #bot to permit easy muting/filtering

3.3 External Use

3.3.1 Crawling, Indexing, and Archiving

Crawling https://linernotes.club to gather information about posts, post metadata, media, or other content hosted on the Club is prohibited for any purpose, including but not limited to analysis, creating databases, search indexes, or archives.

3.3.2 Federation

Federating with the Club is not guaranteed. Links between federated instances are temporary and may change or disappear at any time. The Administrators of the Club and their delegates determine which instances the Club will federate with and which are silenced, blocked, or suspended.

4. Copyright

Public toots are derived works that are protected by copyright.

All original content is copyrighted by the author and cannot be distributed or used without prior permission by the author. Do not repost or disseminate our users' original content anywhere without their express permission.

5. Moderation

The Club's administrators and their delegates will summarily and with prejudice suspend or terminate users who violate the Club's Terms of Service, and silence or block (defederate from) instances enabling those users. You may comport yourself however you wish; we are not required to provide you a platform to do so.

If you believe someone is violating Code of Conduct, we ask that you submit a report when you block the user or instance. Provide as much detail as is necessary for the Club's Moderation Team to have the context required to fully investigate the issue.

If you are reporting a user on an instance other than Liner Notes Club, please be sure to forward the report to the user's instance also.

5.1 Our Responsibilities

The Administrators and Moderation Team will endeavour to:

  • Lead by example, abiding by the Terms of Use.
  • Keep the atmosphere of the Club as welcoming and enjoyable as possible.
  • Keep the Club online and functional for as long as possible.
  • Clarify the standards of acceptable behaviour.
  • Enforcing the Terms of Use with appropriate corrective actions when users are found to be in violation.

We will not act on complaints regarding:

  • Good-faith criticism such as "This is sexist," "That comes off as tone deaf," "This comment offends me," and so on. Instead of reporting this kind of feedback, engage with it, apologize, or agree to disagree and move on.
  • Swearing or profanity. Use filters or mute/block users whose language you don't enjoy.
  • Reasonable communication of boundaries, such as "leave me alone," "go away," or "I’m not discussing this with you".

5.2 Corrective Actions

The following are some examples of corrective actions the Moderation Team may enact in specific situations. These are examples only and meant to illustrate our general approach to moderation. Each incident of reported unacceptable behaviour will be handled on its own merits.

If you are a Club member and violate our Terms of Use, we will:

  • suspend your account;
  • inform you via email of the suspension and the reasons for it; and
  • explain what you need to do to be reinstated, such as apologize to affected parties or agree not to continue posting Prohibited Content.

If you are a user of a federated instance and harass one of our members, we will:

  • suspend your account; and
  • inform your instance's Moderation Team.

If another instance fails to actively moderate the posting of Prohibited Content via weak moderation, we will:

  • silence the instance

If another instance explicitly or implicitly enables the posting of Prohibited Content or enables harassment, trolling, doxxing, and so on, we will:

  • block (defederate from) the instance

5.3 Accountability

5.3.1 Moderation Decisions

Moderated servers -- that is, instances that are silenced or blocked by us -- will be posted to https://linernotes.club/about.

Changes to the moderated servers list will be posted using the #LinerNotesAdmin hashtag by one of the Moderation Team.

5.3.2 Appeals

If you believe the Moderation Team has made an error in judgement or the corrective action(s) we have taken are inappropriate, please contact us. The Moderation Team acts in good faith and strives to always act fairly, but we will make mistakes and when we do we will embrace those mistakes and learn from them.

In the event of a dispute, the Administrators may override the Moderation Team; their judgment is final.

5.3.3 Requests for Clarification

If you require clarification of these Terms of Use, or are unsure how to handle a potential violation of these Terms, please message the Moderation Team directly on Mastodon.

5.3.4 Changes to the Terms of Use

The Administrators and Moderation Team will occasionally update these Terms of Use as necessary. Minor updates such as edits for clarity or changes in Moderation Team membership will be posted using the #LinerNotesAdmin hashtag by one of the Administators. Significant changes to policy, such as changes to the Code of Conduct, will be drafted and made available for review and feedback by Club users for at least 5 days.

Document Status

Revision History

The Liner Notes Club Terms of Use was last updated November, 2022.

Summary of changes:

  • First revision.

Sources

Inspiration for this Code of Conduct was found in The Django Project, Mastodon.ART and many others. Portions of the Terms of Use were adapted from Coursera's policies and aus.social's Terms of Use.

Description:
Bienvenue !


Nous sommes un établissement de langue principalement française (anglais également accueilli) ouvert à tous les élèves pipou.
Qu’est-ce qu’un.e pipou ? Vaste et scientifique question qui n’a qu’une réponse : l’élève pipou est une personne gentille ou qui vise à l’être.

Les valeurs de notre académie :
- L’académie Pipou prône la bienveillance. Nous visons à créer un espace aussi accueillant que possible, où chaque élève se sentira à l’aise et saura qu’iel peut être ellui-même (tant que « ellui-même » n’est pas « un.e vil.e vilain.e »).
- Nous accueillons toutes les lettres du sigle LGBT+ et les alliés. Les personnes de toutes origines, opinions et orientations sont les bienvenues dans notre établissement, tant qu’elles s’efforcent de suivre notre règlement !

Qui sommes nous ?


Je me dois d'être honnête : on est une petite instance, et j'ai la modération lourde. Ça veut dire que le fil local n'est pas très animé, et que si vous êtes relativement à l'abri de "reply guys" (les gens qui viennent répondre de manière désagréable pour se sentir très intelligents), ça risque aussi de vous couper d'un certain nombre d'interactions spontanées. Mon but premier, c'est d'offrir un choix d'instance parmi d'autres, et de garantir un niveau de modération.
N'hésitez pas à faire un compte pour vous faire un avis, si vous restez c'est cool, si vous partez c'est ok aussi. Les inscriptions sont semi-ouvertes, c'est à dire qu'il faut m'écrire un petit mot pour que je les valide. C'est pour éviter une invasion de spam-bots. Pas besoin de m'écrire un roman, juste de quoi me rassurer sur votre humanité.



Du coup, qui est l'admin ? Une personne blanche, agenre, féministe et queer. J'ai certainement des angles morts et je veux qu'on me les pointe. Je suis dispo pour parler modération, et j'accepte aussi les demandes de rajouts d'emojo.

Règlement détaillé de l'académie

Article 1 dit « De la simple décence »
- Pas de propos racistes, sexistes, homophobes, transphobes, antisémites, xénophobes, grossophobes, validistes.
- Pas d’attaques envers vos camarades. Les insultes, le harcèlement, les « chasses aux sorcières » contre des types d’élèves ne sont pas tolérées au sein de notre établissement.

Article 2 dit « De la bienveillance »
- Pas de justice personnelle. Si vous tombez sur des profils de « trolls » ou d’élèves qui enfreignent l’article 1, ne répondez pas et signalez la personne au système ou à un.e administrateur.ice.
- Pas de subtoot (le fait de parler d'une personne sans la @, mais en espérant qu'elle le voit) négatif. Si vous voulez vous plaindre d'une personne, faites le là où elle ne le verra pas, sinon c'est du harcèlement.
- Cachez vos propos agressifs. Si vous avez quelque chose de sévère ou d’insultant à dire sur une catégorie de population non couverte par l’article 1 (policiers, personnes cis, gens d’un parti politique opposé au vôtre…), placez-le sous un Content Warning.

Article 3 dit « Du Content Warning »
Veuillez taguer les sujets suivants :
- NSFW : contenu sexuel et contenu violent/gore
- Politique, religion, discrimination (transphobie, sexisme, xénophobie...)
- Santé mentale (dépression, suicide, phobies courantes…) ou physique (sujets médicaux, alcool, drogues, régimes...)
- Nourriture
- Spoilers
- Gifs ou vidéos avec flash.
- Les reposts de Twitter. D'ailleurs, si vous tenez à crossposter depuis Twitter, vous êtes prié-e de bien vouloir mettre la visibilité des toots en "non-listé", afin que la timeline de l'instance ne ressemble pas à un triste clone.

Article 4 dit « Be the pipou you want to see »
Vous êtes déjà une personne cool (et patiente, vous avez lu tout notre règlement !) : continuez à l’être. Passez une très bonne journée !


Principes de modération

Ce sont des principes un peu généraux, qui dictent mon approche de la modération des autres instances. A l'échelle d'une instance, on peut choisir de silencer ou bloquer une autre instance. Silencer signifie qu'on ne voit plus leurs messages dans la timeline globale, et qu'on ne reçoit pas leurs notifs à moins de déjà suivre le compte qui essaye d'intéragir. Ca permet de maintenir le contact tout en s'évitant certaines interactions spontanées. Bloquer signifie qu'aucun contact n'est possible entre nos instances : on ne peut pas suivre les comptes d'une instance bloquée, et on ne recevra pas leurs notifications non plus.

  • Trop de reply guys sur une instance : silence
  • Trop de crosspost Twitter : silence
  • Absence de modération : silence
  • S'il y a des shit-storms régulières ou des accusations qui reviennent sans cesse vers une instance qui se cache derrière une forme de "déni plausible", au bout d'un moment je considère qu'il y a bien un problème : silence ou block
  • Contenu pédo-pornographique : block
  • Harcèlement, propos haineux encouragés et/ou non modérés : block
  • Instances d'extrême droite : block
  • Conspirationnisme, sectes : block
  • Instances lancées, acquises ou fondées par Alphabet, Facebook, Twitter, Microsoft, Apple, Amazon, Elsevier : block


    • Mentions légales

    Cette instance est un service de communication au public en ligne édité à titre non professionel au sens de l'article 6,III,2° de la loi n°204-575 du 21 juin 2004.
    L'instance est hébergée sur un serveur Hetzner en Allemagne, les médias et les backups sur un serveur Time4VPS en Lituanie.
    Vos données ne sont pas revendues. Il vous est possible de choisir la confidentialité de vos toots, publics ou privés. Toutefois, et à des fins de modération, tous vos messages peuvent faire l'objet d'un signalement et ainsi être lus par un'e admin, même les plus privés. Aussi, les toots ne sont pas encryptés et pourraient donc être vulnérables en cas d'attaque ou de saisie judiciaire. Pour des conversations sensibles, préférez un autre medium.


    Crédits

    Notre mascotte, une noiraude avec un chapeau de diplômé, a été dessinée par Shikayachan, qui a une page Pixelfed.

    Cette instance utilise des emojis provenant de plusieurs personnes :

    • Des Blob, provenant de la Blob Emoji Community. Ils sont sous licence Apache License 2.0, et sont inspirés des Noto Emojis de Google.
    • Les Blob RPG
    • Les Blob Bear
    • Les Blob Fox
    • Les Blob Raccoon
    • Les Blob Rat
    • Les Blob Bulbizarre, créés par shad et Nausicaa
    • Les Monster Prom, tirés du jeu Monster Prom
    • Les Nux, créés par Dzuk qui réalise des commissions
    • Les Potion Pride, créés par Dizzy qui a aussi une boutique en ligne.
    • Les Sparkling Pride Hearts, créés par Kat, sous licence CC0 (distribution libre)
Short: FR : Ceci est une instance queer, qui vise à être aussi confortable et safe que possible. Nouvelleaux élèves bienvenu'es !

Description:
Code of Conduct

ausglam.space attempts to provide an environment where everyone is welcome.

We are a diverse community from a wide range of backgrounds and interests. To ensure that everyone has an enjoyable and enriching experience, please bring a spirit of respect and friendly inquiry to all your interactions.

We are dedicated to providing a harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, education, income, ability, physical appearance, body size, ethnicity, or religion.

Be awesome

Be polite and friendly to everyone in the community.

Be welcoming

ausglam.space is a community that welcomes and supports people of all backgrounds and identities. Everyone is welcome.

Be respectful

Our community comes from a range of backgrounds and experience levels. Listen and support others to learn. Remember that everyone has their own field of expertise.

Be kind

Be careful in the words that you choose. Do not insult or put down other members. Endeavour to make your language inclusive.

Be forgiving

People sometimes make mistakes. Please assume that members and moderators are acting with the best intentions. If you choose to engage with them regarding something you feel is inappropriate or unfair, aim to be diplomatic and forgiving.

Let us know

If you’re not sure about something or have a concern, feel free to ask @hugh or @saera. If you notice an abusive user please report it.

Be nice or choose another instance

ausglam.space is dedicated to providing an enjoyable, safe, and harassment-free experience for everyone. We do not tolerate harassment or discrimination of members in any form. Accounts violating these rules may be cautioned, silenced or blocked from ausglam.space and may not be given a warning or notice.

Harassment

Harassment includes, but is not limited to:

  • offensive comments related to gender, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race or ethnicity, religion, or other personal attributes or identities
  • unwelcome comments regarding a person’s lifestyle choices and practices
  • sexual images without a clear content warning
  • deliberate intimidation
  • threats of violence or incitements to violence against an individual or group
  • violating any ausglam.space policy
  • sustained attacks on someone’s project, work or idea

Sometimes a comment one person thinks is innocuous is offensive to someone else. If someone tells you they find your language or comments offensive, please take that on board graciously.

If we ask participants to stop any harassing behaviour they are expected to comply immediately. Any ausglam.space member can issue a warning to a participant that their behaviour violates the community’s anti-harassment policy.

If a member engages in harassing behaviour, the moderators may take any action they deem appropriate, including warning the offender, silencing them, or in extreme cases, banning them from ausglam.space with or without notice.

These rules are based on the newCardigan Code of Conduct. You should join them too :-)
Short: This is a Mastodon instance primarily for Australasian Galleries, Libraries, Archives, Museums and Records people. We use the Hometown fork which enables local-only posts.

Description:
Basic rules:

  • Although not strictly required, it is recommended to use your CMDR name here.
  • The topic of this instance is, of course, Elite: Dangerous and space exploration. It won't be strongly enforced, but you should make your toots private or unlisted if entirely off-topic.
  • Porn and nudity have no reason to be forbidden (stay on topic though), but only if properly marked as "sensitive". We don't want commanders to be afraid of tooting when they have passengers!
  • No harassment or abusive unwanted communications (including spam and advertising).
  • No hate speech or gratuitous aggression. Be nice; it's just common sense. (You can be an pirate, but not a racist pirate. Simple enough, right?)

Moderators get the right to warn you as many times as needed, mute your account (won't be displayed to anyone not following you), entirely suspend your account, and blow up your brand new ship if you don't follow these rules.

More informations about CMDR.SOCIAL: It is operated by @CobaltVelvet@octodon.social, you can support the instance financially on Patreon and liberapay.

このサーバーについて

集まっている人

  • mikutterに興味・関心がある人
  • ておくれている人
  • ておくれてない人

話す内容

このサーバーは、雑談用です。mikutterに関係しないことを話しても構いません。

なりたち

  1. @toshi_a@twitter.com が凍結される
  2. 凍結されたらMastodonサーバーを作ろうと計画していたことを思い出す
  3. だるいなあ
  4. @ahiru を陥れる
  5. 勝手にサーバーが生えてきた
  6. 計画通り（例の画像）

ルール

趣味で運営されている小規模サーバーなので、各人の注意で回避できるような面倒事は可能な限り避けたいと思っています。ご協力お願いします。

FAQ

スゥッ…としぁです…。

Mastodonは全く知らないのですが、参加してもいいですか。

もちろんです。このサーバーは、mikutterに興味・関心がある人の雑談の場を作ることです。もう私はTwitterを見ることが出来ず、Twitterクライアントもアンインストールしたため、みんなに解脱してほしいです。

ておくれていないのですが、参加してもいいですか。

この説明をここまで読んでしまった時点で、お察しなんだよなぁ

サーバールールの意味がわかりません

こちらを参考にしてください。

攻撃的ツイートは凍結対象ですか？

幸い、Mastodonでは投稿のことを「トゥート(toot)」と呼ぶので、問題ありません。Mastodonは初めてか？力抜けよ

攻撃的トゥートは凍結対象ですか？

この文章を書いているのはtoshi_aなんですが、昨日あひるの悪ふざけで凍結されましたが、反省文を書こうとしたら解除してもらえました。

I don't understand Japanese. Can I join this instance?

日本人は敗戦後、Shift-JISやJAP106などをGHQに押し付けられて、結果として情報工学の発展に大幅な遅れを取りました。私も小学生の頃、プログラミングを始めたら習ったこともない英語が並んでいて挫折したものです。またあなたたちはASCII以外非対応という、日本の小学生でも作らないような低品質なサービスを沢山公開してきました。 そうやって代々私達が虐げられてきたことを、あなたたちが追体験できる貴重な機会が、このサーバーであるわけです。

(English translated: Yes.)

サーバが不安定です

「とても恐ろしい　集団心理である…」
鯖管！！鯖管はまだかーー！！
なにかが間違ってる！一体どうなってんだーー！！
新規の対応が遅すぎるぞーーー！！！
早く…直してくれ…オレの鯖が…
「なぜなら！！もうおわかりだろう！！！」
「誰も…鯖をいじっていないのである！！！」
早く！！直してくれーー！！新規登録復活をー！！誰かーーー！！
「誰も！！直す気のある人がいないのである！！！」

アトリエシリーズに興味があるのですが、どれから始めればいいでしょう

2018年12月21日に発売された「リディー＆スールのアトリエ」前々作「ソフィーのアトリエ」前作「フィリスのアトリエ」に次ぐ不思議シリーズの最新作でですね、今回主人公が双子なんですよ、はい百合、そしてですねフィリスちゃん、あーもうこれはやばい、ソフィーせんせ、OPのイルちゃんかわいすぎかよぉーリアーネ怖すぎる

あと1月31日に発売されたネルケと伝説の錬金術士たち ～新たな大地のアトリエ～ね、これはね、ソフィーちゃんとね、トトリちゃんとね、アーシャちゃんとね、もはや集金の域ですよ、集金術。賢者の石（文鎮）。それからエスカちゃんとロジーきゅんが勝手にいちゃついてる。

そんで3月20日に発売されたルルアのアトリエ　～アーランドの錬金術士４～ね、これは本当にありがとう、ありがとうの化身。ロロナママ最高すぎる。そしてな、ピアニャちゃんが師匠、そう、ルルアちゃんの師匠はピアニャちゃんにしか務まらんのや。ピアニャちゃんが師匠なのがエモすぎる。はあ、ピアニャちゃんがお姉さんしてるのが本当に最高や

Description:
Polyglot City is an instance for people interested in languages, language learning, and translation, as well as multilingual and polyglot people. You're free to toot about any topic (or even about no topic at all) as long as you follow a few simple rules (elaborated below). You can use any language you'd like here -- in fact, the use of different languages is strongly encouraged and appreciated!

Elaborated rules

  1. No discrimination or harassment of any kind in any language. No nazism or nazi-sympathies. No illegal content. Violations will be moderated and can lead to account deletion.
  2. No bot accounts or accounts used solely for automated crossposting, redirection or data farming. Every account on this instance must be used manually by a real person. Bot accounts and automated accounts will be deleted. (To be clear: You are allowed to follow bots that are on other instances.)
  3. Please consider using a content warning (CW) when tooting about topics that might be sensitive. Common topics for CW are things like politics, mental/physical health, food, alcohol, sex/nudity, images with eye contact. (This list is in no way exhaustive.) In mild cases, not using CW won't lead to moderation, but you will be asked to use CWs. Please note that not using CWs for sensitive topics may lead to our entire instance being blocked by other instances.
  4. We believe the Fediverse is a space for people and communities, not corporations and profiteering. We will proactively block any instances that are run for profit or by for-profit organizations.
  5. In general, try to be considerate and compassionate.
  6. Please follow good Mastodon etiquette.
  7. The rules will be revised as needed. If you think an important rule is missing, please inform the admins.

Moderation circle

We will try to add moderators as needed to keep up with the volume and common languages on the instance. Our moderation circle currently has the following members:

  • @FrankauLux (EN, FR, PT, ES)
  • @nolittlefinger (EN, ES, ZH)
  • @Stoori (FI, EN, SV, NL, ES)
  • @thurisaz (EN, FR, AR, FI)

Suspension of inactive accounts

At the moment, the hosting of this instance is paid for entirely by the admin, which limits how many active accounts we can support. New registrations might therefore close when we approach the limit. To keep us below the limit, the admin will periodically suspend accounts that have not been used in six months. When this is about to happen, these users will get a direct message telling about incoming suspension. After this announcement, they will have 30 days to reply if they wish to continue to keep the account active. If no reply is received in 30 days, the account will be suspended.

Governance

This instance currently has a single admin, but our goal right is to transform the instance into a form of sociocratically organized platform cooperative. A discussion about governance structures is planned; contact the admin if that interests you.

Credits

The server thumbnail image is made by @lpslucasps.

Privacy & Data Policy

The instance is hosted by fedi.monster, which has its servers in Europe (mainly in Finland). We collect only the information you voluntarily enter in your profile and your toots, and your information is not handed to any third party other than our hosting service. We use no trackers and show no ads. The hosting service may collect some technical information necessary to deliver the service. For more information, see the fedi.monster Privacy Policy. You may delete your own data or account at your will, or ask us to remove your account.

Toots and other data posted on polyglot.city are a communicative act between people. They may not be used to train machine learning systems, create marketing profiles, or other similar practices.

Please note that everything you publish on this instance should be considered publicly visible. Mastodon has a direct message feature, but please note that they are not encrypted messages. If you really want to protect your privacy or send someone private information, please use some other tool than Mastodon for that.
Short: Polyglot City is the right instance for you if you're interested in linguistics, languages, language learning, or translation, or if you're multilingual or polyglot. All languages are allowed to flourish on our timelines, and multilingual puns are welcome. And of course you're also free to talk about other things besides language.

Description:
PCGamer Socialへようこそ！

PCでゲームをする人たちがゆるく集うMastodonインスタンスです。

サーバールール

禁止行為

  • サーバーに過度な負荷をかけることを目的とした大量のフォロー・お気に入り・ブースト・投稿を禁止します。
  • 日本法に反する行為や唆す内容の投稿を禁止します。
  • 宗教や人種、性などを差別する支持や主張する投稿を禁止します。
  • CWを用いない過度なゴア、わいせつな内容の投稿を禁止します。
  • ARENAへのCALLの強要を禁止します。

これらの禁止行為が確認された場合、直ちに当該ユーザーのアカウントを停止します。また、警察や裁判所などの機関から要請があった場合は収集している情報を開示します。
収集している情報の内容についてはプライバシーポリシーを確認してください。

よくありそうな質問

ないかもしれない。

どんなことを話せばいいですか？

なにを話しても自由です！

管理者としてはFPS･TPS･RTS･ADV･RPG･洋ゲー･和ゲー･フリーゲーム･自作PC･デバイス･とかとかとか……そこら辺の話題を想定しています。

えっちなゲームのことを話してもいいですか？

えっちなゲームはeSportsなのでOKです。

えっちな（露出の激しい・R-15/R-18に分類されるもの）絵や文を投稿する際にはCW（コンテンツワーニング）や閲覧注意タグをつけるのを忘れないでください。最悪の場合サイレンス対象になります。

人来るんですか？人いるんですか？

きてね。

迷惑行為を受けたら、禁止されている投稿を見つけたらどうすればいいですか？

投稿の通報からご連絡ください。

Botアカウントを作ってもいいですか？

OKです。ただし、下記のBotアカウントルールに従ってください。

Botアカウントルール

  • プロフィールへBotバッジをつけること
  • Public（公開）トゥートをしないこと
    Botのトゥートでローカルタイムラインが埋まってしまいます。Unlisted（未収載）やPrivate（フォロワー限定）、Direct（ダイレクト）を使用してください。
  • フォロワー以外へ能動的にフォロー・お気に入り・ブースト・返信をしないこと
    Botへの返信に対しての反応ならOKです。

ソースコードはどこで公開されていますか？

GitHubのPCGamer Social Organization上で公開しています。

その他質問は pcgamer.social/@Eai（もしくはtwitter.com/eai04191）までお気軽に。
Short: The Mastodon instance of the PC gamer, by the PC gamer, for the PC gamer.

Description:
WP-Social.Net bietet - mit einem Schwerpunkt auf WordPress und sein Ökosystem - die Möglich zum Meinungsaustausch und zur persönlichen Vernetzung. Wer hieran teilnehmen will, ist uns herzlich willkommen.

WP-Social.Net versteht sich als ein Teil des "Fediverse". Das bedeutet, dass ein Benutzerkonto auf WP-Social.Net das Lesen von und die Teilnahme an Diskussionen auf beliebigen anderen Fediverse-Servern, insbesondere auf anderen Mastodon-Instanzen ermöglicht, ebenso wie auch von diesen Instanzen aus auf die Inhalte auf WP-Social.Net zugegriffen und an unseren Diskussionen teilgenommen werden kann. Was genau es mit diesem "Fediverse" auf sich hat, haben wir auf der Website "Vernetzt und frei" zusammengetragen.

Die Hauptsprache auf WP-Social.Net ist deutsch. Aber auch englischsprachige Beiträge sind willkommen.

WP-Social.Net wird von der Praetor Verlagsgesellschaft mbH betrieben.

Kontakt   |   Datenschutzerklärung   |   Impressum

 
Besondere zentrale Kontaktstelle für Behörden
Short: WP-Social.Net - Social Media nicht nur für die WordPress-Community

Description:
Code of Conduct

The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of kcmo.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies. Moderators are authorized to take any action they see fit to protect the general community and encourage wide collaboration. If you attract the attention of a moderator here are the things you can do to demonstrate your commitment to the community, a visible history of these kinds of actions will help us decide on a course of action:

  • Listen to and respect peoples' requests to be left alone when asked
  • Politely and constructively reminding others to modify their behavior when they are being disruptive
  • De-escalating confrontational situations
  • Hiding sensitive content behind a content warning
  • Adding descriptive text to images

This instance has very much been inspired by and aims to follow the path of mastodon.social and their guidelines, which have been incorporated below:

  1. The following types of content may be removed without warning from the public timeline:
    1. Excessive advertising
    2. Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
    3. Untagged nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions
    4. Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions
  2. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:
    1. Racism or advocation of racism
    2. Sexism or advocation of sexism
    3. Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
    4. Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism
  3. The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service, with or without notice, and any identifying information may be shared with the relevant authorities:
    1. Sexual depictions of children
    2. Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
    3. Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism
  4. Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:
    1. Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
    2. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
    3. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

Server Funding & Administration

This server is currently paid for and administered by @james. It is not currently soliciting donations but it may in the future. If you would like to help consider funding mastodon instead.

It is hosted on href="https://masto.host/">https://masto.host/.

Additional system administration provided by https://www.dataporters.com

Blocked content

kcmo.social may block some servers without notice.

Site Photos

Hero image is Nelson-Atkins Museum of Art | Kansas City, MO by Daniel X. O'Neil / CC BY 2.0
Instance thumbnail is Inside the Shuttlecock by Scott Robinson / CC BY 2.0

Site Emojis

The following site emojis are from Emoji M y City by Single Wing Creative:

  • :kcatkins:
  • :kcbaseball:
  • :kcfootball:
  • :kcscout:
  • :kc_soccer:
Short: Hey Kansas City, be friendly!

Description:
Aqoursの話題、μ'sの話題、Saint Snowの話題、A-RISEの話題、虹ヶ咲の話題、Liella!の話題、沼津の話題、秋葉原の話題、お台場の話題、函館の話題、その他ラブライブ！が関係するならどんな話題もOKな非公式インスタンスです。のんびりまったりいきましょう。

This is unofficial instance for LoveLive! series fans (aka. lovelivers). You can toot here about Aqours, μ's, Nijigasaki-HS, Liella! and any other topics around LoveLive! series.

このインスタンスの運用費用はすべて管理人の懐から出ています。気に入った方はご支援いただけると励みになります。

Amazonから何か贈る

法に触れる内容でない限り発言は自由ですが（その代わり管理人は一切の責任を負いません）サーバーへ故意に負荷を掛けるなど運営の妨げとなる行為に対しては容赦しませんのでご了承ください。
Short: ラブライバーの、ラブライバーによる、ラブライバーのためのMastodonインスタンス

Description:
Basic Guidelines for Posting

  • Engage with one another in good faith
  • Respect boundaries as placed by others
  • Be respectful/apologize/give space as necessary if someone tells you that you crossed a boundary
  • Tag potentially upsetting content such as violence/blood, politics, and pornographic/NSFW material
If you are worried about a situation escalating, contact the Admins @lio or @nilsding

Rules

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:
  • Corporate Advertising (if you are a freelance artist, rock on and promote away, we love you!)
  • Posts that do not tag potentially upsetting content behind the CW feature, including pornographic or other NSFW material, politics, violence/assault, suicide, etc.
  • "Screenshot dunking," in which a user posts a screenshot of another post solely to criticize it
  • In addition to the tagged content above, we also ask those using a twitter crossposter to tag anything automatically posted to pounced with a "from twitter" CW or something similar.

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and will result in account suspension and revocation of access to this server:

  • Racism or advocation of racism (e.g. using racist pejoratives, advocating white supremacy, etc.)
  • Sexism or advocation of sexism (e.g. using sexist pejoratives, mansplaining, etc.)
  • Discrimination against gender, romantic, and sexual minorities (e.g. using homophobic/transphobic/queerphobic pejoratives, invalidating others, intentionally ignoring or misusing another's pronouns, etc.)
  • Ableism or advocation of ableism (e.g. using ableist pejoratives, pointing out behavior as mental illness as an insult, making light of any physical or mental disabilities that a person experiences, etc.)
  • Stalking, harassment, dogpiling, and any other behavior intended to intimidate or provoke others
  • Conduct promoting Nazism, xenophobia, white supremacy and any related ideology
  • Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxxing)
  • Illegal pornographic material and any analogous illustrated material (e.g. no pornographic material involving minors, including suggestive/pornographic cub/loli/shota/etc. Art)
  • Any conduct intended to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions

Behaviour to Avoid

  • Microaggressions (e.g. white/man/cis-splaining, intentionally using the wrong pronouns to address someone, invalidating other peoples' identities, etc.)
  • Demanding education on problematic behaviors from a non-admin/moderator. Users are welcome to educate others, but expecting it from others at all times is an unfair form of emotional labor that places the onus on the marginalized to engage at all times Presenting bad-faith arguments and otherwise concern-trolling

This is not an exhaustive list. If any of these don't make sense or you would like a deeper explanation, please speak with an Admin -- we are more than happy to help you understand the problems with these kinds of behavior.

Pursuant to the above, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

Emoji Attribution

This instance uses Mutant Standard emoji, which are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

Theme Attribution

This instance uses the Mastodon Modern theme, which is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

管理者は@ars42525です。 なにか問い合わせがあればこのアカウントへのリプライなどで送信していただいても構いませんが、確実に対応が必要な場合は記載されているメールアドレスに連絡してください。

graph.accelf.netをご確認ください。

  • Cloudflare Free Plan

    • CPU : 2core
    • RAM : 12.0GB
    • SSD : 150GB
    • Region : Osaka
    • IPv4 Supported
  • Web Server : Oracle Cloud
    • CPU : 2core
    • RAM : 12.0GB
    • SSD : 50GB
    • Region : Osaka
    • IPv4 Supported
    • Running on Docker
  • Media Server : Wasabi
    • Region : us-west-1

Description:
Om Fikaverse.club

  • Fikaverse.club är en Mastodon-instans för talare av skandinaviska språk.
  • Fikaverse.club hostas av masto.host, d.v.s. av ett professionell Mastodon-webbhotell.
  • Backup av all data sker dagligen.
  • När nya versioner av Mastodon släpps blir Fikaverse.club uppdaterad inom kort tid.
  • Fikaverse.club har en uppförekandekod (se nedan) och modereras aktivt. Bl.a. är rasism, sexism, homofobi och transfobi strängt förbjudna.
  • Inget spam / ingen reklam.


Fikaverse.club Uppförandekod

Vårt löfte

I syftet att fostra en öppen och välkomnande miljö, avlägger vi i egenskap av medarbetare och ansvariga ett löfte att göra deltagande i vårt projekt och samfund en upplevelse fri från trakasserier för alla, oavsett ålder, kroppsstorlek, funktionsnedsättning, etnicitet, könsidentitet och könsuttryck, erfarenhetsnivå, nationalitet, personligt utseende, ras, religion eller sexuell identitet och läggning.

Våra standarder

Exempel på uppförande som bidrar till att skapa en positiv miljö inkluderar:

  • Användande av välkomnande och inklusivt språk
  • Uppvisande av respekt för olika synpunkter och upplevelser
  • Ödmjukt mottagande av konstruktiv kritik
  • Fokusera på vad som är bäst för samfundet
  • Uppvisande av empati mot andra medlemmar av samfundet

Exempel på oacceptabelt uppförande av deltagare inkluderar:

  • Användande av sexualiserat språk eller bildspråk och ovälkommen sexuell uppmärksamhet eller närmanden
  • Trollande, förolämpande/nedsättande kommentarer och personliga eller politiska angrepp
  • Offentliga eller privata trakasserier
  • Publicerande av andras privata uppgifter, såsom en fysisk eller elektronisk adress, utan explicit medgivande
  • Annat uppförande som rimligen skulle kunna anses vara olämpligt i en professionell miljö

Våra förpliktelser

Projektansvariga är ansvariga för att klargöra standarderna för acceptabelt beteende och förväntas vidta lämpliga och rättvisa korrigerande åtgärder som svar på alla förekomster av oacceptabelt uppförande.

Projektansvariga har rätten och ansvaret för att avlägsna, redigera eller avvisa kommentarer, förbindelser, kod, wiki-redigeringar, problem och andra bidrag som inte lierar sig med denna Uppförandekod eller att tillfälligt eller permanent bannlysa en medarbetare för annat beteende som anses opassande, hotande, kränkande eller skadligt.

Omfattning

Denna Uppförandekod tillämpas både inom projektutrymmen och på allmänna platser när en individ representerar projektet och dess samfund. Exempel på att representera ett projekt eller samfund inkluderar nyttjande av en officiell projektepostadress, publicerande via ett officiellt konto på sociala medier, eller agerande i egenskap av utsedd representant på ett online- eller offline- evenemang. Representation av ett projekt kan definieras ytterligare och klargöras av projektansvariga.

Upprätthållande

Fall av kränkande, trakasserande eller på annat sätt oacceptabelt beteende kan rapporteras genom att kontakta projektgruppen på admin [at] fikaverse [punkt] club. Alla klagomål kommer att granskas och undersökas och resultera i ett svar som anses nödvändig och lämplig under omständigheterna. Projektgruppen är skyldig att upprätthålla sekretess med avseende på rapportören av en incident. Ytterligare uppgifter angående specifik upprätthållandepolicy kan postas separat.

Projektansvariga som inte följer eller upprätthåller Uppförandekoden i god tro kan ställas inför tillfälliga eller permanenta konsekvenser som bestäms av andra medlemmar av projektets ledning.

Attribuering

Denna Uppförandekod är anpassad efter Contributor Covenant, version 1.4, tillgänglig på https://www.contributor-covenant.org/sv/version/1/4/code-of-conduct.html
Short: Det här är en instans för talare av skandinaviska språk. Välkommen!

Description:
EFDN Rules

  • Don't be a Dick*
  • TERFs, Pedos and Nazis can into a Trebuchet
  • Dogwhistling/Apologetics for discrimination is considered the same as explicit discrimination (i.e. a ban)
  • Don't archive anything without explicit permission from everyone involved/mentioned in the posts being archived
  • Tag/CW your shit
  • Caption your Images every time you can
  • Pickle Rick posters are thrown to the kraken
  • Forbidden to Eat Teeth
  • Respect Bug Pokemon
  • Andy is the Official Pretty Boy of EFDN


* Being a Dick is defined as doing, supporting, dogwhistling.etc any one or more of the following: Racism, Sexism, Transphobia, Homophobia, Islamophobia, Classism, Ableism, Kinphobia, Pluralphobia or other forms of discrimination not listed here (i.e. this list is not exhaustive)

(And no, punching up isn't Being A Dick. Saying mean things about white people isn't Being A Dick.)

Inactivity Policy

Accounts which have not been logged into for a month or longer are eligible for suspension. At the 30 day mark, an email will be sent out asking if you wish to keep the account. If you do not reply within another 30 days, or reply that you do not wish to keep the account, the account will be suspended, to keep the user count of the server accurate. The suspension can be undone at any time, and email requests for undoing an account's suspension can be sent to admin@efdn.club or norikawa@efdn.club



Archival Policy

EFDN explicitly does not allow any archival of any user's account, posts or other data without the explicit consent of the user(s) being archived. This means that EFDN, as a whole, "opts out" to any archival, scraping or other data collection schemes, except for those users who specifically note otherwise. Essentially, if you don't see a note in someone's profile, they're opted out.

This instance is a gathering place for medievalists, amateur and professional, including academics, re-enactors (including but not limited to the SCA), as well as for those who share any of a wide variety of interests which experience has shown us tend to overlap with the above, including, but not limited to, historical, mythological, fictional, poetical, gaming, and DIY realms.

If you just want to hang out with interesting people, that's fine, too.

Try the hashtags #introduction and #HelpDesk if you do join.

Code of Conduct

While not a legal document, what follows is a guideline to acceptable behaviour and content on this instance.

This instance will not tolerate any of the following:

  • Racism, or advocacy thereof
  • Sexism, or advocacy thereof
  • Discrimination on the basis of gender, sexual orientation or, well, anything really, or advocacy thereof
  • Content illegal in Germany and/or France, including but not necessarily limited to Holocaust denial and Nazi symbolism
  • Pornography
  • Links to illegal content

Advertising

Limited advertising is permissible, especially if it is at least vaguely on-topic.

Content Warnings

The following types of posts should be put behind a content warning.

  • Spoilers for tv, movies, books, or, well, you get the idea
  • Anything NSFW
  • Most potentially traumatising content - please be sensible

Misc.

This instance is not an official channel or outlet for any particular organization or re-enactment group. That said, we have members who are active in the following:

  • Society for Creative Anachronism (SCA)
    • Atlantia
    • Drachenwald
    • East Kingdom
    • Middle Kingdom
If you are active in a group that is not listed here, contact the admins to have it added. Hopefully this list will make it easier for people who might be looking for us to find us ...

The mascot image on this site is from and courtesy of the British Library. Additional 47680, 'Pseudo-Aristotle', f.10, Alexander sending the letter to Aristotle.
Short: Medievalists and Medieval-adjacent.  Sort-of.

Description:
【サーバについて】


2019年4月に終了したGoogle+の移住先の一つとして重度のG+erが立てた日本人G+er向きのMastodonサーバです。あくまでMastodonをベースとしているのでG+ほどの性能機能はありませんので予めご了承ください。

【運営について】


管理人である、あきょぜ (@akyoz) が個人で行っております。
運営費も私財から出ておりますが、かなりきつくならない限りは寄付等も受け取らない予定です。
なお、モデレーター（不適切コンテンツへの対応者）はいつでも募集中です。

【セキュリティについて】


本サーバではWebサーバ、DBサーバ、Storageサーバ間の通信は全て暗号化および接続制限を設けており、WebサーバはCDN/WAFサービスによりもう一段階の暗号化を行う環境を構築する等セキュリティとプライバシーに配慮した設計となっておりますが、それでも心配な場合は利用をご遠慮ください。

また、ユーザ情報はローカルに保持せず、安全かつ高性能なGCPのマネージドサービスを使用、加えてパスワードはハッシュ化を実施した上で保管しておりますが、メールアドレス情報だけはユーザ認証のため平文で保管しています。そのため、登録されるメールアドレスはご注意ください
アカウント乗っ取り等の対策として、二段階認証を設けておりますので是非ご利用ください。

【プライバシーについて】


Cookieの取得および、サービス向上のため利用者からのアクセス解析(GoogleAnalytics)を行っています。
また、登録の際に使用されたメールアドレスは管理者からは見えてしまいますのでご承知置きをお願いします。
ただし、それ以外の情報についてはMastodonの精神に則り、収集・解析を行ないません。

詳しくは利用規約内のプライバシーポリシーをご確認ください。

【トラブルや不適切と思われる投稿があった場合】


個人間のトラブルについては、個人間で解決をお願いします。
ただ、サーバ全体・他サーバに迷惑がかかるレベルのトラブルが発生した場合はアカウント停止等の対処をする可能性がありますので、ご承知おきください。
また不適切と思われる投稿を見かけた際は、通報機能を使用していただければ対処します。
※2021/08/08 追記事項
当サーバのCDNとして使用している『Cloudflare』の児童ポルノ検知サービスである『CSAM 検出ツール』を採用しています。このツールは当サーバおよび、外部のサーバにて、米国が定める児童性的虐待コンテンツ (CSAM)が受信されたことを検知するもので、当サーバに該当のコンテンツがキャッシュされた場合に早期に削除することを目的としています。
なお、このCSAMとは実際の被害者がでている児童ポルノの画像データを対象とするデータベースであり、いわゆる二次元を対象とする非実在青少年のポルノ作品を対象とするものではありません。

本ツールによって直ちにアップロード者へ逮捕等されるものではありませんが、悪質な場合は全米行方不明・被搾取児童センター (NCMEC) 経由で、データをアップロードした人に対して公権力による調査等が行われる可能性があります。
他サーバの管理者様および、当サーバの利用を検討される方の中で本ツールに対しての危険だと判断される方は、ドメインブロックや利用をしない等の対応をおとりいただくよう各位予めご了承ください。
Short: Google"Plus to" Mas"todon"

Description:
Code of Conduct

The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

  1. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:
    1. Excessive advertising
    2. Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
    3. Untagged nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions
    4. Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions
  2. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:
    1. Racism or advocation of racism
    2. Sexism or advocation of sexism
    3. Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
    4. Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism
  3. The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:
    1. Sexual depictions of children
    2. Any other content which is defined as illegal in most European countries
    3. Conduct promoting any extremist ideologies, racial supremacy or religious beliefs that undermine other people rights
  4. Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:
    1. Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
    2. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
    3. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

Site admin

Paolo Vecchi.

Server rules unashamedly Ctrl+C/Ctrl+V'd from mastodon.social rules.
Short: A Mastodon instance for Luxembourg and beyond.

Description:
Welcome!

Greetings! This is a Mastodon instance dedicated to followers of Jesus Christ. Feel free to join and enjoy the fellowship of others.

If you do not receive a confirmation email within a couple days after sending an application, please contact @life or email lifenetwork@pm.me.

If There’s Life is down, go to about.theres.life for status updates. Bookmark it now so you can find it later.

Donating

If you would like to donate to keep the Life Network running, you may do so by tipping Big_Diggity at https://ko-fi.com/thereslife

Rules

This is not a legal document, but rather a guideline of what conduct will be tolerated on this instance.

Particular cases will be judged individually, and we take all reports seriously.

Please avoid using profanity and tearing others down with your words. Remember what Paul wrote in Ephesians 4:29: “Let no corrupt speech proceed out of your mouth, but such as is good for building up as the need may be, that it may give grace to those who hear.”

Harassment of any kind toward anyone for any reason is unacceptable and will result in harsh action against your account.

Speak the truth with love. Both are vital and cannot be divorced.

You won't be banned for calmly voicing your opinions, even if others think they are absurd or incorrect (no arbitrary "fact checkers"). Just be prepared for friendly discussion about it.

All in all, keep There’s Life a family friendly place and follow Jesus’ teaching in Luke 6:31: “As you would like people to do to you, do exactly so to them.”

So the rules can be summarized as, “Be kind to one another” and “Love others as Christ has loved us.”

For clarification, here are some concrete rules:

  • Content illegal in United States or Germany (location of the server) are not permitted
  • Don’t post anything sexually suggestive or explicit
  • Any kind of bigotry against people or their beliefs is prohibited
  • Be considerate when replying to others’ posts. Would they appreciate the tone or content of your response? Think before you post.
  • Harassment is prohibited, as mentioned before.
  • Spam (repeated posting of something identical or similar) is not allowed
  • Accounts dedicated to promoting a brand or business are not allowed

Overall, keep There’s Life family friendly.

Bots

No automated posting (without direct human supervision, such as a Twitter crossposter) is allowed on There’s Life without prior permission from a moderator.

Reports

We take all reports from all instances seriously. We also try to respond to those who have made reports to notify them that action has taken place. When reports are sent from other instances, we will try to notify an admin of that instance to let them know what we have done to stop the problem.

Also, when there is a problem with one of our members, please discuss the issue with our admins (@life). We care about issues and want to help address them.

Questions

If anyone, including other instance admins, have any questions or need clarification about our rules or moderation policies, don’t hesitate to DM @life@theres.life.
Short: A family-friendly social network (Mastodon instance) devoted to the new life found in Christ.

利用の際は以下の点にご留意ください。

  • 日本国内の法律に抵触するようなことはお控えください。
  • その他、他のユーザーの迷惑になるようなことはお控えください。
  • Mastodonのバージョンは、最新リリースに可能な限り追随しています。不具合等を発見された方は、管理者までご連絡いただけると大変ありがたいです。
  • 本サーバーは、日本語によるトゥート全文検索に対応しています。画像を投稿する時に、料理名などのキーワードをトゥート文字列に含めることで、あとから過去画像の検索がしやすくなるかもしれません。適宜ご活用ください。
  • 本サーバーは「ごちそう画像投稿専用サーバ」であることを理解した上で、節度のある投稿をお願いいたします。

Description:
librepunk (adj) | \lē-brəpŭngk\

  • something that is free (as in freedom) but queer, radical, and not necessarily technical. Created as an antithesis to oppressive software communities, and built upon the severed head of the GNU. As a concept, librepunk represents the liberation of all people from oppressive systems, from proprietary software to the gender binary, to heteronormativity, ableism, capitalism, racism, and any other machine of oppression.


librepunk (noun) | <em>lē-brəpŭngk\

  • The ecosystem of services hosted by Puffball running 100% free and open source software without the use of CDNs, centralized hosting, or search indexing.
    see also: art.librepunk.club , music.librepunk.club (not working atm) , cloud.librepunk.club

  • A member of the online community of librepunk!

pleroma crime (noun) | <em>plə̇ˈrōmə ˈkrīm \

a general purpose bannable offense from librepunk. Pleroma crimes include (but are not limited to)
  • being a pleroma instance without allowlist federation
  • federating closely with pleroma instances without allowlist federation
  • being any type of far right
  • using slurs
  • saying irritating shit in the mentions of librepunk users or our friends
  • being a poorly moderated instance
  • posting uncensored nsfw
  • sexualizing minors
  • spamming
  • wasting librepunk resources maliciously
  • block evasion
  • crypto bullshit
  • archiving
  • scraping
  • being racist
  • being a TERF
  • and much, much more!

If you or a loved one was wrongfully convicted of committing a pleroma crime and were unjustly banished from librepunk, the official librepunk policy is to take screenshots of you bitching and laugh at them.
Short: a friendly general instance for coders, queers, and leftists!

Description:
Welcome to mograph.social

The main purpose of this server is to connect people from the broad motion design community, including VFX artist, animators (more in general designers and artists that are interested in moving images) and to contribute to the Fediverse with interesting content. It is also a place to offer to people in these fields an open space for discussion outside the toxic boxes of mainstream social media.

If you need more information about Mastodon, about what it is and how it works, have a look at fedi.tips.

Code of Conduct

In general

Be excellent to each other and respect the rules.

Keep always in mind that the aim of our server is community building and sharing of ideas and interests in respect of each others.

If you're a new member please fill in your profile with the relevant information as soon as you can so we know who we're talking to, and add a profile picture. Also it is recommended to make an #introduction post with the appropriate hashtag to tell a bit about yourself and your interests.

Crossposting

Crossposting from other networks like Twitter is allowed but if done regularly the posts should be marked as unlisted. Most importantly the account owner should be active in the conversation on our Mastodon server as well.

If you leave your account alone while crossposting it could be silenced.

Long threads

If you plan to post a long thread please post all the messages after the first one as unlisted so you don't spam the public timelines. Otherwise your account could be silenced.

Uploading videos

Due to the nature of our interests we naturally tend to share videos. While doing so please remember that the storage space on the server is not unlimited neither free. We encourage you if possible to upload your content on other platforms of your choice (YouTube, Vimeo, PeerTube, e.g.) and then post them as links here.

Image descriptions

Please add an image description for any picture or video you upload so that people on a screen reader can follow along too.

Advertising and self-promotion

Mograph.social aims at community building and not at advertising. This space is paid by the community for the community via donations and we can't accept people using it to do their free advertising campaigns. It's considered self-promotion: showcasing your art, your portfolio and skills, sharing your video tutorials, podcasts, offering/looking for work. If you're here to make a daily advertising campaign of your brand/products with the broadcasting of posts (or threads of posts) into the void, it's not going to work. Explicit advertising posts with links to direct products/services for sale will be deleted and your account might get silenced.

People, not brands, please.

Personal Pronouns

We encourage you to add your pronouns to your profile if you want them to be used and also check your folks profiles for pronouns before engaging in conversation with them.

Support mograph.social

Mograph.social is run by members of the community. Please consider becoming a patron/backer or making a donation to help us keeping the server up and running:

Become a Patron
Donate on LiberaPay
Donate on Ko-Fi
Donate on PayPal

Mastodon Server Covenant

mograph.social fully subscribes to and complies with the Mastodon Server Covenant.

Hosting Information

mograph.social is fully hosted and managed by Masto.host..
Short: mograph.social is a space for the Motion Design community. VFX artists, 3D artists, animators, designers and coders with an interest in moving images are all welcome. NO CRYPTOART / NFTs ALLOWED.

・ルール

なにか問題が起これば随時追記していきます。

Hellsite.site is a left wing progressive and welcoming space. to keep it a space open to all where they can feel safe, we have the following guidelines for our users and moderators:

-Discrimination against those lower down on the social ladder this includes, but it not limited to: racism, homophobia, antisemitism, transphobia, classism against the working class, ableism, gate keeping of identities and general exclusionary behavior, misogyny, genocide denial, harassment, Islamophobia. We support and recognise other-kin as well as plural systems, we will not accept any questioning of their legitimacy as identities. We do endorse punching up because reverse racism and things like that aren't real

-All illegal content is not allowed on Hellsite.site whatsoever, regardless of the legitimacy of the law. Illegal content will get the server taken down, and a one person crusade is not worth that hassle. We do not endorse any illegal actions what so ever on Hellsite.site

-Hellsite.site is an anti fascist space. We endorse and support the idea of deplatforming and fighting fascism at every turn, as such we consistently de-federate with fascistic instances, and do not care who is on those instances. Because of this anti fascist stance, any and all users on Hellsite or other instances will be immediately cut off from our community if there is even any suspicion of fascistic tendencies. explicit fascist dog whistles such as the '((( )))' antisemitic echo and symbols like the frog emoji will be looked at in context, many people may be using things in a non fascist context or not understand the meaning behind something and we are always looking to understand and educate in the fight against fascism

-Hellsite.site is not an advertising platform. While fund raising and users selling their own products or sex workers advertising to get by is more than acceptable, hellsite.site is not a platform for capitalists to advertise on and park their social media brand accounts on; in the same vein we refuse to allow the platforming of any government agencies or law enforcement on our instance

-As we try to be an accepting space, we ask you do the following to be inclusive in your posting. Use the content warning system to allow for those who may find topics triggering, obvious examples include: food, sexual content, assault, mental health issues, and any other topics at your own discretion; explicitly sexual content should always be marked as such, be it text or images. second of all, we ask that people please use the image description system for all images posted, yes even large blocks of text, it's very easy for those who are able bodied to transcribe the text and descriptions of visual situations

-Consistent spam is not allowed, even when considered to be a joke by the user. while a repetition of a line here or there may be just a joke, spamming where much of the local timeline is taken up by a single user posting the same or similar variations of a word or phrase fast and continuously will be removed

-Bad faith rules lawyering in an attempt to avoid the clear and obvious progressive intent of these rules is unacceptable behavior, even when done for the sake of 'playing devil's advocate'. if you have issues with the lettering of a point here, please discuss it with the rest of the community and an open and honest criticism

-All rules on hellsite are made by the community, for the community. We are a community who built a space we want to be in, and as such all rules are subject to change by the participation of community members in talking about changing old rules or adding new ones. We welcome new ideas, new perspectives, and a discussion about what makes a space as open and positive as possible. No conversation is final, and old topics are always welcome to be brought back to the table for discussion by the community by any user who requests it

A general failure to follow these guidelines will lead to the removal of your posts, and eventually your account should we decide that the matter is serious enough
Short:
Hellsite.site: The most cursed instance on the fedi. Communism will win.

We run a custom fork of the mastodon code called Goatstodon that runs some slight improvements. 

Come for the shitposting, stay for the infinite polls and 4 gigabyte upload cap!

Description:
资助本站

感谢您的慷慨，通过捐赠支持站点良性发展，希望这也可以令您快乐。

  • 选择您喜欢的渠道，扫码即可进行捐赠。或者使用 PayPal 链接捐赠；
  • 您可以在捐赠备注中留下想说的话，或者用于在本页展示的个人链接。

鸣谢 & 提醒

特别感谢这些友人们对本站提供的资助：@june。

如果时间线上出现您不希望看到的内容，请优先使用「隐藏」、「屏蔽」功能。

对那些有违您心中正义的内容发起「举报」是您的权利，但如非下文所述确切情况，限于实例维护者精力，「举报」往往会被忽略。

社区准则

以下指南不是法律文件，最终解释权取决于 TzCafe 的管理员。在这里为您提供我们对待内容的见解：

  1. 以下类型的内容将从公共时间轴中删除：
    • 广告过多
    • 从第三方新闻来源发布的未经策动的新闻机器人
    • 未加标记的血腥和极端的图形暴力，包括艺术描绘
    • 未经标记的裸露内容，色情内容和色情内容，包括艺术作品
    • 公开发表的希望真实存在的、活着的人死亡或遭遇不幸的内容，包括艺术作品
  2. 以下类型的内容将从公共时间轴中删除，并可能导致帐户暂停和撤销对服务的访问：
    • 种族主义或对种族主义的拥护
    • 性别歧视或对性别歧视的拥护
    • 种姓或提倡种姓
    • 对性别和性少数群体的歧视，或对其的崇尚
    • 仇外和/或暴力民族主义
  3. 明确禁止使用以下类型的内容，这将导致帐号被限制访问：
    • 儿童的性描写
    • 内容在日本和/或中国是非法的，例如纳粹象征或否认大屠杀
    • 弘扬民族主义思想
  4. 旨在跟踪或骚扰其他用户，或阻止其他用户使用该服务，或降低该服务的性能，或骚扰其他用户，或煽动其他用户执行上述任何行为的任何行为，也是禁止的，并且将受到最高至包括取消使用该服务的处罚。这包括但不限于以下行为：
    • 继续使用与已经明确要求与该用户停止和停止该用户互动的用户对话，无论使用哪种平台特定的隐私工具，都可以视为骚扰。
    • 未经明确许可（非正式地称为「人肉」），汇总，发布和/或传播一个人的个人或私人数据可能会被视为骚扰。
    • 在用户请求停止与该用户的所述互动并停止之后（在正式情况下称其为「纠缠」），诱使用户与另一用户进行持续的互动或讨论可被视为骚扰。

尽管有这些规定，但我们保留随时出于任何原因撤销任何用户的访问权限的权利，法律限制除外。
Short: 一个畅所欲言的网上咖啡馆，欢迎在这里交流，就像在现实中的咖啡馆里那样。

Description:
Welcome to Pone.Social

In general, try to keep things pony- or equine-related. Furry and anime posters will be bullied.

Porn is okay, but you may want to mark it with CW.

View all of our rules below.

Another pony Mastodon instance?

It's true, we aren't the first or the only pony related Mastodon instance. But I think you'll find our rules here are more relaxed than those other instances and are reflective of our /mlp/ roots. I think we're also the first pony Mastodon instance located in the 🇺🇸.

OK, but why pone instead of pony?

Yeah uhhh, pony was already taken so uhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh yeah.

Who's the elephant?

That's Muriel. She was a featured in the episode She Talks to Angel in Season 9 of My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic. And, you know, since Mastodon's mascot is an elephant, it seemed fitting we should also have an elephant mascot. 🐘

How can I support this wonderful site?

Hey, you're way too kind. While there are costs associated with this site, it's actually not yet a super expensive server to maintain. But if you are appreciative of my efforts and would like to offset the hosting expenses, there are a variety of ways for you to do so:
  • 👛 Bitcoin
  • 💰 Coinbase (other cryptocurrency options)
  • 💵 PayPal
  • 💳 Liberapay (for Pony.Tube)

I have a question not answered here, how do I contact you?

E-mail

📧 admin@pone.social

Mail

📭 PO Box 621622, Orlando, FL 32862-1622 USA

Telephone

☎️ +1 (844) 4TWI-FAG

Discord Server

If you want to share videos, check out our sister site, Pony.Tube—a Peertube-enabled, pony-focused video sharing site.

Omnia vincit cunnus equæ 🐎
About Pone.Social
Short: Pone.Social is a Mastodon-enabled social network for bronies, pegasisters, and all the rest of you fellow pony degenerates.

Description:
社区导向

utopia.cool 是基于 Mastodon 搭建的网络社区。致力于提供自由、友善、开放的「言论广场」。
虽然没有特定主题，但我们重视公共讨论，期望大家走到广场上来，分享爱好，多跟邻居交流，关心别人的想法和观点。


规则

原则上自由。用户只需遵守自己所在国家的法律，和我们服务器所在地（东京）的法律。

使用本站的服务，代表你默认接受我们将你的数据存储在境外（包括但不限于日本、美国），还代表你默认接受此行为带来的潜在风险。
尤其是身处欧洲的用户，请注意你们受到《通用数据保护条例》（GDPR）的保护。用户有权随时获取和删除自己的全部数据，在本站注册即代表你授权本站处理和储存你的数据，包括数据的国际传输。

除此之外的附加规则：

  • 禁止纯粹以发布广告为目的的账号。禁止平台内交易行为。
  • 所有可能引起他人不适的内容，请标记NSFW，或主动折叠。
  • 半年以上不活跃的账号将被回收。

站内管理偏向「宽容」（界定模糊时倾向于容许），所有判断由管理员做出。首犯警告，再犯隐藏，三犯封禁处理。
鼓励大家参与规则制定，这里的一切皆可协商。
本站的站长账号叫 Benevolent Dictator，请自行揣摩其中含义。

实例特性

  • 本站是 Mastodon 中文实例（使用指南）。用户发布消息的主语言应当是中文。可以接受其他语言的嘟文，但不应大量发布非中文内容。
  • 本站使用的基础服务均由海外供应商提供（域名 - Namecheap ；服务器 - SakuraVPS ；对象存储 - Wasabi ；邮件服务 - SparkPost）。 海外网络访问速度会比国内服务商略慢，也不能保证墙内持续可访问（不是我们能决定的）。
  • 嘟文字数上限8000字，想发什么发什么~ 公开的长文请主动折叠，避免冲击公共时间线。
  • 目前已经开启了全文搜索，用户可以搜索自己和好友发表的嘟文。
  • 服务器存储、带宽、流量费用开销较大。因此没有放宽对媒体文件的限制，不建议上传太大的文件。
  • 本站用户页面不设隐藏，站外可以直接访问到用户发布的公开内容。不适合公开的内容请自行设定私密权限。如有时间轴上不愿看到的内容，可以自行设定过滤条件。

捐赠支持

utopia.cool 网站的运营目标是长期稳定地提供友好的社交网络服务，运营维护费用由社群内有能力的用户捐赠维持。 捐赠详情和开销公示，请访问 Patreon捐款项目页

管理员

本站现有2名管理员：@twisted、 @5432688

正在招募 1~2名 监察员，有意者联系@admin。
主要负责：

  • 审核本站新注册申请
  • 审核举报信息并处理
  • 社区运营（管理「议会机器人」等面向未来的需求）

站点运维

意见和建议请联系 @admin。

技术故障和紧急事务找 @twisted。

违规内容可以直接举报。

规则改进和运营相关议题，现已通过社区公共治理的「@utopia议会机器人」承担 。


本站不会 单方面/不加预告地 削减/限制 用户权利。
但可能会经过站内讨论和公示后，删减/修改/补充站点规则。
具体讨论过程由站内账号@utopia议会机器人管理和记录。并遵守《utopia议会机器人工作规则》。

可以保证：管理员如果不再运营这个站点，会在关站前3个月提前告知所有用户。
同时，本站用户如果有意承担站点运营工作（其实很大程度上是费用开销），可以从管理员处获得当前域名和服务器的转让。
Short:
utopia.cool 基于 Mastodon 搭建。致力于提供自由、友善、开放的「言论广场」。
我们重视公共讨论，鼓励表达和对话，希望一起创造良好的网络社交环境。
