Description:
什么是Mastodon（长毛象）？

长毛象是一种去中心化的社交网络。大部分社区（比如此站slashine . onl）都是开放的，可以和任何在联邦宇宙中的人互动交流。你可以在此发布你的个人信息流。你发的内容（在这里叫嘟嘟）可以出现在公共时间线，也可以不出现，或者仅仅关注你的人或私信可见。

长毛象是一个用来交流思想，记录日常，和分享创作的平台。这里没有定制内容的算法，也没有屏蔽词、炸号。默认状态下，长毛象的社交范围是你认识的人认识的人。联邦宇宙中的中文用户目前不算多，没有微博、LOFTER那么热闹，但它的隐私性、自由度、和自己的数据由自己掌控的感觉是站长和一些朋友们向往已久的。

一个小站，名叫slashine

本站服务器及运营均位于海外，如有任何疑问可以联系站长 @slashine。
建这个站子的初衷是因为站长使用微博时，既想要圈地自萌同人又想要为社会事件发声，过得很割裂……有了这个站以后，放一些东西就会更自由一些。目前这个站里大都是欧美斜线向同人爱好&创作者，但发嘟内容并不限于发同人相关。

站名slashine的由来：因为认识大家大多是通过斜线slash，shine是瞎想的，希望大家快快乐乐闪闪亮亮w 站址的后缀onl，因为看上去像一个小人用屁股怼墙而获得站长和大家的青睐。

本站行为守则

1. 发言相互尊重，求同存异️🌈。本站反对、禁止骚扰行为。
2. 公开发布CP🖖🏼相关内容请打#tag。善用静音、屏蔽、和举报功能。
3. 👉👌边缘梗和敏感话题的讨论请善用预警，设置公开范围，以及折叠功能（CW键）。
4. ©️尊重知识产权，credit他人作品：非原创内容请标上来源，至少说明转载出处。

其他服务条款

1. 在本站如果受到骚扰、注意到其他人受到骚扰、看到认为违反行为准则或服务条款的内容，或有任何其他顾虑，请使用平台内举报工具，或者联系站长进行处理。任何被站长判定为不恰当的行为如果不终止，视行为严重性此社区成员会被警告或移除（非本站成员将会被警告或封禁）。
2. 本站不会记录或者备份任何大家发布的内容，请大家勤用备份、导出等功能。
3. 本站服务器位于欧盟，网站、产品和服务都是针对至少16岁的人。 如果你未满16岁，为了符合GDPR的要求(General Data Protection Regulation) 请不要使用这个网站。

注册须知

本站时不时会开放审核注册。如果我们还不认识，注册时请提供一个你的社交账号/想加入本站的充分理由；
其余时间本站将采取熟人推荐制，如果想要加入，请找站内的熟人/自己联系站长，充分说明理由，审核通过以后管理员会给出邀请码。
在开始注册之前，建议阅读这个保护隐私的小总结。填写注册邮箱时建议使用Protonmail、Tutanota等具隐私意识的邮箱服务。

其他链接和参考：
中文长毛象使用手册
具隐私意识的电邮服务推荐
Short:
一颗温馨熟人星球。This is a small community consists of fans and fandom content creators.
更多关于本站和注册请点开「详情/Learn more」阅读。

Description:
Code of Conduct

In addition to the rules above. Use the norms of common decency when interacting with others. Some examples include:

GOLDEN RULE: Treat others as you would like to be treated.

  • DO NOT sling personal insults.
  • DO interact as if you are speaking to others face-to-face.
  • DO discuss topics with intelligence, nuance, and reason.
  • DO supply references for information provided when applicable.

Unpopular Opinions

We do not believe in the notion of an accepted narrative on any topic. All opinions are permitted, provided you follow the rules and conduct outlined above.
Short: A general social gathering space to discuss a wide range of topics and thoughts.

Description:
Anti Social Science 站務規則

歡迎訪問

歡迎來到 Anti Social Science，一個新的長毛象（Mastodon）社群。能夠看到這裏的用戶，應該已經對 Mastodon 有一些瞭解了吧。那麽站長也懶得寫使用指南了……

長毛象中文用戶使用文檔（非官方翻譯）

長毛象官方隱私政策（英文）

其它更詳細的使用説明，請用戶自行搜索。

本站的域名、伺服器、和站務人員，均不位於中國大陸境内（但不提供證明）。站長姑且相信自己有能力維持站點的長期運營，但不會進行言論審查，以降低自己被中國大陸網絡封禁的風險，也不會在被封禁后提供其它的訪問方式。請用戶自行解決翻墻問題。

本站話題

雖然很想寫「本站沒有行爲準則」，但是遇到過於惡意的騷擾和發言，可能還是免不了一些屏蔽措施吧。

本站并不致力於，把本機時間軸維護成一個和諧愉悅的社區環境。每個用戶在 Fediverse 獲取的信息，應當取決於他自身關注的不同實例的用戶，而不是局限在本站内部交朋友。本站也沒有特定的聊天主題。因此，只要不主動地去騷擾（at）他人，在本站談論任何正確或不正確的話題都是可以的。

本站的宗旨，是傾向於讓互聯網盡可能地成爲自由的法外之地。所以，大部分和公衆認知乃至和法律相抵觸的行爲或言論，并不能成爲封禁的理由。用戶的言論可能會受到站長的極度不認同和鄙視，但在判定的過程中，站長仍然會盡力傾向於讓這些言論自由地存在。

本站仍需遵從伺服器所在國家的互聯網内容管制法規。猥褻、色情、惡意、謠言、種族主義的相關言論，將受到限制或禁止。尤其禁止與納粹相關的言論和圖片在互聯網上的傳播。站長個人也沒有動力去為這類信息對抗法律爭取自由空間。

本站仍然保留刪除任何嘟文及賬號的權利。有以下行爲的用戶可能會受到警告或封禁：

  • 惡意騷擾，攻擊本站或其它實例的用戶；
  • 在本機時間軸發佈未進行敏感標記的成人信息；
  • 被判定為在本機時間軸刷屏推廣垃圾信息。

本站傾向於，不進行實例之間的屏蔽，除非受到代碼層級的惡意攻擊。實例之間的屏蔽，并不能幫助用戶徹底維持其個人網路身份安全。實例的所在地、總體的言論傾向，乃至站長的愚蠢言論，並不能成爲對其屏蔽，限制其用戶與本站互動的理由。

總體來説，希望這裏成爲一個更加公開的環境，希望大家在保障自身安全的前提下，盡量開放而不是鎖嘟。管理員也盡量不出現。

信息安全

從技術上講，本站（以及所有 Fediverse 實例的站長）有能力看到自家實例用戶的電子郵件地址、訪問本站時的 IP 地址、和任何公開或隱私的嘟文。本站承諾不會查看、利用、向任何人公開這些信息。

本站强烈建議，用戶注冊時，不要使用會與用戶真實身份產生聯係的電子郵箱（如工作郵箱、QQ郵箱、真實姓名拼寫的郵箱用戶名…），但不會因此而拒絕用戶注冊。

請注意：Mastodon 不是加密聊天軟件。即使用戶鎖嘟，或者設置某條嘟文不可見，用戶的所有隱密嘟文，包括發送給其他用戶的「私信」，對於本實例的站長，從技術上都是可以看到的。甚至，所有被允許看到這些隱密嘟文和私信的，其它實例的用戶，他們所在實例的站長，從技術上也都是有能力，從數據庫裏，看到這些信息的。所以，Fediverse 世界裏不存在「真正」隱密的信息，請用戶發文時注意安全。

知識共享

除非用戶做單獨聲明，否則在本站創作的所有内容，遵循 CC BY-SA 4.0 的知識共享許可協議。你可以自由地分享和修改這些作品，但必須指出作品原始版本的作者署名，並且你對作品的重製，也必須以相同的授權協議來分享。

本協議可能不適用於對自己的作品有獨家獲利預期的用戶，用戶可以標明其獨有的共享許可方式，使本站的默認共享協議不再生效。

捐助本站

雖然站長也很想被抖內……但現有的一切捐贈網站，都無法保證站長的隱私不被洩露，——至少網站是知道收款人身份的。其實也不是多麼堅持要隱藏身份，但單純因為收點錢而多一份隱私方面的擔心，並沒有必要。

本站的 bitcoin 收款地址：
bc1qzfx350f52m3nus3p5ud24jcgr0sfsvgucg7942
但只是聊勝於無。站長不會期待從這裡收到任何款項，更不鼓勵大家單純為此而涉足虛擬貨幣領域。

所以，如果有人打算給本站捐贈，可以直接捐給任何社會公益組織，然後和站長說一聲，站長就會很開心地，將你的捐款，作為本站的受捐贈記錄。當然，品味過於奇異的捐贈方向，可能會遭受站長的白眼和拒絕。但我相信你不會捐給 ISIS 啦。

使用建議

作為自負成本的小站，本站目前的主要壓力，是用戶上傳的媒體文件，導致未來在線存儲空間不足的風險及額外費用。所以，站長希望大家，不要把本站作為圖床使用。幾百 KB 的圖片，足以作為網絡交流使用；更大體積的圖片似乎並沒有必要。但站長並沒有對上傳圖片大小作出限制，只是希望大家配合（鞠躬
Short:
服務器在海外，預計接納四位數用戶。
注冊后需等待人工審核。
無特定主題，大家隨意。

Description:
The Church of Cathode

Cathode Church is a Mastodon instance on the Fediverse for trans and gender-diverse makers, coders and tinkerers.

It is intended to be a supportive, friendly, and creative online space.

Tenets

Courtesy

Harassment, vitriol, exploitation and abuse are not tolerated. This includes racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism and other expressions of power across structural power/privilege differentials.

Respect and venerate the great constellation of human experience and self-expression, across gender, sexuality, neurology, psychology, body, ability, race, identity, culture, spirituality, et cetera.

Content warnings should be used in accordance with evolving community standards and the needs of fellow users.

Accounts posting content not suitable for minors such as pornography or explicit sexual content should be locked and clearly marked as 18+ only in the display name or bio. The account-holder must reject follow requests from users who do not make clear that they are over 18. All posts containing explicit material must also be content-warned as such and have media hidden.

Bot accounts are allowed, but must not interact with other users without their consent.

Copyrighted content should not be posted without permission, and always with credit, ideally hyperlinking to the author's online presence.

Solidarity

Church users are expected to work to educate themselves and support their fellows with different lived experiences, cultures, beliefs, and intersections of structural power. It is not the responsibility of those whose identity or experience you do not understand to explain themselves to those yet uninformed. Any education offered is given as a favour and should be respected as such.

No one person can champion all worthy causes, and bigotry cannot be fought on any single front. Respect the work of those who are dedicated to different parts of the fight. Respect the capacity of others.

Irradiate the Rich

As part of our Solidarity, always remember who the greater persecutor is, who is responsible for the ignorance of our peers, and oppression of our communities. Disagreements among us are important and natural but can obscure the greater perspective.

Intersectionality

Solidarity is meaningless without acknowledging and actively working against the multitudinous gradients of privilege/power any of us may hold over others. Consider your privileges and their ramifications when engaging with other users.

Privacy

Church users are not required or expected to disclose or externally verify any aspects of their identity or to administrators other than a functioning email for signup, excluding conditions agreed to during the sign-up process.

Creating or using alternate accounts to evade blocks, mutings, suspensions or silencings is not allowed by any users.

Advocacy

Instances with a history of permitting harassment, abusive behaviour, and spam by their users will be blocked, regardless of the wording of their policies.

Church administrators will stand behind users reporting harassment and personally follow up where necessary and wanted, maintaining the anonymity of our users where possible, including against other church users.

Moderating disputes

Where a church user is under investigation for violating the Tenets, they will be informed of such as soon as practical, and offered the right of defence through a moderator. No public announcements will be made until a final decision is settled, and only if the decision affects other parties (such as in the case of an outright ban of a serial harasser).

Both those accused and those reporting are requested to avoid non-conciliatory public interaction with each other, 'callouts', and the like, until moderating decisions have been made.

Ephemerality

The highest priority of Cathode Church is maintaining the safety of our users and this can contradict some assumptions of federating software regarding open access. The server is configured to disable search indexing and unauthenticated viewing of the timeline or toots where possible. Known fulltext-indexers are blocked. Hosts detected attempting to scan/crawl media files will be blocked.

That said, it is not recommended to rely on the security of Mastodon for very private information.

Conclusion

To be considered for an account, you must confirm that you have read and understood these responsibilities and expectations, by mentioning the Tenets in the "Why do you want to join?" field. If you do not, your account will not be activated.

If you have any issues, email s0 at this domain.

Administrative details

Technical

Cathode Church is run off a VPS in Sydney, Australia, and uses OpenStack Object Storage also in Sydney for media storage. The site should be fully accessible via IPv6 and modern HTTPS/TLS.

Multiple Sessions

Inspired by vulpine.club's setup, it is possible to maintain multiple separate sessions for separate accounts by using the subdomains 0.cathode.church, 1.cathode.church, 2.cathode.church, and 3.cathode.church.

Local-only Posting

Toots that end with 👁 or have "Local-only" enabled in the web interface are not federated from cathode.church to any other instance. They are only visible to Cathode Church users (depending on the toot visibility setting).

Donating

You can donate to the server's upkeep at s0's Ko-fi. It will be appreciated.

Art & Emoji

The background image of the Cathode skin under Glitch Edition flavour is by the Weld, and All Rights Reserved.

This instance uses hand-picked subsets of the following emoji sets:

  • Mutant Standard emoji, which are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.
  • Robomoji, a modified subset of the Mutant Standard emoji, which are also provided under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.
  • Blob Emoji, which are licensed under the Apache License 2.0.
  • Meowmoji, a modified subset of Blob Emoji, which are also licensed under the Apache License 2.0.
  • Blobhaj emoji, by heatherhorns, licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License.
  • Dragn emoji, by @chr@cybre.space, licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License.

Guilds

UTVI

Cathode Church is a member of the Union of Typeslut Verified Instances. Freeze peach nerds stay mad.
Short: A place for trans makers, coders, tinkerers and dreamers.

Description:
Nemushee.net

Nemushee Air その眠気は、軽くない。

ここは何？

  • Nemushee.netは日本にサーバーが存在する個人運営Mastodonサーバーです。
  • 你好！这个服务器是日本人在日本运营的。也欢迎中文用户的注册。

お問い合わせ先

  • 管理人のメールアドレスはこちらです。 admin@nemushee.net

寄付について

  • Amazon欲しいものリストからの贈り物大歓迎です。

サーバーについて

  • Location
    • 東京 (日本东京)

Description:
Imprint/Impressum

mastdn.social in union with mstodon/mstodn/mstdon/mstn/mstdn/mastn.social and MAXODON.social,welt.social,erde.social,fedi.center,fediverse.center is powered by:

http://permanizer.com

This POOLS instance is sponsored member of GPNSI network (https://www.pools.global) - any-one is invited to become non-exclusive or exclusive sponsor:

Mission of PERMANIZER publishing house is to establish projects as permanent benefits to society, pushed in particular by strong personal commitment until they become self-financing.

Die Mission des PERMANIZER-Verlages besteht darin, Projekte als permanente Bestandteile der Gesellschaft zu etablieren, die nur mit persönlichem Engagement diesseits ihrer Rentabilität angeschoben werden müssen, um später finanziell selbsttragend der Allgemeinheit größtmöglich zu nützen.

Moderation & Administration: Publisher and staff of the German book series/ Herausgeber sowie Mitarbeiter der Buchreihe

DAS NEUE UNIVERSUM (http://www.dasneueuniversum.com)

FUTURE. RESEARCH. ADVENTURE. - On the bottom of true facts and science. ZUKUNFT. FORSCHUNG. ABENTEUER. -Auf dem Boden allgemein anerkannter Fakten und Forschung. Against Fake News, against populism, against despotism, against fashism. Gegen Fakenews, gegen Populismus, gegen Despotismus, gegen Faschismus.

Special Add-On 4 German speaking people: Mit dem Erwerb eines Bandes NEUE UNIVERSUM (aktueller Band 120) im Buchhandel oder eines Bandes bzw. weiterer Produkte über deren Online-Shop unterstützen Sie deren Relaunch sowie diese Mastodon-Instanz -und erhalten als Gegenleistung ein hoch informatives und bleibend wertvolles Sammlerstück !

Description:
Welcome to the Dragon's Cave!

The Dragon's cave is a small dragon-themed community of mostly visually impaired folks. Everyone is welcome, however, as long as they are a kind and friendly person. You can expect posts about accessibility, development, gaming, privacy, and other technology related topics, but also food, music, poetry, short stories, and other things of interest.

Are you curious about why you should join this instance over all the others out there? Here are some of the things we offer:

  • A cool domain name (at least if you like dragons, but who doesn't?)
  • Roars, rather than posts, to fit the draconic theme.
  • A small and pleasant local community — with an option of local-only posting if you're feeling shy — as well as plenty of friends awaiting you in the vast Fediverse outside of it.
  • Four mostly-benevolent staff members who regularly check and respond to reports, questions, and requests.
  • A larger character limit, 3000 instead of 500, so you will always have enough space to express your opinions clearly.
  • A few useful features added by the Mastodon fork Glitch, such as the aforementioned local-only posting and bigger character limit and better formatting of posts from other software in the Fediverse.
  • A small collection of custom emojis, which we'll gladly expand upon request.

If this has convinced you, please familiarize yourself with our etiquette and then send us an application! Since we receive a large volume of spam signups, we would appreciate if you told us a little about yourself and why you wish to join. Remember to include the confirmation password that proves you have read the rules, which you can find below them.

The Dragon's Cave Etiquette

We want this instance to be a welcoming and comfortable space -- idealy for everyone, but most of all for those who are marginalised and cannot as easily find one elsewhere. To achieve this, keep the following five rules in mind. As it would be impossible to include everything, consider them a basic moral framework, which the administrators will use to act upon each individual issue in good faith. However, if you already have the urge to test the limits of these rules, or disagree with some or all of them, this instance is not for you.

1. Be Decent

Do not harass, insult, or otherwise intentionally harm other users of any kind, local or federated. Do not discriminate against people based on any of the various things that make humanity so beautiful and diverse, including but not limited to: age, appearance, body shape and size, disability, ethnicity, gender, nationality, race, religion or lack thereof, sexual orientation, etc.

This instance is not the place to debate the existence of so-called reverse racism, or to respond to systemic critiques with the "not all X" defense.

Do not deliberately spread misinformation, including pseudoscience and conspiracy theories. Given the dangers of the current situation we find ourselves in, COVID-19 related misinformation will be dealt with especially strictly; do not post or boost any misinformation minimizing the virus's impact, accusing the medical community or affected people of lying, or discouraging social distancing, vaccinations, and the wearing of masks.

2. Be Sentient

Avoid creating advertising or bot accounts on this instance without permission. There may be exceptions, but it is best to consult with the administrators before going ahead. Please consider instead joining one of the specialized instances for bot accounts, which are a better place for your account's visibility and discoverability, as well as the health of our instance's timelines and federation.

3. Be Active

Cross posting (using software to post the same content on multiple social media services) is only allowed if you regularly check your account here and interact with notifications. Please set cross posts to Unlisted or stricter. Do not crosspost content from other people, such as retweets, unless you have their consent to share it on other platforms.

4. Be Lawful

Do not post or link to content that could get us hit with a violation of copyright. Only post personally identifiable information if you have explicit permission to do so. In general, if you are not sure whether or not to share something, it is likely you should not. Keep in mind that this instance is hosted in Germany and thus abides by its laws.

Please post any sexual content as Unlisted or stricter, and make sure to add an appropriate content warning. If you regularly find yourself wanting to post content of sexual nature, this may not be the best instance for you. Do not post any sexualized depictions of animals, minors, or sexual assault, regardless of whether they are real or fictional.

5. Be Mindful

Politics, Religion, and other controversial topics should be posted behind a content warning. Be mindful of people you interact with, as they may have had experiences drastically different from yours, including severe psychological or physical trauma. Content warnings are no inconvenience for you as a user, and will provide a much higher well being for individuals that might want to read your content, but prefer not to get involved in those topics due to various reasons.

What SHOULD contain a CW?: AI content, alcohol or drugs (especially when talking about extreme entoxication or disparaging sobriety), anything of a sexual nature (this should also be Unlisted or stricter), covid-19, physical and mental health, recounting violent or alarming encounters, religion, trauma, war.

Things that are considerate to CW: Eye contact (For images), food, family, long threads, talking about other social media, trending topics, unusual things for you to post about.

Please try to describe your media posts to the best of your ability to accommodate disabilities such as blindness and deafness. If you cannot do so, there is nothing wrong with asking for help. Currently, tagging @ImageCaptionsPls@a.gup.pe is the best way to do so.

The Confirmation Password

You have reached the end of our etiquette. Thank you for your diligence! The password you should add to your application is: confelicity. We chose it because it is a sadly uncommon word, meaning "pleasure in another's happiness."

Instance Administration

Dragon's Cave is currently moderated by four people: Talon, Mayana, Fireborn and Quin. We do our best to take care of the instance, but we are just volunteers, and only human. If you come upon any objectionable content, please report it, and we will respond as soon as possible. Additionally, feel free to reach out to us if you would like us to change something about the rules above, the instance moderation actions below, or anything else related to the instance.

If possible, please mention the administration account and not our personal accounts.

Donations

This server is run by volunteers. If you'd like to help keep it running, feel free to donate on Ko-Fi

We are currently looking into setting up a recurring donation service. Once we have one, it will show up here.

Operating costs

Here is a list of all the monthly and yearly expenses to run the Dragon's Cave.

  • Server: 42 euro/month
  • Email: 36 euro/month
  • Media storage: about 5 to 6 euro/month
  • Domain: about 17-18 euro/year
  • Total: About 85 euros and 30 cents/month

These costs are subject to change depending on the scale of the instance.

Emoji Credits And Descriptions

Most of the custom emoji on this instance are from Mutant Standard, and are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License. All the Mutant Standard emoji are gender-neutral.

Some of the dragon emoji were drawn by Chr@scalie.business and are provided under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License. They are cute, sweet minimalist flat style emojis of yellow, western-styled dragon heads. You can read the descriptions of individual emojis on Chr's Github.

The rest of the dragon emoji are from Volpeon and can be found here.

The eyeless smileys -- descriptions here -- were kindly gifted by LJWrites@rage.love. The eyeless blobcats were made by Pixouls@post.lurk.org; they can be downloaded on their Github.

The calculator dragon emoji's were done by @StoryDragon.

Lastly, the interaction permit/refusal emoji (at, boost and favorite OK and no), as well as the local_only emoji, which makes it possible to post locally even on clients that otherwise don't support it, were made by Pfx.rage.love. You can find their descriptions in these toots.

Description:
Über diese Instanz

Impressum - Kontakt zu den Verantwortlichen

Betreiber des Dienstes

Spenden

Olaf John

Hauptstraße 8

63762 Großostheim

Mastodon: @olaf@mastodon.bachgau.social

E-Mail: mail@bachgau.social

Backup-Administrator

Tine Siefken

Mastodon: @tine@mastodon.bachgau.social

Motivation

Wir möchten eine datenschutzfreundliche Alternative zu den gängigen kommerziellen Diensten anbieten.

Dieser Server steht im Bachgau, einer Region im bayrischen Untermain, zwischen Aschaffenburg und Frankfurt.

Wir möchten alle Menschen, Vereinen und Institutionen sowie Behörden, aus dem Bachgau, dem Stadt und Landkreis Aschaffenburg und darüber hinaus einladen, ein Teil unserer Gemeinschaft zu werden. Wir bieten eine schnelle und offene Kommunikationsplattform im Fediverse, abseits der kommerziellen Datenkraken. So wie unserer Knoten ist das ganze Fediverse werbefrei, frei von Tracking und respektiert Eure Privatsphäre.

Einstellen des Dienstes

Wir investieren Zeit in unserer Freizeit und Geld, um den Server in Betrieb zu halten.

Daher ist es nicht ausgeschlossen, dass wir den Betrieb eventuell irgendwann einstellen.

Allerdings unterrichten wir 3 Monate vor Einstellung des Dienstes alle Benutzer, damit diese ihre Daten sichern können und ggf. auf einen anderen Server umziehen können.

Technische Details

Diese Instanz von Mastodon bietet die folgenden technischen Features:

  • Regelmäßige, automatische und verschlüsselte Backups
  • Automatische Sicherheitsupdates
  • Standort der Server ist Deutschland, Landkreis Aschaffenburg, Bachgau

Teilnahme an Relais

Alle Nachrichten (Toots), die öffentlich markiert sind und auf der lokalen Zeitleiste erscheinen, werden zusätzlich an ein Relais übergeben und somit in den lokalen Zeitleisten auf teilnehmenden Instanzen eingeblendet.

Unterstützung

Gerne kannst du uns unterstützen, das geht zum einen über freiwillige Mitarbeit (Server Wartung, Moderation, Hilfestellung)

Spenden

Kaffeespender
Short: Das soziale Netzwerk, für den Bachgau und den bayrischen Untermain. Willkommen sind alle aus der Region und darüber hinaus. Werdet ein Teil unserer Gemeinschaft, seid Willkommen!

Description:
MANIFESTO DI PUNTARELLA.PARTY

COSA

Puntarella.party è un social network indipendente, libero da logiche di profitto, non regolato da nessun algoritmo, antifascista, antirazzista e antisessista, basato a Roma. Più precisamente è un nodo (istanza) di una rete di centinaia di altri server indipendenti in tutto il mondo (Fediverso) e che adotta un software di microblogging (che vuol dire?): Mastodon. Come funziona Mastodon? C'è un'ottima guida su mastodon.help. C'è da aggiungere solo che da noi un post (toot) può essere lungo fino a 840 caratteri.

CHI

Il collettivo di gestione di Puntarella.Party nasce dall'incontro tra alcunə utenti abitanti tra Roma e il Lazio e attivə da tempo all'istanza Mastodon bolognese, mastodon.bida.im, e dalla decisione di provare a riprodurre un'esperienza simile nel territorio romano. Lə compagnə di Bida, pionierə del fediverso italofono, hanno sempre invitato a dare vita a istanze locali: raccogliamo la sfida, come già avvenuto a Milano (nebbia.fail) e Torino (mastodon.cisti.org). Il collettivo si fonda su meccanismi di fiducia e di conoscenza diretta e non solo virtuale; ha l'onere del mantenimento dell'infrastruttura tecnica e della moderazione dei contenuti secondo la policy

PER CHI

Puntarella.party si rivolge a tutte e tutti coloro che ambiscono alla trasformazione dell'esistente in direzione di una piena giustizia sociale, agli spazi sociali, ai collettivi, alle esperienze di attivismo, per offirire uno strumento di informazione, confronto, discussione alternativo alle grandi piattaforme commerciali. Per iscriversi all'istanza è necessario l'invio di qualche breve riga di presentazione.

COME

Le interazioni sull'istanza sono regolate da una policy, la cui prima stesura è stata decisa dal collettivo sulla base della visione della realtà condivisa tra ə suə componenti e sulla base dell'esperienza pregressa sulle istanze Mastodon italofone. La policy può essere emendata tramite applicazione del metodo del consenso da assemblee di istanza da tenersi in presenza e che (appena sarà possibile) verranno convocate con regolarità. Oltre a seguire le indicazioni della policy perché l'esperimento funzioni e sia durevole è indispensabile che ogni utente si impegni a interagire in modo costruttivo, rispettoso, non competitivo, a non fare dell'istanza uno sfogatoio di dissidi nati al suo esterno. La qualità delle interazioni all'interno di una comunità del fediverso, per quanto finora osservato, dipende molto più dalla capacità che essa ha di autodeterminarsi che dal disegno della piattaforma su cui queste interazioni hanno luogo: per questo Puntarella.Party non adotterà la prassi di orientare il comportamento dell'utenza intervenendo tecnicamente sul software, limitandone o eliminandone funzioni. La priorità è la diffusione di contenuti di informazione e di analisi, ma un social network ha anche bisogno della sua quota di frivolezze e gattini.

Roma, aprile 2021
Collettivo Puntarella

LA POLICY: COSA SI PUÒ FARE, COSA NO

1. COSA NON SI PUÒ PUBBLICARE

  • contenuti razzisti, sessisti, omotransfobici, fascisti, discriminatori, militaristi
  • messaggi di propaganda elettorale e di partito, istituzionale, e nazionalista. Non saranno accettati account di partiti politici; non è escluso a priori che un account personale possa pubblicizzare iniziative, manifestazioni o analisi riconducibili a partiti politici, ci si appella all'autoregolamentazione dei singoli; nei due mesi precedenti un appuntamento elettorale la moderazione potrebbe essere più stringente
  • messaggi finalizzati esclusivamente alla promozione di attività commerciali
  • minacce, insulti, messaggi denigratori nei confronti di altrə utente del fediverso
  • link diretti a social network commerciali (facebook, instagram, twitter, tiktok); nessun divieto, invece, per telegram, reddit e piattaforme di streaming audio e video
  • contenuti negazionisti di fatti storicamente o scientificamente accertati, teorie di acclarata natura cospirazionista. Salvo casi estremi si tenderà a privilegiare il confronto alla moderazione, da esercitare con elasticità
  • contenuti che invitino a commettere fatti di sangue o ne costituiscano celebrazione
  • dati personali e sensibili. In particolare non è ammesso rivelare l'identità dellə altrə utenti

Il collettivo si riserva comunque di chiedere la rimozione o rimuovere direttamente qualsiasi contenuto possa essere lesivo per il collettivo stesso o per lə altrə utenti

1.b COSA METTERE SOTTO "CONTENT WARNING"

(cosa vuol dire?)

  • nudo, erotismo, pornografia (usare anche #nsfw - cos'è?)
  • immagini di violenza
  • contenuti splatter / gore
  • contenuti che altri utenti hanno già segnalato come fonte di disagio

2. SOFFERENZA PSICOLOGICA

Qualora sull'istanza unə utente esprimano situazioni di sofferenza psicologica e/o possibili azioni auto/etero lesive e/o suicidarie, la comunità si impegna ad interagire con l'utente, attivando risposte di ascolto e/o sostegno, cercando di individuare/attivare account amicə o possibili conoscenti e/o reti di mutuo aiuto sul territorio qualora la posizione dell'utente sia nota alla comunità."

3. INTIMITÀ VIOLATE

Nel caso di contenuti #nsfw a sfondo erotico/sessuale di provenienza dubbia, gli/le admin possono chiedere di contestualizzare l'origine di tali contenuti. Con "provenienza dubbia" intendiamo casi in cui non sia chiaro il consenso delle persone ritratte, cioè possibili casi di revenge porn, intimitá violate etc. Gli utenti che postano questo tipo di contenuti sono immediatamente silenziati fino all'avvenuto chiarimento.

4. BOT

Chi gestisce un bot (account gestito da un software) dovrà inserire nel profilo del bot un account mastodon reperibile a cui contattarlo, o quantomeno rispondere tramite il bot stesso. Diversamente, gli/le admin si riservano di cancellare il bot. Tutti i punti del manifesto si applicano anche ai bot. I bot automatici (per esempio: bot di gif, di giochi di parole, di emoji...) possono postare una volta ogni 5 ore. I bot collegati a feed rss/atom possono pubblicare indicativamente fino a 10 toot al giorno. Resta possibile concordare una frequenza diversa per bot che non pubblicano sulla timeline locale (contattare gli/le admin per richieste specifiche).

5. FLOOD

Non si puó intasare la timeline locale con toot ripetuti e/o in stretta successione (cosiddetto "flood"). Non ci sono limiti specifici per gli account "umani", gli/le admin valutano le segnalazioni della comunità. Il live-tooting di manifestazioni, assemblee, iniziative sociali autogestite non è mai considerato flood.

6. LINGUE

Lingue accettate:

  • italiano
  • inglese
  • spagnolo
  • francese
  • polacco
    • per ragioni di moderazione

    7. DATI

    I contenuti di questa istanza non possono essere usati per fini di ricerca o machine learning senza l'esplicito consenso degli utenti coinvolti I contenuti di istanza non possono essere archiviati o indicizzati in blocco da nessun utente o servizio. Gli utenti attivi possono esportare la loro lista di follower e il contenuto dei propri post tramite l'interfaccia web.

    PUNTARELLA.PARTY'S MANIFESTO

    WHAT

    Puntarella.party is an independent social network, free from profit logic, not regulated by any algorithm, anti-fascist, anti-racist and anti-sexist, based in Rome. More precisely, it is a node (instance) of a network of hundreds of other independent servers around the world (Fediverse) and it adopts a microblogging software (what does that mean?): Mastodon. How does Mastodon work? There is an excellent guide on (an excellent guide is available at) mastodon.help. We only need to add that here a post (toot) can be up to 840 characters long.

    WHO

    The collective managing Puntarella.Party was born when some Mastodon users living between Rome and Lazio and active in the Bologna Mastodon instance - mastodon.bida.im - met in person, and decided to try to reproduce a similar experience in the Roman territory. The comrades from Bida, pioneers of the italophone Fediverse, have always called for the creation of local instances: we took up the challenge, as it has already happened in Milan (nebbia.fail) and Turin (mastodon.cisti.org). The collective is based on mechanisms of trust and in real life meetings, not just virtual; it is responsible for maintaining the technical infrastructure and moderating the content according to the policy

    FOR WHOM

    Puntarella.party is a place for all those who aspire to the transformation of the existing in the direction of full social justice, for social spaces, collectives, activist experiences, in order to offer a tool for information, confrontation, discussion, as an alternative to big commercial platforms. To sign up to the instance, please send a few lines of presentation.

    HOW TO

    Interactions on the instance are regulated by a policy, the first draft of which was decided by the collective on the basis of a vision of reality shared by its members and on the basis of previous experiences on the Italian-speaking Mastodon instances. The policy can be amended through the application of consensus decision-making by (an instance assembly) instance assemblies to be held in person and which (as soon as possible) will be convened on a regular basis. In addition to following the indications of the policy, in order for the experiment to work and be long-lasting, it is crucial that each user undertakes to interact in a constructive, respectful, non-competitive manner, and not to make the instance a venting ground for disagreements originating outside it. The quality of interactions within a community of the fediverse, as far as has been observed up to now, depends much more on its capacity to self-determine itself than on the design of the platform on which these interactions take place: this is why Puntarella.Party will not adopt the practice of directing user behaviour by technically intervening in the software, limiting or eliminating functions. The priority is the dissemination of information and analysis, but a social network also needs its share of frivolities and kittens.

    THE POLICY: WHAT YOU CAN DO, WHAT YOU CANNOT DO

    1. WHAT YOU CANNOT PUBLISH

  • racist, sexist, homophobic, fascist, discriminatory, militarist content

  • electoral, party, institutional, and nationalist propaganda messages. Political party accounts will not be accepted; we do not exclude that a private account may publicise initiatives, events or analyses that can be traced back to political parties, we appeal to the self-regulation of individuals; in the two months preceding an election, moderation may be more stringent

  • messages aimed exclusively at promoting commercial activities

  • threats, insults, disparaging messages towards other users of the fediverse

  • direct links to commercial social networks (facebook, instagram, twitter, tiktok); no ban, however, for telegram, reddit and audio and video streaming platforms

  • content denying historically or scientifically established facts, conspiracy theories. Except in extreme cases, there will be a tendency to favour confrontation over moderation, to be exercised with flexibility

  • content that invites or celebrates acts of bloodshed

  • private and sensitive data. In particular, revealing the identity of other users is not permitted

    • The collective reserves the right to request the removal or directly remove any content that may be harmful to the collective itself or to other users.

    1.b WHAT TO PUT UNDER "CONTENT WARNING" (what does it mean?)

  • nudity, eroticism, pornography (use #nsfw - what is that?)

  • images of violence

  • splatter / gore content

  • content that other users have already reported as causing discomfort

    • 2. PSYCHOLOGICAL DISTRESS

    In the event that a user expresses situations of psychological suffering and/or possible self-/other-injury and/or suicidal intents, the community undertakes the responsibility to interact with the user, activating listening and/or support responses, trying to identify/activate friends' accounts or possible acquaintances and/or mutual aid networks in the area if the user's position is known to the community.

    3. VIOLATED INTIMACY

    In the case of erotic/sexual #nsfw content of dubious provenance, admins may ask you to contextualise the origin of such content. By 'dubious provenance' we mean cases where the consent of the persons depicted is unclear, i.e. possible cases of revenge porn, violated intimacy etc. Users who post this type of content are immediately silenced until clarification is provided.

    4. BOT

    Whoever operates a bot (account managed by a software) shall include in the bot's profile a reachable Mastodon account to which they can be contacted, or at least reply via the bot itself. Otherwise, the admins reserve the right to delete the bot. All points in the manifesto also apply to bots. Automatic bots (e.g. gif bots, pun bots, emoji bots...) may post once every 5 hours. Bots linked to rss/atom feeds can post up to 10 toots per day, approximately. It remains possible to agree on a different frequency for bots that do not publish on the local timeline (contact admins for specific requests).

    5. FLOODING

    You cannot clog the local timeline with repeated toots and/or in close succession (so-called 'flooding'). There are no specific limits for 'human' accounts, the admins assess the reports of the community. Live-tooting of events, assemblies, self-managed social initiatives is never considered flooding.

    6. LANGUAGES

    Accepted languages:

  • Italian

  • English

  • Spanish

  • French

  • Polish

    • for moderation reasons

    7. DATA

    Instance content may not be used for research or machine learning purposes without the explicit consent of the users involved. Instance content may not be archived or indexed in bulk by any user or service. Active users can export their list of followers and the content of their posts via the web interface.
Short: a/social indipendente di Roma

Description:
A general failure to follow the guidelines ("Server rules") section on the about page will, depending on the severity, lead to the removal of your posts or your account.

Welcome to CatCatNya~! We are an instance hoping to foster a diverse queer community's presence in the Fediverse, which includes, but is absolutely not limited to:

  • cats
  • queerness
  • plurality
  • disability
  • anti-racism

We are mainly speaking English and German, but other languages are also welcome.

Basically, the only things we exclude is fascists and tankies. We do not like those. Authoritarianism is garbage because it is detrimental to what's mentioned above. Yes, even cats. Have you ever seen a cat like authority?

Unfortunately, some authority is required to do moderation and even to host an instance to begin with.

We are meowderated by:

  • @kescher - Foundnya, Hostnya, Nyadmin and Meowderator
  • @sk - Nyadmin and Meowderator

We have additional subdomains for multi-account access in separate browser tabs:

  • 0.catcatnya.com
  • 1.catcatnya.com
  • 2.catcatnya.com
  • 3.catcatnya.com
  • 4.catcatnya.com
  • 5.catcatnya.com
  • 6.catcatnya.com
  • 7.catcatnya.com
  • 8.catcatnya.com
  • 9.catcatnya.com

We offer SSO integration with some services: - git.kescher.at, a Forgejo instance - git.gay, another Forgejo instance

Federation policy

CatCatNya~ will generally freely federate, however, meowderation is strict. Defederation will occur if harassment occurs, fash/tankies are on the overwhelming majority on an instance, an instance being "free speech", or if an instance is otherwise deemed an immediate danger to users on CatCatNya~. If an instance does not pose an active threat to its users, but is deemed unmeowderated, it will likely result in a limit. Actions done by remote nyadmins/meowderators are weighed more heavily than individual users.

If your instance uses the UFoI, it will likely be suspended, since the very nature of the UFoI is a malicious pact founded by the admin of qoto.org to stop folks from defederating from them.

If your instance welcomes cops, it will at the very least be limited, but we may suspend.

While our set of guidelines already states that anything illegal in Austria will be blocked, we feel it is neccessary to highlight that we suspend any instances promoting child sex abuse ("MAPs" and other euphemisms for pedophilia) and zoophilia once we notice them.

If your instance runs a really old version of a Fedi software and it causes processing issues at our end, your instance may be suspended simply because you don't keep your software up-to-date at all. You shouldn't be running Mastodon 2.5.2 anymore. No, 2.7.0 is also not going to cut it.

Other info

We are running our own fork of glitch-soc, which is also a fork of Mastodon. For more info about glitch-soc, see the glitch-soc webpage. For more info about our own fork see this git repository.

In response to the poor performance of big instances like mastodon.social and mastodon.online, we are implementing the following simple policy: Once we reach around 200 monthly active users, we will disable registrations. We are strongly opposed to the existence of big instances of software for a decentralized protocol.

This instance is hosted on the same machine as an Arch mirror. Therefore, the network performance on this instance may vary. This should not be a real issue, considering these server specs:

  • 14 dedicated cores of an AMD EPYC™ 7702 CPU
  • 64 GiB of DDR4 ECC RAM
  • Storage:
    • 2 TiB of NVMe storage
    • Continually scaled, remote, encrypted media storage, partially cached on NVMe above
  • Hosted in Vienna, Austria
  • Network bandwidth of 2.5 Gbps, symmetric
  • Running on , btw
  • Hourly encrypted backups to a large backup host

Donate to our moderation team:

Donation links for hosting this instance, more info about the Ownya and more at kescher.at.

  • Blobhaj by Heatherhorns, Version December 13th 2023
  • Queer Butterfly Emojis + More Pride Butterflies! by FrazzledBrynn

  • Neocat by Volpeon, Version 1.1

Note that preferring a marginalized group over a less- or non-marginalized group is explicitly done to counteract discrimination, and, as such, is not discrimination on its own.'}, {'id': '3', 'text': "If it's illegal in Austria, don't post it.", 'hint': "We want this site to stay online, and as such, we have to follow applicable laws. Description:
Encuentra más servicios Chilemasto en Home

Staff

Admin: @skrlet13@chilemasto.casa

Mod: @muertasflores@chilemasto.casa

@dinomug@chilemasto.casa Propinas para dinomug

Ayuda a mantener el server aquí

Chilemasto busca ser una instancia acogedora para gente chilena, pero gente de cualquier nacionalidad puede unirse. Se busca ser un espacio más sano y agradable que la de las redes sociales mainstream.

Código de conducta

(Basado en Community Covenant by Coraline Ada Ehmk. Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/). Based on a work at http://community-covenant.net/.)

Nuestra meta

Esta comunidad está dedicada a proporcionar una experiencia libre de acoso para todes. No toleramos el acoso de les participantes de ninguna forma.

Aplicabilidad y Alcance

Este código de conducta se aplica a todos los espacios de esta comunidad, incluidos los canales públicos, los canales privados y los mensajes directos, tanto en línea como fuera de ella. Cualquier persona que viole este código de conducta puede ser sancionada o expulsada de estos espacios a discreción de les administradores y/o moderadores.

Hacia un entorno acogedor y seguro

Esperamos crear un entorno en el que diversas personas puedan colaborar e interactuar de manera positiva y afirmativa. Los ejemplos de comportamiento que contribuyen a crear este tipo de entorno incluyen:

  • Uso de lenguaje acogedor e inclusivo
  • Ser respetuoso de los diferentes puntos de vista y experiencias.
  • Aceptando con gracia la crítica constructiva
  • Centrarse en lo que es mejor para la comunidad en general
  • Mostrar empatía hacia otros miembros de la comunidad.

Declaración contra el acoso

Esta comunidad no tolerará el acoso de ningún tipo. Los ejemplos de acoso incluyen:

  • Comentarios ofensivos relacionados con género, identidad y expresión de género, orientación sexual, discapacidad, enfermedades mentales o físicas, neuro(a)tipicidad, apariencia física, estado de embarazo, estado de veterano, afiliación política, estado civil, tamaño corporal, edad, raza, origen nacional , origen étnico, nacionalidad, estatus migratorio, idioma, religión o falta de ella, u otro marcador de identidad. Esto incluye racismo anti-indígena y anti-negritud.
  • Comentarios no deseados con respecto a las elecciones y prácticas de estilo de vida de una persona, incluidos los relacionados con la alimentación, la salud, la crianza de los hijos, las relaciones, las drogas y el empleo.
  • Misgendering deliberado, es decir, uso de pronombres inapropiados o uso de nombres "muertos" o rechazados.
  • Imágenes o comportamientos sexuales gratuitos o fuera de tema en espacios donde no son apropiados.
  • Contacto físico y contacto físico simulado sin consentimiento o después de una solicitud de suspensión de la actitud.
  • Amenazas de violencia.
  • La incitación a la violencia hacia cualquier individuo o grupo, incluso alentar a una persona a suicidarse o a autolesionarse.
  • Intimidación deliberada.
  • Acecho o seguimiento (stalking): en línea o en el mundo físico.
  • Atención sexual no deseada, sin consentimiento.
  • Patrones de contacto social inapropiado, como solicitar / asumir niveles inapropiados de intimidad con otros.
  • Comunicación continua uno a uno después de las solicitudes de parar.
  • "Sacar del closet" deliberadamente cualquier aspecto de la identidad de una persona sin su consentimiento, excepto cuando sea necesario para proteger a las personas vulnerables del abuso intencional.
  • Publicación de comunicación privada sin acoso.
  • Los chistes que se asemejan a lo anterior, como el "racismo irónico", todavía cuentan como acoso, incluso si son satíricos o irónicos.

Si tiene preguntas o inquietudes sobre estos temas, no dude en enviar un mensaje a un administrador o solicitar la oportunidad de explorar el problema con un moderador y voluntarios.

Informes

Si un miembro de nuestra comunidad lo está acosando, observe que alguien más está siendo acosado o tiene alguna otra inquietud, comuníquese con los administradores a través de mensaje privado. Si la persona que lo acosa está en el equipo administrativo, no estará involucrada en el manejo o la resolución del incidente.

El equipo de administración responderá a cualquier queja tan pronto como sea posible. Si no recibe una respuesta oportuna (por ejemplo, si actualmente no hay administradores en línea), primero ponga su seguridad personal y su bienestar, y considere cerrar sesión.

Este código de conducta se aplica a los espacios de nuestra comunidad, pero si un miembro de nuestra comunidad le está acosando fuera de nuestros espacios, aún queremos saberlo. Tomaremos en serio todos los informes de buena fe de acoso por parte de nuestros miembros, especialmente por parte de les administradores. Esto incluye el acoso fuera de nuestros espacios y el acoso que tuvo lugar en cualquier momento. El equipo de abuso se reserva el derecho de excluir a las personas de la comunidad en función de su comportamiento pasado, incluido el comportamiento fuera de nuestros espacios y el comportamiento hacia las personas que no están en esta comunidad.

Para proteger a los voluntarios del abuso y el agotamiento, nos reservamos el derecho de rechazar cualquier informe que creamos que se haya hecho de mala fe. Los informes destinados a silenciar las críticas legítimas pueden eliminarse sin respuesta.

Proceso

Cada informe de violación del código de conducta será tratado con seriedad y cuidado. Si la seguridad inmediata de un miembro se ve amenazada, une administradore individual puede tomar cualquier acción que considere apropiada, incluida la prohibición temporal del acceso para le infractore de la comunidad. En situaciones menos urgentes, al menos une administradore dará una respuesta adecuada, que se compartirá con le infractore en privado. Cualquiera sea la resolución que decidan, la decisión de les administradores involucrados en un caso de violación del código se considerará final.

Respetaremos las solicitudes de confidencialidad con el fin de proteger a las víctimas de abuso. A nuestro criterio, podemos nombrar públicamente a una persona sobre la cual hemos recibido quejas de acoso, o advertir en privado a terceros sobre ellas, si creemos que hacerlo aumentará la seguridad de nuestros miembros o del público en general. No nombraremos víctimas de acoso sin su consentimiento.

Consecuencias

Se espera que los participantes a les que se le soliciten detener cualquier comportamiento de acoso lo cumplan de inmediato. Si un participante se involucra en un comportamiento de acoso, los administradores pueden tomar cualquier acción que consideren apropiada, incluida la expulsión de la comunidad e identificación del participante como acosador para otros miembros. A discreción de los administradores, o por solicitud, una o más de las partes involucradas pueden solicitar discutir la violación y cómo evitar situaciones similares en el futuro.

Reglas adicionales

  • Les usuaries deben ser mayores de 18 años.
  • Los bots están permitidos, mientras el contenido que publiquen no este federado, para evitar spam en las líneas federadas.
  • Las cuentas dedicadas solo a hacer publicidad no están permitidas
  • El contenido NSFW (Not Safe for Work) está permitido, pero sólo bajo un aviso de contenido (CW).
  • Está prohibida la discriminación a gente respecto a su género, identidad y expresión de género, orientación sexual, discapacidad, enfermedades mentales o físicas, neuro(a)tipicidad, apariencia física, estado de embarazo, estado de veterano, afiliación política, estado civil, tamaño corporal, edad, raza, origen nacional , origen étnico, nacionalidad, estatus migratorio, idioma, religión o falta de ella, u otro marcador de identidad. Esto incluye racismo anti-indígena y anti-negritud. Básicamente, no se permite ser opresivo con la gente marginalizada.
  • No se permite apología al fascismo ni nazismo.
  • No se permite contenido pedófilo,necrófilo ni zoofilo, ni siquiera ficticio.
  • No se permite el contenido ilegal en Chile. Esta instancia evita otras instancias que no cumplan el código de conducta mediante bloqueos.
  • No se permiten links en las publicaciones o incrustados en multimedia a sitios potencialmente peligrosos para les usuaries, ya sea por contenido opresivo, spam, virus, etc. Si se busca denunciar una situación en que estos links son relevantes, por favor sea muy explícite en la crítica y especifique todas las advertencias necesarias para evitar la propagación de ese tipo de contenido.

Credits

This instance uses Mutant Standard emoji, which are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

Chicks emojis by Elena Pollastri. This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License Source

Description:
Fnordon

Eine Mastdon-Instanz für Freund:innen des Fnord.

Verantwortlich

Thomas Renger
Bebelstraße 36
70193 Stuttgart
Tel: (+49)711/4111970
Mobil: (+49)151/17270692
eMail: dentaku@wazong.de

Disclaimer

Es handelt sich um ein Hobbyprojekt, das ich im Moment komplett aus eigener Tasche finanziere. Ich kann daher keine Garantie über eine aktuelle oder zukünfige Nützlichkeit oder Erreichbarkeit des Dienstes abgeben. Ich verspreche aber, im Rahmen meiner Möglichkeiten das Mastodon-Serverabkommen einzuhalten.

Sprache

Der Dienst richtet sich hauptsächlich an Benutzer:innen aus dem Deutschen Sprachraum, alle Erklärtexte sind nur auf Deutsch vorhanden. Das bedeutet natürlich nicht, dass nicht in anderen Sprachen geschrieben werden darf und erst recht nicht, dass nicht Accounts gefolgt werden dürfen, die in anderen Sprachen schreiben. Aber ich spreche selbst nur Deutsch und Englisch, bei anderen Sprachen bin ich mit der Moderation überfordert.

Über die Regeln

Die Serverregeln sind bewusst kurz gehalten, eine ausführlichere Version mit Erläuterungen befindet sich hier. Sollten die Regeln sich als unzureichend oder unklar erweisen, behalte ich mir vor, sie zu ergänzen oder zu präzisieren.

Über Über

An dieser "Über"-Seite und den anderen Metatexten rund um Fnordon kann im git-Repository mitgearbeitet werden.

Description:
Overview

The Tabletop.VIP Community is dedicated to providing a harassment-free experience for everyone. We do not tolerate harassment of participants in any form. The rules within this document directly apply to all spaces managed by Tabletop.VIP.

Our main goal is to grow and sustain the community in a way that handles and learns from issues rather than ignores them or considers them ‘a one off’. We want people to take responsibility for their actions and learn from them, rather immediately resorting to punishment.

Code of conduct

This code of conduct applies to all Tabletop.VIP forums and online spaces.  Anyone who violates this code of conduct may be sanctioned or expelled from these spaces at the discretion of the Moderators. Participants are responsible for knowing and abiding by these rules.

Prohibited actions include:

  • Any language used in an abusive manner towards another community member.
  • Offensive comments related to gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, mental illness, neuro(a)typicality, physical appearance, body size, age, race, or religion.
  • Unwelcome comments regarding a person’s lifestyle choices and practices, including those related to drugs, employment, food, health, parenting, and religion.
  • Deliberate misgendering or use of rejected names.
  • Gratuitous or off-topic sexual images or behavior in spaces where they are not appropriate.
  • Physical contact and simulated physical contact (eg, textual descriptions like “hug” or “backrub”) without consent or after a request to stop.
  • Threats of violence.
  • Incitement of violence towards any individual, including encouraging a person to commit suicide or to engage in self-harm.
  • Deliberate intimidation.
  • Stalking or following.
  • Harassing photography or recording, including logging online activity for harassment purposes.
  • Sustained disruption of discussion.
  • Unwelcome sexual attention.
  • Pattern of inappropriate social contact, such as requesting/assuming inappropriate levels of intimacy with others
  • Continued one-on-one communication after requests to cease.
  • Deliberate “outing” of any aspect of a person’s identity without their consent except as necessary to protect vulnerable people from intentional abuse.
  • Publication of non-harassing private communication.
  • Disparagement humor, which makes a punchline of the marginalized.
  • Any continuation of a joke after a request to stop.

Moderators

A Moderators will exist to moderate community spaces and events, promote social engagement, and help support members of Tabletop.VIP in dealing with matters related to the code of conduct. The team will have the power to enforce rules within spaces managed by Tabletop.VIP.

Reporting

If a member of the Tabletop.VIP Community is harassing you, you notice that someone else is being harassed, or have any other concerns, please contact the Moderators.  If the person who is harassing you is on the team, they will recuse themselves from handling your incident. We will respond as promptly as we can.

This code of conduct applies to Tabletop.VIP Community spaces, but if a member of the Tabletop.VIP Community outside our spaces is harassing you, we still want to know about it. We will take all good-faith reports of harassment by Tabletop.VIP Community members seriously. This includes harassment outside our spaces and harassment that took place at any point in time. The Moderators reserves the right to exclude people from the Tabletop.VIP Community based on their past behavior, including behaviour outside Tabletop.VIP Community spaces and behavior towards people who are not in the Tabletop.VIP Community.

Tabletop.VIP Moderators members are not above the rules within this document.  Any complaints against members will be reviewed in the same manner as any other report, and subject to the same moderation rules plus any subsequent rules defined within their own team.

In order to protect volunteers from abuse and burnout, we reserve the right to reject any report we believe to have been made in bad faith. Reports intended to silence legitimate criticism may be deleted without response.

We will respect confidentiality requests for the purpose of protecting victims of abuse. At our discretion, we may publicly name a person about whom we have received harassment complaints, or privately warn third parties about them, if we believe that doing so will increase the safety of Tabletop.VIP Community members or the public. We will not name harassment victims without their affirmative consent.

Consequences

Participants asked to stop any harassing behavior are expected to comply immediately.

If a participant engages in harassing behavior, the Moderators may take any action they deem appropriate, up to and including expulsion from all Tabletop.VIP Community spaces and identification of the participant as a harasser to other Tabletop.VIP Community members or the public.

Blocked Instances

The block list for this server is based on those provided by Mastodon.Social, Toot.Cafe, Tabletop.Social and the BLOCKChain list.

Attribution

This anti-harassment policy is based on the example policy from the Geek Feminism wiki, created by the Geek Feminism community.

Donations

If you like to contribute to the ongoing server costs of Tabletop.VIP, please donate on Ko-Fi.

Current Management Structure

The Benevolent Dictator holds ultimate decision-making power, until the group is ready for a more inclusive structure.

  • Values: Servant leadership, singular vision, voluntarism
  • Membership: Participation is open to anyone who wants to join, but the Benevolent Dictator can remove participants at will.
  • Autocracy: The Benevolent Dictator has authority and can change the group's governance as necessary.
    • Delegation: The Benevolent Dictator can invite participants to help with managing the group.
    • Expiration: When the group is sufficiently mature, the Benevolent Dictator will establish a more inclusive structure.
    • Executive: The Benevolent Dictator is responsible for implementing—or delegating implementation of—policies and other decisions.
    • Lobbying: If participants are not happy with the Benevolent Dictator's leadership, they may voice their concerns or leave the group.
  • Friendship: Relationships among participants facilitate or inhibit governance processes.
  • Code of Conduct: Participants agree to abide by certain standards or face certain consequences.

Created By

Tabletop.VIP
Short: A growing Mastodon community for all things tabletop gaming related as well as other geekery at large.

Description:
While not an official Kubernetes server, we still strive to maintain the same high standards of conduct within our community.

The Kubernetes Community Code of Conduct applies to all interactions on this server.

Please report any and all violations of the code of conduct. Breaches of the CoC will result in an account ban.

Open Source Project and Corporate accounts are welcome on k8s.social, providing they follow the following additional rules:

  • The work must be strongly related to Kubernetes
  • The name of the account must match the official name of the project or company
  • The profile must include a verified link for the official website of the project or company

Note: 🤖 Bot accounts aren't accepted on this instance. It is recommended to use botsin.space for any bot accounts.

For instance announcements and news, please follow @Announcement@k8s.social
Short: Unofficial ⎈Kubernetes Mastodon instance for container and cloud native enthusiasts.

Description:
brandenburg.social ist eine dezentralisierte Alternative zum zentral verwalteten X, ehemals Twitter. Anders als dieses oder Threads oder Insta usw. hat nicht eine Firma die Kontrolle über das gesamte Netzwerk, sondern unzählige eigenständige Firmen, noch mehr aber Vereine und private Akteure. Kommerzielle Interessen werden dadurch ausgebremst, die Stabilität und der Datenschutz hingegen verbessert. brandenburg.social ist nur eine unter tausenden Instanzen weltweit, aus denen dieses Netzwerk besteht.

Diese Mastodon-Instanz wird ausschließlich auf Servern innerhalb der EU von der Berliner cepharum GmbH auf Grundlage ihrer Allgemeinen Geschäftsbedingungen für Hosting-Dienstleistungen bereitgestellt. Es gelten für die Benutzung die spezifischen Datenschutzbestimmungen für diesen Service sowie die Datenschutzbestimmungen der cepharum GmbH. Als Nutzer dieses Angebots werden Sie Kunden der cepharum GmbH im Sinne der vorstehenden Nutzungsbedingungen und Bestimmungen.

Das Angebot kann kostenfrei genutzt werden. Es steht der cepharum GmbH frei, das Angebot jederzeit und in beliebiger Weise anzupassen oder vollständig einzustellen. Es besteht kein Anspruch auf Fortführung des Dienstes ohne gesonderte schriftliche Vereinbarung mit der cepharum GmbH. Diese Freiheiten werden durch folgende Einschränkungen begrenzt:

  1. Das Angebot bleibt für Nutzer kostenfrei.
  2. Eine Aufgabe des Angebots wird mindestens 3 Monate vorab angekündigt, so dass Nutzer die Möglichkeit erhalten, ihr Konto auf einen anderen Server zu übertragen.

Die cepharum GmbH erfasst keinerlei Nutzungsdaten dieser Instanz zur Finanzierung dieses Angebots. Alle Kosten werden intern als Werbekosten verbucht und aus Mitteln der cepharum GmbH quersubventioniert.

Als Betreiber des Angebots behält sich die cepharum GmbH vor, Inhalte und Nutzerkonten zu moderieren, zu sperren oder zu löschen, sofern diese gegen deutsches Recht oder oben genannte Bedingungen verstoßen. Dies umfasst unter anderem die Veröffentlichung von Beiträgen mit folgenden Inhalten:

  • diskriminierende, beleidigende oder sonstwie herabwürdigende Äußerungen
  • Anfeindungen gegen Andersdenkende oder gegen Religionen oder deren Anhänger
  • Aufruf zu oder die Wiedergabe von Straftaten
  • pornografische Inhalte oder die Vermittlung sexueller Kontakte
  • Massenbeiträge zu kommerziellen oder politischen Werbezwecken
  • Bewerbungen für regional beschränkte Angebote bezogen auf Regionen jenseits des Großraums Berlin/Brandenburg und seiner angrenzenden Regionen
  • die Bewerbung und/oder die Verlinkung von externen Angeboten, welche Aktivitäten und Inhalte anbieten, die gegen diese Regeln verstoßen

Wir schätzen die Meinungsfreiheit. Doch diese Plattform ist kein öffentlicher Raum. Es steht jedem frei, selbst Serversysteme zu betreiben, um Beiträge nach eigenen Regeln zum Mastodon-Fediverse beizutragen.

brandenburg.social is a decentralized alternative to the centrally managed X, formerly Twitter. In opposition to X, Threads, Insta etc. this network is not controlled by a single company, but many independent companies, non-profits and private stakeholders. This way, any commercial exploitation is limited by design while improving the network's stability and data protection. brandenburg.social is just one out of thousands of instances this network is made of.

This instance is hosted solely on servers located in the EU and it is provided by Berlin-based cepharum GmbH on the basis of its General Terms and Conditions for Hosting Services. The specific data protection terms for this service as well as the data protection terms of cepharum GmbH apply. As a user of this offer, you become a customer of cepharum GmbH within the meaning of the aforementioned terms and conditions.

The offer can be used free of charge. cepharum GmbH is free to adjust the offer at any time and in any way or to discontinue it completely. There is no right to continue the service without a separate written agreement with cepharum GmbH. These freedoms are limited by the following restrictions:

  1. The offer remains free of charge for users.
  2. An abandonment of the offer will be announced at least 3 months in advance, so that users have the possibility to transfer their account to another server.

cepharum GmbH does not collect any usage data of this instance to finance this offer. All costs are booked internally as advertising costs and cross-subsidized from cepharum GmbH funds.

As the operator of the offer, cepharum GmbH reserves the right to moderate, block or delete content and user accounts if they violate German law or the terms and conditions mentioned above. This includes, but is not limited to, the publication of posts with the following content:

  • discriminatory, insulting or otherwise derogatory statements
  • hostility against dissidents or against religions or their followers
  • call for or reproduction of criminal offences
  • pornographic content or the mediation of sexual contacts
  • mass contributions for commercial or political advertising purposes
  • promotions for regionally restricted offers related to regions beyond the greater Berlin/Brandenburg area and its neighboring regions
  • advertising and/or linking to external offers that provide activities and content that violate these rules.

We respect the freedom of speech. But this platform is not a public space. Everyone is free to operate server systems themselves in order to contribute to the Mastodon-Fediverse based on their own rules.

Description:
Über meteo.social

Die Mastodon-Instanz für alle Wetterverrückten.

Bei meteo.social handelt es sich um eine Mastodon-Instanz, die sich in erster Linie an all diejenigen richtet, die eine Vorliebe für Themen rund um Wetter und Klima haben. Ganz egal, ob Hobbymeteorolog*in, Stormchaser*in oder einfach nur Wolkenliebhaber*in, wer das Thema mag und sich gerne mit Gleichgesinnten austauschen möchte, ist hier genau richtig.

Impressum

Kachelmann GmbH
Dorfplatz 2
CH-6417 Sattel

Vollständiges Impressum | Datenschutzhinweise

Description:
Augsburg.Social ist mit Mastodon im Fediverse!

Hier ist alles kostenlos und ohne Werbung! Hier stecken keine Konzerne dahinter die sich an Deinen Daten bereichern wollen! Augsburg.Social wird rein privat in der Freizeit betrieben und gehostet. Ich erwirke keinerlei Einnahmen und Gewinn mit dem Angebot und finanziere es aus eigener Hand.

Augsburg.Social bietet diese Instanz an damit Du Deinen Weg ins Fediverse finden kannst. Der Dienst richtet sich an Augsburg und Umgebung.

Dieser Server wird kostenfrei zur Verfügung gestellt. Es besteht kein Anspruch auf Funktionalität, Ausfallfreiheit oder Fortführung des Dienstes.

Dadurch behalte ich mir natürlich vor die angebotenen Dienste jederzeit aus rechtlichen, technischen oder finanziellen Gründen einzuschränken oder zur Not ganz abzuschalten. Ich werde mich jedoch bemühen Euch frühzeitig zu informieren falls so etwas eintreten sollte.

Falls ihr Fragen oder Probleme habt wendet Euch gern direkt auf Mastodon an @AnID@augsburg.social oder per E-Mail an admin@augsburg.social

Der Betrieb kostet viel Geld und Zeit. Strom und Hardwarekosten sind nicht gerade wenig... Wenn Ihr mich und diesen Dienst unterstützen wollt dann könnt Ihr sehr gerne etwas an https://www.buymeacoffee.com/anidaux spenden, um beizutragen, dass dieser Dienst auch noch lange online bleibt.
Short: Augsburg.Social bietet diese Instanz an damit Du Deinen Weg ins Fediverse finden kannst. Der Dienst richtet sich an Augsburg und Umgebung.

Description:
CityOfChicago.Live

CityOfChicago.Live

About This Server

CityOfChicago.Live is a decentralized, free and open alternative to Twitter based on Mastodon. Part of the Fediverse . Photo credit goes to Pedro Lastra

Backup Policy

Backups are made once a day and live backups are done on the first and last day of the month at 11:50pm cst. Expect the server to be down for a minute, an announcement will also be published to remind everyone

Donations/Ko-fi Account

Ko-Fi Helps us fund the server!

Code of Conduct

The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of CityOfChicago.live; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

  1. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:
    1. Excessive advertising
    2. Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
    3. Untagged nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions
    4. Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions
  2. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:
    1. Racism or advocation of racism
    2. Sexism or advocation of sexism
    3. Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
    4. Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism
  3. The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:
    1. Sexual depictions of children
    2. Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
    3. Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism
  4. Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:
    1. Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
    2. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
    3. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.
Short: A place for communities in and around Chicago, IL or people who plan to visit! Approval for sign up is needed due to bot issues!

Description:
Nieuw West-Brabant

Wij zijn een initiatief van burgers en ondernemers die een lokale en regionale zelfdragende samenleving bouwen. In deze samenleving maken we gebruik van ieders kwaliteiten en zorgen we ervoor dat iedereen waarde heeft. We realiseren, ondersteunen en onderzoeken lokale initiatieven. Hierbij werken we samen op basis van gelijkwaardigheid, vertrouwen, positiviteit, verbinding en respect.

Onze droom

De komende jaren ontstaat een sterke, zelfdragende economie waarin mensen vreedzaam en op een waardige manier met elkaar samenleven. We hebben als burgers steeds meer facetten van het leven in eigen beheer.

Stapje voor stapje gaan we lokaal: je tomaten komen uit Dongen, je stukje vlees uit Chaam en de groenten uit een van de vele Bredase voedselbossen. We nemen het heft in eigen hand. Lees meer hierover in dit artikel van BN DeStem.

Onze werkwijze

Nieuw West-Brabant faciliteert, stimuleert en ondersteunt bestaande en nieuwe regionale initiatieven. Ze verbindt mensen met vergelijkbare ideeën en werkt in domeinen als Lokaal Ondernemen, Voeding, Gezondheid, Wonen en Lokaal Geld. Deelnemers worden straks lid van de coöperatie en daarmee ook mede-eigenaar van de beweging.

Onder de paraplu van Nieuw West-Brabant worden projecten en pilots opgezet waar leden van kunnen profiteren. Denk aan gezamenlijke inkoop van energie of regionale coöperatieve initiatieven voor voedsel.

We gaan graag de samenwerking aan met lokale politiek en publieke instituties. We bouwen op en zijn constructief. Ook hebben we contact met initiatieven als Society 4.0, Local Economic Forum (LEF) Ede en Vereniging Nieuw Westland. Nieuw West-Brabant opereert zelfstandig en is volledig onafhankelijk.

Doe mee!

We werken aan een sterke beweging die verandering initieert en een voortrekkersrol speelt in de creatie van een lokaal geënte economie. Hoe groter de schaal, hoe sterker de nieuwe samenleving. Wees ook een early-adopter. Zonder jou is er geen wij.

Contact

U kunt ons benaderen via onderstaande e-mailadressen.

  • Algemeen: info@nieuwwestbrabant.nl
  • Pers: jannes@nieuwwestbrabant.nl
  • Beheer Mastodon: sebastian@nieuwwestbrabant.nl

Correspondentie adres:
Etnastraat 20
4814 AA Breda (Nederland)
+31 76 760 2 800

KvK: 67708536
BTW: NL002031906B38

Mastodon speziell für Lehrer, Lehrerinnen und andere Personen aus dem Bildungsbereich. Von Grundschule über Sekundarstufe, Oberstufe bis zu den berufsbildenden Schulen. Server komplett in DE -> EU-Datenschutz, kein Analytics!
Ihr könnt hier gerne auch mit einem Mastodon-Zweit-Account mitmachen! ;-)

Description:
关于本站

本站是东大学子用于交流，一人一号的交流社区，秉持 “人人平等，互相尊重” 的原则运行

我们致力于创建一个氛围友好、注重隐私、数据自主的非官方校内封闭平台，并保持这里是一个可以畅所欲言、氛围极其友善的温馨后花园

本站仅支持@stu.neu.edu.cn邮箱注册（点击跳转到 东大学生邮箱 ，若无法正常访问，请接入校园网或使用校园网VPN）

注册用户名可以使用喜欢的用户名和昵称，其中，用户名注册后不可更改

出于匿名性和个性考虑，我们不建议你使用学号等高指向性的个人信息作为用户名

用户间、用户对管理员均不会显示注册信息，进入后可以随时修改昵称

跨站板块已接入清华站、福大站、上交站等闭社网络成员站点，详见闭社主页

本站配套说明文档见[闭社] - 东大站 文档|Ourneu.Space

为防止违规，请先了解本站规则

基本使用

用户不得以任何形式出借、出租、转让闭社帐号，不得未经发布者同意以转发、截图等方式泄露、传播他人发布的内容。违反者可能受到停用帐号、封号等处罚

在不增加服务器负担和不泄漏内容的前提下，我们允许并鼓励用户使用(可信的)第三方客户端、自制客户端、基于API桥接其他应用等各种方式使用闭社，允许并鼓励在闭社上开发bot

严格禁止的内容

以下内容被严格禁止，被举报后将被删除且发布者可能受到静音、停用帐号、封号等处罚

  • 违反中华人民共和国相关法律法规的行为和内容
  • 严重影响其他用户使用体验的不友善内容，包括但不限于对其他用户或自然人的骚扰、攻击、诽谤等

不建议发布到公共时间轴的内容

以下内容不建议发布到公共时间轴，被举报后可能被删除

  • 高度性相关或政治相关的敏感话题
  • 有引战嫌疑的争议性内容，包括但不限于涉及地域歧视、种族歧视、性别歧视等的内容
  • 有意诱导违规内容的内容

本站禁止的内容

站内发送内容时，请务必考虑他人感受，不适合大众所接受内容，请主动使用“内容警告”功能，且正确打上与内容相关的标签，站内尊重每位同学的想法和你的发言权

为了不影响整体版面，不允许发布任何二手内容

严重影响其他用户使用体验的不友善内容，包括但不限于对其他用户或自然人的开盒、骚扰、攻击、诽谤等

违反中华人民共和国法律法规的内容

其他

管理员不会对站内话题作任何引导，站内可以分享、讨论、辩论、互帮互助......总之，在允许的范围内请畅所欲言

使用过程中如有任何疑问，可以在 支持文档 中尝试自助获得帮助

发布垃圾广告信息将被加入建议屏蔽列表

管理员对任何举报的处理将被公示
Short: Social@OurNEU [闭社]-东大站，闭社高校网络的成员节点

Description:
Last updated on 2024-05-21

indiepocalypse.social is an instance for indie creatives of all sorts. Artists, game devs, musicians, podcasters, writers -- everyone's welcome.

Manual approval of new accounts is required. Please write some applicable request text on signup with why you want to join. Submissions that fail to do so will be denied.

We do not federate with Threads and have no intention of that changing.

Copyright policy

Unless explicitly stated otherwise, all original content posted is assumed to be the property of the poster.

indiepocalypse.social cares about your privacy and doesn't monetize or profit off of your personal information or art — your information is never for sale.

Contents

Staff

(Currently welcoming volunteers with experience on other instances!)

  • @Quon - Instance Owner & Admin

Funding

This instance is maintained by volunteers. If you would like to contribute, we accept donations via Liberapay, Ko-fi, and Patreon. Thank you!

Any donations received that exceed hosting costs will be shared equally among all admin and moderators.

Hosting information

indiepocalypse.social is hosted in the US via Hetzner Cloud.

indiepocalypse.social is committed to and complies with the Mastodon Server Covenant.

Attributions

indiepocalypse.social Mascot art by Katto.

"Blobhaj" emoji by Heatherhorns and licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike-4.0 International License.

"acnh" emoji provided by Puniko's emoji repository

"pride hearts" emoji by @rheall and @katwylder

"SquidKids" emoji by @Lurizon

"Mastodon Modern" skin by @freeplay@ilyamikcoder.com

"Tangerine UI" skin by @nileane@nileane.fr

Federation policy

  1. Federating with indiepocalypse.social is not guaranteed. Links between federated instances are temporary and may change or disappear at any time.
  2. Other instances may not disseminate our users' original content or toots without credit and proper licensing.
  3. Other instances may not use automated means to analyze any derived work for publication or profit without indiepocalypse.social's users' consent. This includes serving ads next to copyrighted content.
  4. Public toots are derived works that are protected by copyright.
  5. This instance honours noindex/nofollow and search engines are not allowed to index content from such users.
  6. Crawling the content of the instance and creating a database of its posts and content for the purposes of archiving, searching, or analyzing is prohibited. We value our users' privacy and their ability to control how their data is utilized.
  7. We will block, suspend, or silence any instance which permits any of the content or behaviour prohibited by this instance.

Disclaimer

indiepocalypse.social is not associated with the Indiepocalypse monthly anthology curated by PIZZAPRANKS. But do check it out!
Short: Inspired by itch.io - a place for independent creators of all sorts. If you create and publish independent art, comics, music, table top games, video games or the written word, you're welcome here.

Description:
The Mended Drum should serve as a welcoming home to any and all who remember Sir Terry Prachett (#gnuterrypratchett). Denizens of alt.fan.pratchett, alt.talk.mendeddrum and irc.lspace.org are especially welcome.

If this sounds like garbish to you, I congratulate you on your youth and wish you a very warm welcome if you like the writings of Terry Pratchett, Neil Gaiman, Douglas Adams, Charles Stross, Diane Duane, and more.

The Drum aims to be a friendly place. Should you come across content which does not belong here, do not hesitate to ask for moderation.

Please be informed that there are currently a couple of custom emoji available, which are :gnutp:, and the afp-tags :rtag: itag: :atag: :mtag: :ftag:.


This instance is open for registration, but on manual approval so as to be able to control the growth. Feel free to request an invite or wait for approval to happen, which should be within a day.

The Mended Drum is a voluntary undertaking. To be financially able to continue running it, and to show your appreciation, I have set up an OpenCollective page for it here. Many thanks and my eternal gratitude to all donors!
Short: This is the Mended Drum, Discworlds best known disreputable tavern.
