Description:
Über diesen Server

Wer mit dem Namen seiner Instanz unmissverständlich kommunizieren möchte, was ihm am Herzen liegt, findet hier ein zu Hause.

Der Server dieser Instanz steht in Deutschland (Hetzner Online GmbH) und verwendet die Blockliste von chaos.social (https://github.com/chaossocial/about).

Bitte bedenkt, das Direktnachrichten bei Mastodon nicht Ende-zu-Ende verschlüsselt sind. Für wirklich private Nachrichten nutzt also bitte entsprechende Messenger.

Server-Regeln

  1. Keine Beleidigungen, Drohungen und Verunglimpfungen aller Art
  2. Keine Aufforderungen zu Gewalt
  3. Kein radikales Gedankengut, Rassismus und Hasspropaganda
  4. Keine Pornografie und Obszönitäten
  5. Keine Verletzungen von Rechten Dritter
  6. Keine Veröffentlichung von Foren-/Blogbeiträgen, privaten Korrespondenzen und privaten Daten (Anschriften, E-Mail-Adressen oder Telefonnummern)
  7. Kein Missbrauch der Kommentarfunktion für werbliche Zwecke

Vertraulichkeit und Sicherheit von Direktnachrichten

Mastodon und kompatible Plattformen bieten die Möglichkeit, nicht-öffentliche Direktnachrichten mit anderen Nutzer*innen auszutauschen. Bitte versteht diese Funktion nicht als Ersatz für sichere Nachrichten-Plattformen mit Ende-zu-Ende-Verschlüsselung. Zieht die nachfolgenden Informationen in Betracht, wenn Ihr entscheidet, für welche Art von Kommunikation Ihr diese Funktion nutzen möchtet.

Für uns als Betreiber besteht technisch die Möglichkeit, Einblick in alle Nachrichten zu nehmen, die Nutzer*innen auf dieser Instanz erhalten oder senden. Das gilt auch für Direktnachrichten. Es ist jedoch Teil unseres Selbstverständnis als Betreiber von Kommunikationsinfrastruktur, dass wir niemals von dieser Möglichkeit Gebrauch machen werden. Gleichzeitig ist es nicht ausgeschlossen, dass wir beispielsweise in Fehlermeldungen oder Logs auch mit Inhalten von Direktnachrichten konfrontiert werden, ohne dies zu beabsichtigen.

Die gleichen technische Möglichkeiten, die wir auf verkehrswende.social haben, haben auch die Admins anderer Instanzen, mit denen Ihr Nachrichten austauscht.

Mindestalter

Unser Angebot erfordert eine Zustimmung zu den Datenschutzrichtlinien. Gemäß DSGVO ist dies nur Personen möglich die das 16. Lebensjahr vollendet haben. Wenn du unter 16 Jahren bist, darfst du diese Plattform daher leider nicht benutzen.

Automatische Löschung von Accounts

Wir behalten uns vor, Nutzeraccounts, die keine Aktivität zeigen, zu löschen. Die Aktivität wird unter anderem am letzten Login und der Tootaktivität festgemacht. So fallen bspw. Accounts die 3 Monate ohne Login sind und noch nie etwas getootet haben unter diese Regelung.
Short: eine Fediverse Instanz Pro Verkehrswende

Description:
This is a very lightweight mastodon instance for members of the AI ethics research community to chat, brainstorm, and share interesting work.

Until there is a reason to change them, general guidelines should be roughly the same as those at scholar.social. Be kind to each other!
Short: A mastodon instance hosted by the Distributed AI Research Institute (DAIR) for those invested in independent, community-rooted AI research.

Description:
Welcome to the floe.earth Mastodon instance.

Practical note: If you are registered on this server with the local username user, your full Mastodon username is @user@floe.earth, despite the web client being served from https://mastodon.floe.earth.

You are welcome to join if the following resonates with you:

  • Let's explore how to change the way our society works to avoid climate breakdown as much as possible.
  • We trust in science as the best way of giving us a reliable picture of our environment and guidelines for necessary action.
  • In order not to go insane, let's talk about more the pleasant things in life too.
  • Humor is important!
  • We welcome and cherish criticism and challenges to our beliefs. However, we do not tolerate the intolerant. Hate and violence are not welcome here.

This server is run and paid for by private people. In case of questionable usage or abuse, the admins will try to resolve issues in a polite conversation, but they may ultimately decide to exclude users from this community without having to give a reason.

The admins reserve the right to delete accounts that have been inactive for at least half a year. Affected users will be notified before.

The admins will do their best to keep the user data secure but are not liable for any damages or data loss.

If we decide to shut down this instance, we will inform users about this at least three months in advance, giving them the chance to migrate their data somewhere else.

Donations

This Mastodon instance is operated by me in my free time. I currently have to pay between approximately 23 and 30 EUR per month. Here is a breakdown of these costs:

  • Server costs (Hetzner): monthly 11.64 EUR
  • Storage space on Object Storage for media files and backups (Scaleway): variable costs, monthly between 3 and 10 EUR
  • Domain (Gandi): annually 19.99 EUR
  • Server costs for monitoring solution (Contabo): monthly 5.99 EUR

Your support enables me to sustain the operation of our instance as well as make upgrades that may become necessary or improve the user experience. For example, further donations would enable me to limit media files less aggressively, which would make viewing images and videos on Mastodon faster and more reliable. This would result in higher costs for object storage (depending on the strategy, e.g., an additional 10 EUR per month), so your donations would be much appreciated.

I would be very grateful for your support on Liberapay. Credit cards, PayPal and SEPA direct debit are accepted as payment methods. Even small amounts are helpful and much appreciated.
Short: Concerned about the climate, authoritarianism, war, billionaires and the power of big tech – but still looking for a community that posts about less scary things too? This is for you.

Description:
A safe server for all women and/or LGBTQ+ identifying people. Our admins and mods are all drawn from within our membership. All sign-ups are approved by a mod.

We have authorized fetch enabled.

Support

If you'd like to support the operating costs of the server you can do so on Patreon or BuyMeACoffee for one-off contributions.

Admins

Our admin team: @admin @ellesaurus @totalclaireity

We have three admins to help maximize the likelihood that any given time there is someone available in case of any issues.

Rules

Rules are provided to give clarity to general behavioral expectations, and are not meant to be a comprehensive, loophole-free set of laws or hard-line absolutes. They are subject to admin and moderator interpretation. There will be no rules lawyering.

The intent of these rules is to facilitate a safe, fun environment for everyone. We are accessible and happy to engage with our instance members, so any questions and concerns are welcome.
Short: A safe Mastodon (posting) and Matrix (chat) for all women and/or LGBTQ+ identifying people. Our admins and mods are all drawn from within our membership. All sign-ups are approved by a mod.

Description:
Welcome to HorrorHub!

This is a large server run by one nerd.

Do you love horror? Stories, movies, narrations, artwork? So do I. That's why I started this instance. I've had this domain doing nothing for years, now I finally have something to use it for.

Message @bluebassist@horrorhub.club if you're a horror content creator and would like to be included in the recommended accounts list for new users!

Patreon

Support us on Patreon like these awesome people!

  • Elizabeth Lee
  • Christian Burd
  • Rottenartist
  • TheSecretDavid
  • Thudfactor
  • Sarah Wilkes
  • Brett Dyer
  • Jason Parker-Burlingham
  • grryboy

  • Legion Podcasts
  • Goretta Synn
  • hpkomic
  • Ryan Conley
  • Jennifer Barnes
  • Caracabe

  • C. in Fresno
  • Daisy
  • Tom O'Keefe
  • erethryn

Server Info

12 core Intel Xeon E-2236 @ 3.4ghz 32GB RAM Located in Virginia, US

Description:
The Fediverse is a decentralised federated social network. This server is maintained and used by hackers from The Netherlands (and elsewhere, probably). The software we use is glitch-soc, a fork of Mastodon.

Het Fediversum is een decentraal gefedereerd sociaal netwerk. Deze server wordt beheerd en gebruikt door hackers uit nederland (en vast ook elders). De software die we gebruiken is glitch-soc, een fork van Mastodon.

This Mastodon is hosted on a server sponsored by ProcoliX, with a NixOS config you can find here: https://github.com/hsnl-matrix/nixos
Nightly encrypted backups are sent to an AlphaVPS Storage box (pixie.town infra). Our email is hosted by Migadu.com, with a gracious 50% non-profit discount.
Short:
A fediverse server for the community of Dutch hackerspaces (HSNL)

Description:
Friendly neighborhood cat here to give you some information on the vibe of this instance if you were interested on signing up. We're a general instance full of predominantly queer, nerdy, and furry folk. This place is smaller than similar instances, and thus less chaotic. If you're someone who prefers a quiet corner, you'll find one here. Users here have a wide variety of interests, we have no niche.

Other instances may have a code of conduct along with a moderation staff to enforce the rules of the community. I've decided not to run this instance that way. On this instance, it's run according to how I want it to run. This doesn't mean it's an unfriendly place or that I rule with an iron fist, it just means that I'm the sole staff person, and that will always be the case. And for rules, they're extremely loose because I like giving people tools to curate their own feeds as opposed to trying to manage everyone's feeds for them.

That being said, I'll give you a quick idea of what sort of things I'm looking to keep off the local and federated feeds here so you can know in advance if you'll fit in or not.

- No Nazis, or really any pro fascist, nationalistic hate rhetoric that exists out there

- We're queer friendly here, so any bigots can find themselves the door out of here

- You would think I could just put, "no racism" here, but a lot of people haven't figured out how to do that yet so I need to say a bit more about it. I'm a white guy, and for some that's an understandable dealbreaker (no hard feelings), but for others I want to stress that I'm gonna do whatever I can to make sure you're comfortable here within reason. If an instance is harassing you repeatedly, they're gone if you let me know. My bullshit capacity is at a all time low. If an instance doesn't want to action their users for their racist bullshit, then I'm not gonna host them here. If it's coming from one of the users here, they're gone. I'm no nonsense and not here to play games or debate those sort of folks. If it bugs you, it'll probably bug me and I'm gonna take care of it regardless of consequences. I don't give a shit about fediverse relationships.

- That being said, if you're someone who tends to get into a lot of petty internet spats, and want someone to look out for you on the home instance, you might want to keep looking. I'm not gonna tolerate any user harassing users of different instances or repeatedly getting into fights with people. I have no issues kicking you out if I'm getting a lot of reports about your behavior. If you're the one being harassed however, and it's clearly evident, I will take action for you in that case.

- I have a pretty lax policy when it comes to content warnings. I don't strictly enforce users to use them, but I do encourage people to use them when posting anything that could be potentially triggering for someone. I advocate users using their judgement here, and expect people to use CWs appropriately. I will not force people to use them. I am not omnipresent and don't particularly wish to try to be, so if you see a user not tagging something that is triggering you, I would ask that you just mute them.

- Speaking of muting people, I really do stress the features given to you by the platform. Instead of posting something you know will start an argument with someone, just block them instead. An entire instance of shitposters is bugging you? Block the whole instance on your own instead of asking me to defederate with them or starting shit with them. I'm not here to manage your feeds when people are annoying or tasteless.

- Really, just use common sense. If you act like an adult and treat other people like adults, you'll have no issues here.

This instance uses Mutant Standard emoji, which are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.
Short: 18+ queer, furry and nerd friendly general interest instance. Quieter and less chaotic than big instances, with relaxed moderation policies. Perfect for folk who want a peaceful corner to themselves.

Description:
Dragonchat is a safe, long-term community for dragons and dragon lovers. Welcome, rest your wings for a while!

Given the decentralized nature of Mastodon, while I intend on running this instance as long as there is interest (and I am able to do so), there is no guarantee as to the persistence of this site and anything that has been posted to it. Please do not use this site to host the only copy of your important stuff.
Please review the rules prior to joining. For any issues, please contact one of the admins:
  • @talon
Server thumbnail courtesy of @tracken
Hosting: Servers cost money. This one is (currently) $50/month, and while Dragonchat will forever be free to use, I have set up a Ko-fi if you would like to contribute towards its long-term success!
Short: Dragonchat- By dragons, for dragons.

Description:
AUT.social

AUT.social ist Österreichs inoffizielle Mastodon-Instanz. Im Gegensatz zu großen Social Media Plattformen verzichtet Mastodon generell auf Tracking, Werbung und algorithmische Timeline.

Server-Betrieb

Hosted by easyname.at (4 CPUs, 16GB RAM, 250GB SSD, Backup):
  • Serverstandort: Österreich
  • Rechenzentrum ISO/IEC 27001 zertifiziert
  • CO2 neutrale Stromversorgung (ohne Atomenergie!)
  • 99,9% Verfügbarkeit
  • Tägliche Backups

Description:
Willkommen!

Wir möchten allen Wesen, die unsere Welt kreativ gestalten und Neues erschaffen wollen, eine Heimat bieten. Dabei ist uns ein respektvoller Umgang wichtig. Daher haben wir uns einige Regeln gegeben, um eine inkusive und kreative Umgebung zu schaffen. Generell aber gilt: Be excellent to each other!

cultur.social steht für eine respektvolle Netzkultur, Verwirklichung von Ideen, kulturelle Werte, Inspiration und Diskurs, den Kampf um eine bessere Welt und vieles mehr.

Regeln

  • Um eine rücksichtsvolle und freundliche Atmosphäre zu schaffen, stehen Wekzeuge zur Verfügung, die konsequent eingesetzt werden sollten. Dazu gehören Inhaltswarnungen (insbesondere bei potenziell verstörenden oder kontroversen Themen) und die Verwendung von Bildbeschreibungen für Mediendateien.

  • Halte dich an Gesetze! Inhalte, die in Deutschland illegal sind, werden gelöscht und können zur sofortigen Sperrung des Kontos führen.

  • Wir tolerieren keinerlei diskriminierende Inhalte. Insbesondere Inhalte geeignet sind die Unterdrückung von Mitgliedern von Randgruppen fördern werden nicht geduldet.

  • Wir dulden kein bedrohliches oder belästigendes Verhalten, enschließlich Doxxing, Stalking, Brigading, Dogpiling oder jede andere Form der ungewollten Kontaktaufnahme mit einer Nutzer*in. Weitehin wird Mobbing, einschließlich Beschimpfungen, absichtlich falsche Geschlechter-Ansprache oder Deadnaming, nicht toleriert.

  • Nationalistische Propaganda, Nazi-Symbolik, die Förderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus, Verschwörungserzählungen sind hier nicht erwünscht.

  • Wir dulden Bots nur in engen Grenzen und in Absprache mit den Admins. Bots müssen immer eindeutig als solche markiert werden. Automatisierte Beiträge sollten immer als "Nicht gelistet" gepostet werden. Damit sorgen wir für eine lokale Timeline die dem Austausch untereinander dient.

  • Sämtliche verfügbaren Daten (inklusive der Inhalte, Medien und Metadaten) auf cultur.social dürfen nicht für maschinelles Lernen oder andere "Forschungszwecke" verwendet werden. Ausnahmen sind nur mit ausdrücklicher Zustimmung der involvierten Nutzer*innen gestattet. Die Admins sind in jedem Fall vorab zu informieren.

  • Spam ist nicht gestattet. Spam-Konten werden nach dem Ermessen der Moderator*innen gelöscht.

  • Augenscheinliche Fake-Konten (Impersonation) von Personen und Institionen können nach dem Ermessen der Moderator*innen markiert, gesperrt oder unter Umständen auch gelöscht werden.

  • Diese Instanz darf nicht zur Verbreitung von Pornografie bzw. sexuell expliziter Texte, Bilder, Videos und sonstigen Medien genutzt werden. Potentiell anstößige Inhalte ausserhalb dieser Definition müssen mit einer entsprechenden Inhaltswarnung versehen werden. Hierbei gilt: Inhalte lieber einmal zu Oft taggen, als einmal zu wenig. Accounts, die überwiegend oder ausschließlich der Verbreitung von "NSFW"-Inhalten dienen können durch die Moderator*innen entsprechend markiert werden. In extremen Fällen kann eine Löschung erfolgen.

  • Inaktive bzw. leere Konten (keine Posts, Follower, Following) können nach einer angemessenen Frist entfernt werden.

  • Handlungen, die darauf abzielen, diese Instanz oder ihre Leistung zu schädigen, können zur sofortigen Sperrung des Accounts führen.

Bitte melde ein Verhalten, welches dich stört. Wir werden deine Meldung vertraulich behandeln.

Wenn bei einer Meldung zu einem potentiellen Verstoß gegen diese Regeln weitere Untersuchungen erfordern um eine Entscheidung herbei zu führen, behalten sich die Moderator*innen das Recht vor, sofort zu handeln, um potenzielle Opfer von Fehlverhalten und die Gemeinschaft zu schützen.

Die Kommunikation zum Zwecke der Moderation ist in deutscher oder englischer Sprache möglich. Jegliche Meldungen, Einsprüche und Begründungen in anderen Sprachen müssen wir ablehnen, da die Sprachbarriere eine fundierte Entscheidung bei uneindeutiger Sachlage unmöglich macht. Im Zweifel sehen wir uns in solchen Fällen dem Schutz der Gemeinschaft verprflichtet.

Diese Regeln sind inspiriert von chaos.social, bsd.network und digitalcourage.social! Vielen Dank an die großartige Community!

Disclaimer

Diese Instanz wird durch die MicroMovie Media GmbH und dem Team von GuidePilot unterstützt. Sie ist inhaltlich, redaktionell und administrativ aber vollständig unabhängig.

Die Moderation übernehmen zur Zeit @babelsberg, @Keiner und @daniel. Wichtige Infos zur Instanz werden zentral über den Account @chief veröffentlicht.

Attribution

  • Original-Motiv des cultur.social Branding
Short: Für alle Wesen, die unsere Welt kreativ gestalten und Neues erschaffen wollen.

Description:
This is an inclusive space for the ska community, including musicians, artists, fans and more. It is also a place for all well-meaning sentient beings, who just want a fun place to socialize.

We welcome everyone from the ska, punk, reggae, rocksteady, new wave, or other related music fandoms. We are also proud proponents of the Ska Goth Alliance.

"Do I have to talk about only ska?" No! While Skastodon exists to serve the ska community, you can talk about whatever is on your mind (as long as you follow our server rules). We have friends on many servers with many interests, and would never limit conversations to just one topic.

Follow @skastodon@skastodon.com for more information!

Offsite Contact

If you need to contact Skastodon without logging in, please email mailto:skastodon@skastodon.com.

Please consider supporting Skastodon

Skastodon is an independent site. Please consider making a donation on BuyMeACoffee or Ko-Fi.

You can also support Skastodon by buying merchandise at our Threadless or TeePublic stores.

Legal

View our DMCA policy here.

Machine Learning policy

Content posted to Skastodon.com is not to be scraped, mirrored, copied, or otherwise used for machine learning purposes. Prohibited actions include using text or images on Skastodon for large language models, image generators, or any similar products or services.
Short: A Mastodon server for ska musicians, artists, fans, and anyone else in the ska community.

Description:
Welcome to indiehackers.social!

We are a hustling and bustling community of independent app/web makers + entrepreneurs.

We #buildinpublic and share our struggles, progress and victories with the world.

"Grinding alone is fun, grinding together is funner."

Come for the hacking, stay for the vibe!

Affiliation

We are not affiliated with indiehackers.com in any shape or form.
Short: A hustling and bustling community of independent app/web makers + entrepreneurs. We #buildinpublic and learn, struggle and celebrate together. Join the friendly grind and share your journey with us!

Description:
Allgemeines

Dies ist eine deutschsprachige Mastodon Instanz, die von Bahn-Interessierten für Bahn-Interessierte gemacht ist. Bahn.Social wird freiwillig betrieben und zur Verfügung gestellt. Ein Anspruch auf die Funktion und Verfügbarkeit des Dienstes besteht nicht.

Das Moderatorenteam behält sich das Recht vor, Inhalte, die gegen eine freie, friedliche und tolerante Diskussion stehen, zu Löschen. Der Autor der Nachrichten wird darüber durch die Software benachrichtigt. Dies gilt insbesondere für politische Themen mit starker Polarisierung.

Zeichenlimit pro Toot: 1000

Aktuell föderieren wir mit allen Instanzen inklusive Threads mit Ausnahme der unten Aufgelisteten.

Meldungen

Wenn ein Verstoß gegen unsere Instanzregeln festgestellt wird, bitte unbedingt die Funktion an dem entsprechenden Beitrag verwenden.

Wir wünschen euch fröhliche Sifa Zwangsbremsu... ehm Toots. :)

Moderatorenteam

@jokey2k (Serverbetrieb, Moderation)

@dominik (Moderation)

Lizenzhinweise

Diese Instanz nutzt das Mutant Standard Emoji Pack und das Neocat Emoji Pack für Server Emojis und das Server-Maskottchen, die unter der Creative Commons Attribution-Non Commercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License lizensiert sind. Auch ein weiteres Emoji wird von Ecelop verwendet. Auch werden Blobcats von DuckOfDisorder verwendet, die unter der Apache 2.0 Lizenz lizensiert sind. Zu guter Letzt wird auch ein Bild von einem X Nutzer als Emoji genommen: Link

Nicht verfügbare Inhalte

Mastodon erlaubt es dir generell, mit Inhalten zu interagieren, diese anzuzeigen und mit anderen Nutzern im Fediversum über Server hinweg zu interagieren. Hier verlinkt sind die Ausnahmen, die auf diesem bestimmten Server gemacht wurden.

Stand: 30.12.2023
Short: Das Wir für ein Leben von, in und mit Zügen

Description:
Mastodon je celosvětová sociální síť podobná známému Twitteru. Tato síť je však plně decentralizovaná a hlavně: vaše data zůstávají vaše.

Na tomto serveru mají uživatelé plnou svobodu nad tím, co publikují. Je však potřeba pamatovat na to, že s tím přichází i velká zodpovědnost. Proto, prosím, neporušujte zákony České Republiky a chovejte se slušně.
Short: Czech Mastodon

Description:
Welcome to the Floofs!

Admin/Owners Members:
These members have access to the servers running this mastodon instance.

  • @Arch (SysAdmin)
  • @Ekkoklang (Moderation)
  • @Kakious (SysAdmin)

If you have any questions, concerns please feel free to message or contact us.

Regarding Moderation

*STILL A WIP*

About the hosting of this instance

This instance uses a dedicated hypervisor that is running a Talos based Kubernetes cluster and a WAF. It can be easily expanded with more hypervisors due to the OSPF routing we have in place to spin up a new VM or hypervisor with internal access to the cluster easily.

Servers

  • 3x Kubernetes control nodes
  • 3x kobolds (Kubernetes worker nodes)
  • floofy-postal - SMTP Routing Server
  • floofy-db - DB Server
  • floofy-elastic-search - Elastic Search Instance
  • floofy-wazuh - Logging/Security Server

You can view the status of the servers at status.floofy.tech. We monitor all services required to run this instance. (This is out of date, please wait while we rebuild this monitoring stack)

Offical Contact Information

Please send all DMCA requests to dmca@floofy.tech, all other requests please contact us at support@floofy.tech.

See meta.floofy.tech for more details about emoji used on this server and more!

The amazing banner artwork was created by @Juniper
Short: A primary furry/tech instance full of wonderful beans.

Description:
Un fantasma recorre Europa... y es el fantasma del frikismo. En estos tiempos donde las grandes cadenas de ropa tienen pijamas de Spiderman o sudaderas de Naruto, o Disney se compra Star Wars, los frikis se distinguen porque comparten, comentan y divulgan sus aficiones.

En el Frikiverse queremos ser sobre todo una instancia multitemática, donde #frikis de todas las tendencias hablemos sobre nuestras aficiones y aprendamos de las aficiones de los otros, pero también un punto de encuentro donde podamos compartir las cosas que nos pasan en la #SagaRealidad. No pretendemos que sólo se hable de cosas frikis, sino también que haya frikis hablando de sus cosas.

En el Frikiverse nos gusta hablar de #libros, #cómics, #ilustración, #series, #cine, #manga, #anime, #música o cualquier otro soporte de transmisión de la #Cultura. Pero también de aficiones, más o menos afines, como la #astronomía, la #informática y la #tecnología, el #rol y los #juegosDeMesa, los #juegos de ordenador o de consola, la #física y las #matemáticas, la #historia, la #mitología, el #arte, los #idiomas y la #lingüística, la #fotografía, destinos mágicos (como #Japón o #Bretaña) y muchas otras. Si alguna vez te han llamado friki por dedicar mucho tiempo a una afición, esta es tu casa.

Nuestro objetivo es ser una instancia "pequeña", donde pueda haber un sentimiento de comunidad. Nos gustaría llegar a ser unos pocos centenares de usuarios activos. Para aumentar el contenido disponible, y la difusión de nuestras publicaciones, estamos en el relay.tkz.one junto a otras instancias en castellano. También usamos relays de lectura específicos con instancias afines como xarxa.cloud o paquita.masto.host.

Nuestra política de moderación pretende mantener un espacio del Fediverse que sea seguro e inclusivo, con la mínima moderación posible, pero con toda la moderación necesaria. Como instancia, nos comprometemos a cumplir los criterios establecidos en el Mastodon Server Covenant.

El contenido publicado es propiedad de sus respectivos autores, y no debe ser usado fuera de Mastodon sin su consentimiento. Las ilustraciones de Ciudad Friki y del Pato del Kaos que decoran la instancia son creaciones originales para el Frikiverse de @PukaMuriska@mastodon.art.
Short: El Frikiverse es una comunidad para frikis de todas las tendencias. Por defecto en castellano, pero todo idioma es bienvenido. Las solicitudes son revisadas lo antes posible.
rules: [{'id': '11', 'text': 'No se permiten actitudes contra la dignidad de las personas, ya sea por su raza, origen, sexo, orientación sexual, identidad de género, situación personal, riesgo de exclusión social o cualquier otro motivo. Tampoco la falta de respeto o el acoso a los miembros de esta o de cualquier otra comunidad.'}, {'id': '19', 'text': 'El idioma por defecto de la instancia es el castellano, pero cualquier otro también es bienvenido. Los idiomas romances escritos son fácilmente inteligibles (con un poco de voluntad) y el inglés, nos guste o no, es idioma universal. Otros, como el euskera... bueno, para algo existen los traductores.'}, {'id': '20', 'text': 'Se permite contenido ajeno a las temáticas de la instancia, pero se espera que una buena parte esté relacionado. Los temas potencialmente polémicos se deben conducir con educación y respeto, y etiquetar con un CW que permita identificar el contenido y un hashtag para poder filtrar.'}, {'id': '21', 'text': 'No está permitido el contenido ilegal, la distribución de desinformación y el spam. Tampoco la publicidad, salvo recomendaciones puntuales o la promoción de productos propios (crowdfundings, nuevas publicaciones, artesanía, ilustraciones...), siempre que la cuenta no sea solo con este fin.\r\n'}, {'id': '27', 'text': 'El contenido sexual explícito no es temática de la instancia. Seamos responsables en marcar imágenes o ilustraciones con CW y #NSFW (no es lo mismo una estatua que un fanart subido de tono). El contenido que muestre o sugiera actividad sexual o desnudos de menores está absolutamente prohibido. '}, {'id': '28', 'text': 'Las decisiones sobre moderación, normas y funcionamiento de la instancia se tomarán de manera colectiva, mediante los procedimientos que se establezcan en cada momento, entre quienes estén colaborando en su mantenimiento.'}, {'id': '29', 'text': 'Solo se bloquearán instancias si promueven la discriminación o el acoso, o en casos excepcionales (Meta, spam, contenido sexual de menores...). Se silenciarán si no hay moderación activa y se bloquearán las cuentas reportadas.'}, {'id': '30', 'text': 'Para ayudar a la sostenibilidad de la instancia las cuentas inactivas podrán ser dadas de baja despues de avisar al propietario y las cachés de recursos gráficos se borrarán periódicamente. Las nuevas altas que no sigan a nadie ni publiquen contenido en siete días se consideran inactivas.'}, {'id': '31', 'text': 'Solo se permiten cuentas bot si el perfil está claramente identificado y si se ha consultado previamente con los administradores de la instancia.'}, {'id': '32', 'text': 'Las nuevas altas serán por solicitud de registro o por invitación. En las solicitudes se exige que el campo "motivación" tenga un contenido mínimamente razonado (más de 2 palabras). Para poder distinguir bots, por favor usad la palabra "friki" o el hashtag "#nosoyunbot".'}]

Description:
Welcome!

WEBPERF.SOCIAL is a place for those who care about web performance, from novices to professionals. Everyone in related fields is also welcome. It is an open-source, social network based on Mastodon. Managed by @ryantownsend@webperf.social

The primary instance language is English.

Best efforts are made to keep the server up and running, but sometimes things may be outside the admin's control, such as the managed hosting provider experiencing downtime.

When applying to join

When you sign up to join, you will be asked to provide an answer to "Why do you want to join?". Take a moment to write down your response. If your response is unrelated to web performance, web technologies, and web development, or is lacking the requested information, your application to join will likely be rejected.

Please include links to your other social media accounts for verification, again, without this your application will likely be rejected.

This server is committed to the Mastodon Server Covenant and is hosted in France by Masto.host.

Content not allowed

The following rules are a (non-exhaustive) list of behaviors and types of content that may lead to the deletion of posts, silencing, or suspension of accounts, at the discretion of the instance administrators, as described in the webperf.social Terms.

  • Any illegal content (doxing, leaking private information, underage content, etc)
  • Adult (pornography) content
  • Spam
  • Commercial advertisements
  • Racism
  • Political content
  • Alt-right, including under the disguise of freedom of speech
  • Gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions
  • National Socialism
  • Nazism
  • Holocaust denial
  • Gender-critical
  • Sex and gender discrimination
  • Transphobia
  • Misogyny
  • Trolling, insulting, and derogatory comments toward others using a webperf.social account
  • Spreading falsehoods, alternative facts, anecdotal evidence, prejudice or bias towards a social group, inciting violence, circular reporting, shock-provoking content, conspiracy theories, dark patterns, deepfakes, disinformation, misinformation, sensationalism, truthiness, propaganda, rumors, hoaxes, urban myths, pseudoscience, post-truth, and opinion pieces or interviews that convey any of the previous.
  • Threats of Physical violence against any person, or institution.

Reporting harassment/content breaking rules / other

Please report the user using the "…" button and then "Report". Include posts in the report it makes the moderator's job easier.

If it's not breaking the server rules or SPAM, please DO NOT report the content. If it's something that you don't like, in the "…" button you can also Mute or Block someone.

Copyrights

All product names, logos, and brands are the property of their respective owners. All company, product, and service names used in this website are for identification purposes only. Use of these names, logos, and brands does not imply endorsement.
Short:
webperf.social is a place for professionals working in the field of web development who care about web performance.

Sponsored by TWNSND.com

Description:
כללי הקהילה זהים לאלה של "תותים". תודה למנהלי "תותים" שהרשו לי לשכפל את הכללים אחרי שטרחו, ניסחו ודייקו אותם לאורך זמן. מעבר לכך, תודה להם על עצותיהם ועזרתם.

כללי הקהילה בשרת זה

משתמשי hed.im ("השרת") מסכימים לקיים סביבה מכילה ומכבדת עבור כל משתמשי/ות השרת.

עיקר הכללים

  • לא להטריד, להתקיף, להשפיל או לאיים
  • אם מישהו/י מבקש/ת להפסיק אינטראקציה כלשהי, להפסיק מיד
  • לנסות לאפשר מרחב נעים ומכיל עבור כולןם
  • לא להציג באופן גלוי תכנים פורנוגרפיים או ייצוגים של אלימות פיזית
  • אפס סובלנות לגזענות, בפרט כל התבטאות כהניסטית או נאצית

מנהלי הקהילה

  • @hed - "הד" (מנהל המערכת)
  • @nlb - נועם

כללי הקהילה הם לא מסמך משפטי, אלא נועדו לאפשר הבנה של הגישה שלנו לניהול השרת. ייתכנו פעולות מנהלתיות על בסיס שאינו מתואר בכללים אלו.

אנו ממליצים בחום למצטרפות/ים חדשות לעיין במדריך "ברוכות הבאות למסטודון".

כללים קהילתיים מפורטים יותר

אנו שואפים למרחב משותף ללא דיכוי ודורסנות, במובן של שפה והתנהגות המבטאות, מחזקות, או מעודדות כל צורה של עליונות חברתית מערכתית. בקהילה זו איננו מקבלים:

  • הטרדה או התנפלות
  • התקפות אישיות
  • הערות תוקפניות או משפילות
  • צורות אחרות של התנהלות ושפה דכאנית

דוגמאות להתנהלות נפוצה שיכולה להחשב כהטרדה:

  • המשך אינטראקציה עם משתמש/ת שביקש/ה באופן ברור להפסיק את האינטראקציה הזו, או עידוד משתמשים אחרים לעשות זאת.
  • איסוף או הפצה של נתונים פרטיים של אדם ללא רשותו המוצהרת (פרקטיקה המכונה לעתים doxing).
  • יצירה ושיתוף של צילומי מסך של הודעות לעוקבים בלבד או הודעות פרטיות.

תכנים אסורים

תוכן מהסוגים הבאים בפידים הפומביים יוסר בלי אזהרה, ויכול להוביל לחסימת הגישה שלך לשירות:

  • גזענות או תמיכה בגזענות
  • סקסיזם או תמיכה בסקסיזם
  • להטבופוביה או תמיכה בלהטבופוביה
  • שנאת זרים ו/או לאומנות אלימה

חשבונות שמשמשים באופן קבוע להפיץ תוכן מהסוגים הנ"ל, גם אם לא באופן פומבי לחלוטין, ייחסמו לצמיתות.

תוכן מהסוגים הבאים אסור לחלוטין ויגרור חסימה מיידית:

  • הצגה מינית של ילדים/ות
  • תוכן שעובר על החוק בגרמניה ובצרפת (שם מאוכסן השרת), כולל הכחשת שואת היהודים והצגת סמלים נאציים
  • תוכן המקדם אידיאולוגיה נאצית או כהניסטית

כל משתמשי/ות השרת מקבלות על עצמן לשאוף לקיים את כללים אלו ולפעול נגד תכנים והתנהלות שעוברים עליהם. בפרט אנו מעודדים את כל המשתמשים/ות לדווח על תוכן שמפריע להן כדי להביאו לתשומת לב מנהלי השרת.

תכנים רגישים

יש סוגי תוכן אותם אנחנו שואפים לא להציג באופן גלוי לכל, אלא להשתמש בכלים להסתרת תוכן (CW לטקסט, NSFW לתמונות) להסתרתם מעיניים שלא בוחרות לראות אותם. כמובן שגם לא נציג תוכן כזה לעיני כל בתמונת הפרופיל או בתיאור האישי בפרופיל שלנו.

תכנים שיש להסתיר בפרסומים פובמיים כוללים:

  • תוכן פורנוגרפי או מיני מאוד
  • כל תוכן המציג אלימות (כולל ייצוגים גרפיים של אנשים מתים וחיות מתות, ושל אנשים חמושים)
  • אנימציות או סרטונים שמרצדים או משתנים במהירות

רובוטים

אנחנו שרת ידידותי לרובוטים, עד גבול מסוים.

  • אפס סובלנות ל- followbots (רובוטים שעוקבים אחרי כל משתמש שהם רואים ברשת המבוזרת בשביל לאכלס את הפידים בשרת הבית שלהם)
  • מעט מאוד סובלנות לרובוטים שמספימים, לדעתנו, את הפידים בפרסומים אוטומטיים מוגזמים
  • אפס סובלנות לרובוטים שעוברים על כללי השרת

שרתים חסומים

יש שרתים ברשת המבוזרת שלא ניתן להתחבר איתם דרך השרת כי הם חסומים.

Description:
mcr.wtf

This is community open to all whilst intended for people in, from, identify with or are just interested in Greater Manchester! The aim is to maintain an instance for general use but wouldn't it be nice to have a local timeline showing all the cool stuff going on in the best city in the world!

This is a friendly community. There are rules, which we will enforce, but they basically boil down to asking you to be nice. If you can't be nice, there's other instances for you to use. We federate with most instances but we will defederate from instances which host accounts which harass our users or repeatedly introduce unacceptable content on our timeline.

Help us out!

Running this server currently costs us about thirty quid a month. We expect that to grow. If you're able and you'd like to help out, you can buy us a coffee/beer here!
Short: A community open to all whilst intended for people in, from, identify with or are just interested in Greater Manchester!

Description:
We are the Mastodon server built by Earpers for Earpers. This instance exists to celebrate all things Wynonna Earp: The comic, the TV show, the cast and crew, and our famdom.

If you are here to Earp and want to build safe and supportive community together, we may be the home for you. We are LGBTQIA-forward and neurospicy-friendly. Most of our content is in English but we are a global community.

You as you are, are ok.

Everyone welcome*

E4L 📬

Code of Conduct

The code of conduct at Earp Nation can be summarized as "Do no harm, but take no shit." *Everyone welcome, but not all behavior is welcome. For more details our full code of conduct is being drafted (coming soon!)

Support Earp Nation

If you enjoy your time on Earp Nation and want to support what we're doing here, you can do so in a number of ways:

  • Our current hosting expenses are about 25USD a month, and we are covered for the next 6-9 months, but you can tip Admin here and every little bit helps!
  • Spread the word to other Earpers that we are here
  • Welcome new members & help each other learn to use our platform

Team

Dean owns and operates the server with the help of a team of Earpers:

  • @angels_shield, Dean's Admin Alt
  • @LyraSullyvanMod, Lyra's Moderator Alt

Reporting and moderation

When reporting accounts, please make sure to include at least a few posts that show rule-breaking behaviour, when applicable. If there is any additional context that might help make a decision, please also include it in the comment. This is especially important when the content is in a language nobody on the moderation team speaks.

We aim to handle reports within 24 hours. Please mind that you are not notified when a report you have made has led to a punitive action, and that not all punitive actions are externally visible. For first time offenses, we may opt to delete offending content, escalating to harsher measures on repeat offenses.

Community Events

Wherever you are on the Fediverse, you can join in!

Mondays

  • Celebrate Melanie Scrofano with #MelCrushMonday
  • New eps of Late Night at the Homestead drop wherever you get your podcasts

Tuesdays

  • Celebrate Tim Rozon and the men of Earp with #TimStacheTuesday

Wednesdays

  • Our holy day: #WayhaughtWednesday or #Wynaught rights, why pick just one?

Thursdays

  • Celebrate Dom P-C with #DomIsTheBombThursday
  • Earp Movie Watch, 8pm Eastern

Fridays

  • Party with #FandrasFriday, #FoundFamilyFriday

Saturdays

  • Celebrate Kat Barrell with #Katurday

Sundays

  • Celebrate the heart of our show with #EarpSistersSunday
  • Earp Movie Watch, Noon Eastern

We can also be found at #EarperCreations and #EarperSupport
Short: The Mastodon server built by Earpers for Earpers. If you are here to Earp and want to build safe and supportive community, we may be the home for you. Everyone welcome. We got you, Earp. E4L 📬

Description:
General

This instance is intended for the Babyfur community. Only 18+ members are allowed. This is a subculture of the Furry fandom. This is a safe space for all Babyfur related material. You WILL see diapers here!

Special features

This instance has some modifications from the standard Mastodon source:

  • Video file size up to 512MB (normal instances are 40MB) and resolution up to 3840x2160@60fps (normal instances are 1920x1200)
  • Image size up to 5120x2880
  • Avatars and profile banners up to 10MB (Normal instances are 2MB)

Server hardware specs

This server runs on physical hardware. It has dozens of cores, hundreds of gigabytes of memory and 36TB of ZFS RAID-Z storage with enterprise grade drives with 1TB of NVMe cache. It is in a datacenter and is backed up off-site daily. It also has multiple administrators.

New to Mastodon? Checkout How To Mastodon
Short: Babyfurs (furry subculture) instance. 18+ only.

Description:
האדמיניות פה בשבילכם!

  • דברו אלינו דרך החשבון (@staff)
  • נתקלתן במשתמשים או בתוכן שלא צריך להיות פה (גם בשרת הזה וגם בשרתים אחרים)? תחסמו בכיף, אבל גם תשתמשו בכלי של דיווח/report. זה לא מאסק או צוקי פה, אנחנו באמת רוצות לדעת ואנחנו על זה.

אזהרות תוכן

זה תוכן שסבבה לשים אצלינו, כל עוד הוא בא עם אזהרת תוכן (CW) והסתרת מדיה. אנחנו מבקשות להשתמש באזהרות תוכן במיוחד כאשר מדובר בתמונה או תיאורים גרפיים:

  • NSFW - מדיה או תוכן מילולי מיני מפורש שלא נעים לפתוח באוטובוס או בשולחן חג.
  • אלימות (פיזית, מינית, רגשית, כלכלית או אחרת) פגיעה עצמית (אובדנות, הרס עצמי, הפרעות אכילה, התמכרות וכו') - תיאורים מילוליים או גרפיים מפורטים של הנ"ל.
  • #בשר - תמונות של בשר (כולל דגים).
  • ספויילרים - לא נגלה לכם מה זה עד שתגיעו לעונה 5 (בגבולות ההיגיון).
  • קטעים מרצדים - אנימציות או סרטונים עם אורות מהבהבים, מרצדים או משתנים במהירות, בקיצור כל מה שעלול לגרום להתקף אפילפטי.

תיאור תמונות

כשאתן מעלים תמונות כדאי להוסיף תיאור מילולי של התמונה (דרך כפתור "עריכה" על התמונה שהעלתם > "תיאור לכבדי ראיה") כדי שקוראי טקסט אוטומטיים יוכלו להקריא אותו.

רובוטים

אנחנו שרת ידידותי לרובוטים, עד גבול מסוים.

  • בוטים מחוייבים לפרסם רק תחת הגדרות לא רשום/unlisted כדי שלא יספימו את הפיד המקומי/לוקלי.
  • זה כולל גם פרסום אוטומטי של ציוצים מטוויטר. כולן מוזמנים לפרסם פה דברים שפורסמו גם שם, כל עוד לא משתמשים בכלי אוטומטי עבור זה שמפרסם גם דברים בלי הקשר, אזהרות תוכן, או שימוש בתיאור תמונות.

תרומות לתחזוקת לפטודון

פטראון

קנרית צא"פ – 14 בדצמבר 2023

השרת לא קיבל אף מכתב רשמי או צו תחת איסור פרסום. הודעה זו תתעדכן עד 1 באפריל 2024 אם מצב זה לא השתנה.
Short: לפטודון הוא שרת פוליטי בעברית ברשת מסטודון החופשית בדגש על פוליטיקה שמאלית, סוציאליסטית, פמיניסטית, אנטי גזענית, ביקורתית ורדיקלית. מקום בשביל לחשוב ביחד, להחליף ידע ורעיונות, ליצור קשרים ולהתארגן.

Description:
Welcome to Furry.Energy!

This is a furry run mastodon server but is welcome to all.

Server Donations accepted at Patreon Personal donations accepted at: Ko-Fi

Official Accounts:

  • @Admin
  • @Transparency

Administrators

  • @Nightpaws
  • @TerrenceFoxFur

Moderators

  • @Grejurn

Trend Moderators

  • @CamashRed

Server Information:

This server is hosted on the Cloud in the UK with the following specifications:

  • 4x CPU Cores
  • 24 GB RAM
  • Media cache is being stored in UK Wasabi S3 storage
  • DNS & local caching via cloudflare.
  • HTTPS is served via Let's Encrypt
  • Data is encrypted in Transit & at Rest in the datacenter
  • Translation is provided by DeepL

Automation

  • Service Status: Uptime Robot (Bookmark this!)
  • Maintenance Job Status? (Backup/Cleanup/Cert Renewal):

This server uses Mutant Standard emoji, which are licensed under a CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 International License.

House Rules (Code of Conduct)

Last Updated: June 5th 2023

  1. You must be 18+ to join and above age of consent - whichever is higher in your jusidiction.
  2. Be nice to each other.
  3. Content warn all NSFW content with "NSFW" and other tags
  4. Illegal content will result in an immediate ban. Illegal is subject to UK Laws.
  5. No suggestive content depicting minors or 'cub' art.
  6. No slurs, transphobia, hate material, spam, AI/NFT art, discrimination or anything of the kind.
  7. Servers refusing to moderate such content will be blocked. Please notify a moderator if you become aware of such servers.
  8. These rules are subject to being amended and updated at any time. Updates will be accompanied by an announcement.
  9. Please review our Extended Code of Conduct and Terms of Service for more information.
Short:
Furry.Energy is a UK based Mastodon Server oriented towards those in the furry & LGBTQA+ communities.

Techie? Musician? Gamer? Hiking? Share your hobbies too, all are welcome!

Description:
Want to join Cloud Island?

Cloud Island is a paid membership instance, and payments are currently handled through the Cloud Island Patreon.

If you can't afford our subscription fee but would like to join anyway, please reach out via the contact information above!

About

Cloud Island is a paid membership, pro-actively moderated instance. Cloud Island exists because it's important to have locally-owned social networking, a neighbourhood community that's by us, for us, and seeks to resist the systemic oppression that may impact us.

We keep all our data in Aotearoa New Zealand, don't track you, and won't sell your data.

We're charging money to help get to a point where we can pay moderators and developers to improve both Cloud Island and the fediverse as a whole.

"Cloud Island" is a registered trademark of Eiara Limited.

Emoji

Pride flag emoji on this instance are CC-BY-SA, and can be found on Github.

Blobhaj emoji on this instance are CC-BY-4.0 https://plush.city/@heatherhorns and can be found on this post.

Can of worms, Enbyghost, Transghost, and Breaddab are courtesy of olivvysaur.

The x-ray emoji on this instance is CC-BY-SA 4.0, courtesy of OpenMoji.

The :forg:, :kakapo:, :shramp: and :subtoot: emoji are CC0, courtesy of https://mastodon.art/@Curator/.

The :rss: emoji is GPL licensed, sourced from Wikipedia

The :laserkiwi: emoji was sourced from Mastodon.nz, based on the "Fair use" terms listed on Wikipedia

Hosting

This instance is proudly hosted in Aotearoa New Zealand, on the Catalyst Cloud.

Code of Conduct

Version: 1.01
Last updated: 2022-12-01

TLDR:

Cloud Island has a zero-tolerance policy for racism, antisemitism, Islamophobia, xenophobia, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, casteism, and any other forms of discriminatory and bigoted conduct. Nudity, sexually graphic, and violent imagery is not permitted on Cloud Island.

Harassment of other fediverse users is not permitted on Cloud Island.

Misinformation and content harmful to the public good (for example, “5G causes coronavirus” or “vaccines cause autism”) is not allowed and will be removed, and may result in an account suspension.

Sexual harassment is an instant ban.

Far-right content, expression of far-right ideologies, and/or the advocation thereof is an instant ban.

Aside from producing legal nudity or sexually graphic imagery, Cloud Island considers all other conduct performed outside of Cloud Island to be applicable under this Code of Conduct, and users may be reported based on that conduct.

The Long Version

The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of Cloud Island; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

Unacceptable Content

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

  • Excessive advertising, and
  • Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources.

The following types of content will be removed, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:

  • Any nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions,
  • Any gore and/or extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions,
  • Racism or advocation of racism,
  • Sexism or advocation of sexism,
  • Distribution of content harmful to the public good, examples including (but not limited to):
    • “5G causes coronavirus”,
    • “Vaccines cause autism” (or, for clarity, any other anti-vaccine content)
  • Misinformation,
  • Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof,
    • Including "gender critical" and other transphobic content,
  • Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism, or the advocation thereof,
  • Casteism, or the advocation thereof, and
  • Ableism or the advocation thereof.

The following types of content are explicitly disallowed, and will result in permanent revocation of access to the service:

  • Content such as holocaust denial, Nazi symbolism, promoting the ideology of National Socialism, or any adjacent ideologies.

The following types of content are explicitly disallowed, will result in permanent revocation of access to the service, and will result in a referral of any and all user-generated content, including all personally identifiable information, to the New Zealand Police Force:

  • Content that is “objectionable”, as defined by the Films, Videos, and Publications Classification Act (1993),
  • Content that is in breach of Aotearoa New Zealand court-mandated suppression orders.

Harassment

Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilising the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service and/or referral to the New Zealand Police force, at our discretion.

This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviours:

  • Offensive comments related to gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, mental illness, neuro(a)typicality, physical appearance, body size, race, or religion,
  • Unwelcome comments regarding a person’s lifestyle choices and practices, including those related to food, health, parenting, drugs, and employment,
  • Deliberate misgendering or use of ‘dead’ or rejected names,
  • Gratuitous or off-topic sexual images or behaviour in spaces where they’re not appropriate,
  • Physical contact and simulated physical contact (eg, textual descriptions like “hug” or “backrub”) without consent or after a request to stop,
  • Threats of violence,
  • Incitement of violence towards any individual, including encouraging a person to commit suicide or to engage in self-harm,
  • Deliberate intimidation,
  • Stalking or following,
  • Harassing photography or recording, including logging online activity for harassment purposes,
  • Sustained disruption of discussion,
  • Unwelcome sexual attention,
  • Pattern of inappropriate social contact, such as requesting/assuming inappropriate levels of intimacy with others,
  • Continued one-on-one communication after requests to cease,
  • Deliberate “outing” of any aspect of a person’s identity without their consent except as necessary to protect vulnerable people from intentional abuse,
  • Publication of non-harassing private communication,
  • Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed,
  • Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxxing) may be considered harassment,
  • Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

Cloud Island and Eiara Limited prioritise the safety of marginalised people over the comfort of privileged people. As a result, we will not act on complaints regarding, but not limited to:

  • ‘Reverse’ -isms, including ‘reverse racism,’ ‘reverse sexism,’ and ‘cisphobia’,
  • Reasonable communication of boundaries, such as ‘leave me alone’, ‘go away’, or ‘I’m not discussing this with you’,
  • Communicating in a ‘tone’ you don’t find congenial, and
  • Criticising racist, sexist, cissexist, or otherwise oppressive behaviour or assumptions.

Participants asked to stop any harassing behaviour are expected to comply immediately.

Reporting

If you are being harassed by a user of Cloud Island, notice that someone else is being harassed, or have any other concerns, please contact Eiara Limited at abuse@cloudisland.nz, or using the ‘Report Post’ or ‘Report User’ feature in Mastodon.

If the person who is harassing you is on the moderation team, they will recuse themselves from handling your incident. We will respond as promptly as we can.

This Code of Conduct applies to Cloud Island, but if you are being harassed by a user of Cloud Island outside our Service, we still want to know about it.

We will take all good-faith reports of harassment by Cloud Island members, especially our moderation team, seriously. This includes harassment outside our spaces and harassment that took place at any point in time.

We reserve the right to exclude people from Cloud Island based on their past behaviour, including behaviour outside Cloud Island spaces and behaviour towards people who are not users of Cloud Island.

Reports intended to silence legitimate criticism may be deleted without response.

These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.
Short: A paid membership, strongly and pro-actively moderated Mastodon instance hosted entirely in Aotearoa New Zealand.

Description:
Unsere Community

Trete unserer freundlichen Creator Community bei, welche bereits viele bekannte deutsche Creator behaust, um

  • neue Creator kennen zu lernen
  • deine Fans auf ganz Mastodon auf dem Laufenden zu halten
  • Inspiration für neue Videos, Streams und mehr zu erhalten
  • Ein Abzeichen dir zu sichern, wenn du auf einer anderen Plattform verifiziert bist
  • Direkten Support zu erhalten

    • Wir freuen uns dich bei uns begrüßen zu dürfen. ☺️

    Profilliste

    Hier eine Auswahl an Creatorn, welche wir behausen: @Dechangeman @Razzortainment @Vlesk @apfeltalk @GermanLetsPlay @einHolzkopf @izzi @Endzeitkind @marmeladenoma @frankfurterbuchmesse ... Alle Profile

    Über uns

    Hey 👋🏼, Ich bin @janik, vielleich kennst du mich ja auch als Enkel der YouTuberin und Streamerin Marmeladenoma. Zusammen mit einem liebenswerten Moderationsteam betreibe ich diese Instanz um es Creatorn zu ermöglichen die Vorteile der Twitter Alternative Mastodon zu nutzen.
    Falls Fragen bestehen, könnt ihr euch jederzeit an unsere Mail wenden. Wir helfen euch gerne weiter. 🙂

    Unser Ziel

    Unser Antrieb ist es Personen zu zeigen, dass Mastodon eine fantastische Alternative zu Twitter darstellt. Mastodon ist komplett dezentral, Open-Source, Unabhängig von der Werbeindustrie und untereinander vernetzt.

    Mit einer großen Creator Community, welche als Vorbild agiert, können wir genau das erreichen und Follower auf Mastodon aufmerksam machen, zusätzlich innerhalb der Community können wir coole Events und Projekte umsetzen.

    Finanzierung

    Unsere Instanz wird komplett ehrenamtlich moderiert und administriert, sowie die monatlichen Domain- und Serverkosten eigens bezahlt.



    Über Spenden freuen wir uns selbstverständlich immer und wir bedanken uns bei dir mit einem exklusiven Abzeichen, welches du für dein Profil verwenden kannst.

    Beständigkeit des Dienstes

  • Unser Server ist Mitglied des Mastodon Server Covenant
  • Alle Daten werden täglich durch Backups gesichert
  • Eine Stilllegung des Servers oder eine Übergabe wird drei Monate im Voraus angekündigt
  • Sollte es einem Admin aus gesundheitlichen Gründen nicht möglich sein die Instanz zu verwalten, sind Notfallzugänge vorhanden

    • Impressum


    Marmeladenoma
    c/o Postflex #2771
    Emsdettener Str. 10
    48268 Greven

    Keine Pakete oder Päckchen - Annahme wird verweigert!

    USt-ID: DE310728507

    Haftungsausschluss

    Unser Angebot enthält Links zu externen Webseiten Dritter, auf deren Inhalte wir keinen Einfluss haben. Deshalb können wir für diese fremden Inhalte auch keine Gewähr übernehmen. Für die Inhalte der verlinkten Seiten ist stets der jeweilige Anbieter oder Betreiber der Seiten verantwortlich. Eine permanente inhaltliche Kontrolle der verlinkten Seiten ist jedoch ohne konkrete Anhaltspunkte einer Rechtsverletzung nicht zumutbar. Bei Bekanntwerden von Rechtsverletzungen werden wir derartige Links umgehend entfernen.
Short: Friendly Creator Community 🙂 exclusively for YouTubers, Streamers and other people from the video, film, gaming and social media industry. 🇩🇪🇺🇸🇬🇧

Description:
You can help support this community with a donation to our Patreon.

Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct

Our Pledge

In the interest of fostering an open and welcoming environment, we as contributors and maintainers pledge to make participation in our project and our community a harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of age, body size, disability, ethnicity, sex characteristics, gender identity and expression, level of experience, education, socio-economic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, or sexual identity and orientation.

Our Standards

Examples of behavior that contributes to creating a positive environment include:

  • Using welcoming and inclusive language
  • Being respectful of differing viewpoints and experiences
  • Gracefully accepting constructive criticism
  • Focusing on what is best for the community
  • Showing empathy towards other community members

Examples of unacceptable behavior by participants include:

  • The use of sexualized language or imagery and unwelcome sexual attention or advances
  • Trolling, insulting/derogatory comments, and personal or political attacks
  • Public or private harassment
  • Publishing others’ private information, such as a physical or electronic address, without explicit permission
  • Other conduct which could reasonably be considered inappropriate in a professional setting

All toots (public and private) should abide by the following rules:

  • Do not post any illegal content, including sexual depictions of children, or any other content illegal in the United States.
  • Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, genderist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia or other hateful ideologies.
  • Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks.
  • Posting or threatening to post other people’s personally identifying information (“doxing”) constitutes harassment.
  • Do not be intentionally antagonistic. A post or reply designed to provoke a confrontation is not acceptable.
  • Do not post adult content without a content warning, including pictures containing nudity, or unwelcome sexual attention (including sexualized comments or jokes).
  • Do not spread disinformation or conspiracy theories that undermine public health. Healthy scientific debate is allowed but baseless, harmful conspiracies will not be tolerated.
  • Holocaust denial, Nazi symbolism, and promotion of National Socialism is strictly forbidden.
  • Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags constitute spam, as does any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine, however, to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on — just keep the toot itself interesting).
  • Do not use automated tools to toot without participating in the community, without explicit permission from the the administrator and/or moderators of vermont.masto.host. It is fine to post with an automated tool (e.g., a Twitter cross-poster) so long as you are an active member of the vermont.masto.host community and respond to replies you receive here. However, unmonitored accounts that post automatically are not acceptable.

    • Our Responsibilities

    Project maintainers are responsible for clarifying the standards of acceptable behavior and are expected to take appropriate and fair corrective action in response to any instances of unacceptable behavior.

    Project maintainers have the right and responsibility to remove, edit, or reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, and other contributions that are not aligned to this Code of Conduct, or to ban temporarily or permanently any contributor for other behaviors that they deem inappropriate, threatening, offensive, or harmful.

    Scope

    This Code of Conduct applies within all project spaces, and it also applies when an individual is representing the project or its community in public spaces.

    Examples of representing a project or community include using an official project e-mail address, posting via an official social media account, or acting as an appointed representative at an online or offline event. Representation of a project may be further defined and clarified by project maintainers.

    Enforcement

    Instances of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be reported by contacting the project team at brendankinney AT gmail.com. All complaints will be reviewed and investigated and will result in a response that is deemed necessary and appropriate to the circumstances. The project team is obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident.

    Further details of specific enforcement policies may be posted separately. Project maintainers who do not follow or enforce the Code of Conduct in good faith may face temporary or permanent repercussions as determined by other members of the project’s leadership.

    Attribution

    This Code of Conduct is adapted from the Contributor Covenant, version 1.4, available at https://www.contributor-covenant.org/version/1/4/code-of-conduct.html

    For answers to common questions about this code of conduct, see https://www.contributor-covenant.org/faq

Description:
Safe space for naturists

Welcome to The Body Social, an intentional community of naturists looking for a space to build friendships with like-minded people and share simple nudity safely inside the fediverse.

Beliefs

  • I only get one body, so I'm going to enjoy it
  • I put health and happiness above the expectations of others
  • I prefer to be naked when I can be
  • I think there's more to nudity than sex and showering
  • We are a group about body diversity and body acceptance

Audience

Mastodon and the fediverse, collectively, encompass around 11 million users and around 1.8 million active users per month (source: FediDB). Our community is intentionally small, but has access to 25,000 other communities which can be seamlessly followed and posted to from the comfort of The Body Social.

Moderation

Keeping a safe space for naturists requires moderation that can't commonly be found in larger communities. We're here to treat our members with care and help them grow by moderating from a philosophy compatible with their own.

Promise

Our promises are to keep your data backed up and safe and your experience here seamless and uninterrupted.

Funding

The Body Social is self-funded at the moment and not seeking any funding.
Short: Body positivity and acceptance social network celebrating our bodies.

Description:
This is a Mastodon server for discussing neuroscience and related topics. We welcome all humans who are interested in how the nervous system works. This includes research neuroscientists in academia and industry as well as artists, educators, students, and others who are exploring neuroscience in their life and work.

Although this server is focused on neuroscience, you're open to post about other topics of interest as well. The vibe of this server is a cafe conversation, where the topic might shift from fly connectomics to issues in psychiatry to shared knitting hobbies. Let's get to know each other!

Encouraged uses of Synapse Cafe

  • Share your discoveries
  • Share your work-in-progress
  • Talk about your experiences learning or applying neuroscience
  • Share summaries of articles you've read
  • Discuss current issues in neuroscience
  • Discuss relevant issues in academia and industry

Longevity of the server

We commit to maintaining this server for the foreseeable future. The server itself is hosted on a computer through Hertzner which is backed up daily to prevent data loss. We can cover the current server costs (about $50 / month), but if the server needs to scale further we will ask for donations. We currently anticipate maintaining this server for years. However, in the case that we need to close the server down, we will provide at least 3 months notice to give you time to migrate.

Domain blocking policy

Our goal in blocking domains is to reduce attacks on users as well as remove hateful content from the federated timeline. We will add new domains to the block list by monitoring #fediblock, the block lists of similar servers, and based on user reports.

Header image

The header image is a drawing of a dog's olfactory bulb by Camillo Golgi, in the public domain.
Short: A Mastodon instance for anyone interested in neuroscience, from cell biology to electrophysiology to behavior to clinical applications, anyone is welcome!

Description:
欢迎来到 Mastodon.IM !

在这里，你可以通过发布“嘟嘟”来吐槽一切、摸鱼扯皮。无论你的兴趣点是什么，我们欢迎任何热情、友好、乐于分享的朋友们加入。请遵循互相尊重的原则，并遵守本站的《主题或发言规则》。

本站点基于开源软件长毛象（Mastodon）建立。不同于微博或 Twitter，这是一个开源的去中心化社交网络。去中心化设计防止社交数据被利益集团垄断，也增加了屏蔽审查的难度。整个长毛象网络由上千个实例组成，这些实例相互连接，最终形成了一个庞大的网络，就像是一个巨大宇宙。每一个服务器都是宇宙中的一个星系，用户就是每个星系里的行星。你可以随时导出自己的账户并转移到其他实例中，无需担心因为实例运营者的问题导致的数据丢失。

请参阅《长毛象中文用户使用文档》了解如何使用长毛象。

自定义表情包

  • 阿鲁 - 作者 @_SiC_
  • blobcat - 来源 GNU/blobcat
  • 小仓鼠- 来源 ACG.MN
  • 小鹦鹉 - 来源 今天你要来点帕秋莉吗？
  • 条鹅 - 2to2.xyz
  • 草莓县 - 来源 m.cmx.im
  • 阪本さん - 来源动画《日常》 - 制作 @kiokio@onlycasino.legal
  • 魔法猫猫的约 - 作者 水户城杨桃

Description:
About

Wikis World is a Mastodon server for wiki enthusiasts. You're welcome to post about anything, it doesn't all have to be about wikis.

All content is default licensed as CC BY-SA 4.0 (content posted before July 1, 2023 is default licensed as CC BY-SA 3.0); fair use is allowed.

The instance administrators are Kunal Mehta and Taavi Väänänen. There are also other moderators, who are listed here. There is an @announcements account for important instance announcements and news.

While the people behind Wikis World are active in the Wikimedia spheres, Wikis World is not affiliated with the Wikimedia Foundation (who have their own instance at wikimedia.social). And Wikis World is not about Wikimedia specifically either, people affiliated with other wiki projects are also welcome.

Rules

  • No advertising or excessive promotion.
  • No bots, unless they're cute, funny, or useful. Bots should avoid posting to the public timeline.
  • No pornography.
  • No gore or graphic violence. Content that is borderline NSFW or could be construed as NSFW at a glance should be put behind a CW (Content Warning).
  • No racism.
  • No sexism.
  • No homophobia nor transphobia.
  • No discrimination based on gender, sexual minority, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, religion (or lack thereof), or national origin.
  • No xenophobia, nationalism, casteism, or fascism; No sympathizing with or advocating for these things.
  • No sexual depictions of children.
  • No holocaust denialism, No Nazi symbolism, No promotion of National Socialism.
  • No stalking or harassment. In general, if someone asks you to stop interacting with them, then stop. Stalking, harassment, hate speech, or doxing that is posted to other instances or on other social media platforms is still grounds for having your account terminated here.
  • No posting (or threatening to post) other people's personally identifying information ("doxing").
  • No unwelcome sexual attention.
  • No public or private oppressive language or actions.
  • No promotion of conspiracy theories (eg anti-vax, anti-mask, anti-COVID).
  • No unsolicited advice to strangers.
  • No advocating for, or encouraging, any of the above behaviour.
  • No other unethical conduct.
  • No scraping content from web interface or API.

To protect the free speech of users belonging to marginalized groups, we do not federate with overtly fascist instances. Additionally, we will refuse to federate with instances that themselves choose to federate with fascist instances.

Handling harassment

If you are being harassed, please report the user using the "…" button and then "Report."

If you engage in harassing behavior, the moderator may take any action they deem appropriate, such as a warning or an expulsion.

The above rules may change at any time, and you may be banned at any time based on the moderators' judgment.

Privacy policy

This service is hosted by masto.host in the EU. Please review their terms of service and privacy policy. For content mirrored or federated from other fediverse instances and websites, refer to the responsibilities and rights of the respective sources. No personal data is processed by us other than what is performed by masto.host to run this service.

Also, for truly private data sent between two people, Mastodon offers no end-to-end encryption. So use Signal for the things you really want to be private.

History and thanks

Wikis World was launched in October 2022 in the wake of the mastodon.technology shutdown. Our rules and guidelines were originally copied from there.

The signpost "mascot" was created by Bin im Garten and is in the public domain.

We use several third-party emoji sets. The licensing details for those are available on Wikimedia Meta-Wiki.
Short: Wikis World is a Mastodon server for wiki enthusiasts.

Description:
この文章は、2020年12月01日より適用されています。楽しみ方やルールについてはこちら。

Please Read,

im@stodon is unofficial mastodon instance for fans of THE IDOLM@STER. If you speak English or Chinese, you can choose imastodon.org. Of course, you can choose also this instance.

imastodon.blue とは？

マストドン・アイマストドンとは

マストドンは、テーマごとに「個人でも」作ることができるSNSです。それぞれのサーバのユーザーは相互にフォローでつながることができるので、各サーバでアカウントを作成する必要はありません。

アイマストドンとは、アイマスについての非公式マストドンサーバです。現在、アイマストドンのサーバは管理運営が違う3つが存在します。

  • imastodon.net - フサギコ氏運営の、日本語圏の総合アイマスサーバ。
  • imastodon.org - SeatouP運営の、中国語圏、英語圏のアイマスサーバ。
  • imastodon.blue - やきゅ・やきたま運営の、ハッシュタグでいろんな話題をしゃべることができるアイマスサーバ。

お好きなインスタンスを選べるようになっています！

imastodon.blueって何が違うの？

サーバの「ローカルルール・利用規約」がアイマストドン.netとは少しだけ違い、「ハッシュタグ」と、「タグタイムライン」の利用を推奨していますが、見た目・SNSとしての仕組みは同一です。

登録確認メールが来ない場合

登録確認等の自動メールは notify@imastodon.blue より届きますので、受信トレイ等に見当たらない場合には検索してみてください。それでも見当たらない場合は notify@imastodon.blue に登録したメールアドレスとともに問い合わせメールを送ってください。

アカウント削除について

凍結や見せないようにすることはできても、完全な削除は仕様上以下の理由で困難です。

  • 接続したマストドン他サーバに負担がかかる
  • 検索サービスやサーバ外に流れて行った投稿が全て削除されるとは限らない
  • このサーバの同じIDは二度と取れない

どうしても削除したいのであれば、見えない措置でなんとかするのでご相談ください。

～

本サーバについて

本サーバは個人が構築ならびに運用を行っていますので、他の法人、団体へのお問合せはおやめください。

本サーバのソースコードは、AGPL3.0ライセンスに基づきこちらのgithubリポジトリにて公開しています。

アイマストドンのサーバ費用はこちらの一部から賄われています。ご支援の際はこちらよりお申し出ください。
Argazki partekatze euskaldun, libre eta federatua

Description:
申请加入

欢迎各位加入我们的大家庭！有大家的社区更温馨～

账户安全

请严格保管好您的邮箱地址、登录密码、二次验证信息和恢复代码等关键内容。
  1. 本站已启用基于邮件认证的账号恢复机制，因而只要邮件服务器不存在问题，您应当是可以直接恢复您的账号访问权的；
  2. 如果您无法接收到重置邮件，请使用您的注册邮箱与我们管理团队取得联系；
  3. 如果您已丢失对于您注册邮箱的访问权，并且无法登录您的账号，那么出于安全方面的考虑，请恕我们无法验证您的身份，您可能需要获取一个新的账号信息。

我们提供的服务

  1. Mastodon：去中心化的微型博客平台。就是主站啦。
  2. Matrix：去中心化的即时通讯平台。网页客户端可以戳 这里 哦。

一些小工具

  1. 主站负载：运行在本站的服务器状态监控页面，可以戳 这里 哦。
  2. 系统状态监测：系统的运行状态检查平台，可以戳 这里 哦。

补充说明

  1. 本站由 Nyawork 全资赞助运营。
  2. 站点图片加工自Picrew#630769，模型作者为 鯨魚躍清魚
  3. 服务器走了一层CloudFlare反向代理保护，直接连接的质量可能不佳，建议您检查您的互联网联通情况。
以上便是本站的全部使用条款，本站的内容规范与隐私政策请移步/terms，诶嘿 (. ❛ ᴗ ❛.) 全体管理人员预祝您使用愉快。

Description:
Khiar Code of Conduct

This code of conduct is inspired by the CoC in Fosstodon.org & Mas.to. We thank them for providing a good template for us to work on.

What Khiar is

  • A fruit (cucumber).
  • A place for Farsi and/or English speakers.
  • A place for discussion, community and friendly interactions of all kinds
  • A place to make friends.
  • A place to share what you’re excited about, things you enjoy and things you don’t.
  • A general platform with no real subject or topic that tries to foster an environment where everyone can be included.

What Khiar is not

  • A place to promote your ideology or politics.
  • A safe-haven for all speech.
  • A platform for any specific cause.
  • A platform that supports/condones extreme views.

Rules for All Toots

All toots (public and private) should abide by the following rules:

  • Do not post extreme adult content.
  • Adult-themed humor is permitted so long it is not directed towards an individual.
  • Child sexual abuse material (CSAM) is not permitted. Any attempt to sexualize children (anyone under the age of 18) is also not permitted.
  • Content illegal in the United Kingdom is not allowed and will result in revocation of access.
  • Any hate speech or discrimination of any group of people, nationality, ethnicity, religion, gender, sexual orientation is not tolerated and will result in immediate moderator action.
  • Do not engage in personal attacks, all disagreements and arguments must remain civil. There will always be a difference in opinions, we must learn to respect that.
  • Do not engage in back-seat moderation. If you see any inappropriate behavior or violations of this CoC, refrain from engaging and report the offending toot.
  • Do not spam or post commercial advertisements.
  • Posting or threatening to post other people’s personally identifying information (“doxing”) is prohibited.
  • Any depiction of extreme violence content is out of bound and will result in moderator action.
  • Bots are not allowed unless given explicit permission from the moderation team.

Rules for Public Toots

Public toots should follow the above rules and should also abide by the following additional rules. Your boosts (reblogs) are also considered as public toots:

  • Do not debate moderation actions in public toots. If you disagree with how a moderator enforced this CoC you may direct-message the moderation team.
  • Any mild adult content must include a “content warning”.
  • Do not toot in languages other than English and Farsi.

Reporting Violations

If you notice a toot that violates this code of conduct, please report it. It is easy to assume that someone else has already reported a toot, but it is easy for everyone to feel that way and no one to report the toot. If you feel personally uncomfortable with the kind of attention you’re receiving, please reach out to the moderation team.

Catch-all

The moderation team will always take a pragmatic approach to every report they receive - if they feel that a problematic Toot isn’t explicitly called out in this CoC, yet is inappropriate for Khiar, the Toot will likely be removed, and the member will be dealt with appropriately.

Registration

Registration on Khiar is approval-based. Everyone’s allowed to fill out a registration form, but with an additional form entry for mentioning why you want to join. It is advisable to write a brief introductory paragraph in the registration form.

خط مشیٔ خیار

این خط مشیٔ از نمونه‌های Fosstodon و Mas.to الهام گرفته شده. ما از آن‌ها برای در اختیار قراردادن یک قالب خوب تشکر می‌کنیم.

خیار چیست

  • یک میوه.
  • جایی برای فارسی و/یا انگلیسی زبانان.
  • جایی برای تعاملات دوستانه، بحث و اجتماع.
  • جایی برای پیدا کردن دوست.
  • جایی برای نشر آنچه شما را به وجد می‌آورد، به آنچه علاقه دارید و آنچه علاقه ندارید.
  • بستری عمومی بدون موضوع خاصی که سعی می‌کند محیطی پرورش دهد تا همه بتوانند. بخشی از آن باشند.

آنچه خیار نیست

  • جایی که ایدئولوژی یا نظر سیاسی خود را ترویج دهید.
  • یک پناهگاه امن برای همهٔ گفتارها.
  • جایی در راستای هدفی خاص.
  • جایی که نظرات افراطی را پشتیبانی یا محکوم می‌کند.

قوانین همهٔ بوق‌ها

همهٔ بوق‌ها (چه عمومی و چه غیرعمومی) می‌بایست از قوانین زیر پیروی کنند.

  • محتوای شدید بزرگسالان ارسال نکنید.
  • شوخی با مضمون بزرگسالان تا وقتی که به سمت یک شخص جهت‌دار نباشد، مجاز است.
  • مطالب سوء استفاده جنسی از کودکان مجاز نیست. هر تلاشی در راستای استفاده جنسی از کودکان (افراد زیر ۱۸ سال) نیز مجاز نیست.
  • هر مطلب غیرقانونی در کشور انگلیس مجاز نیست و به ابطال دسترسی خواهد انجامید.
  • هر گونه سخن تنفر یا تبعیض‌آمیز شامل هر گروه افراد، ملیت، قومیت، دین، جنسیت و گرایش جنسی تحمل نشده و به اقدام مدیریتی خواهد انجامید.
  • در حملات شخصی مشارکت نکنید. همه اختلافات و بحث‌ها باید مدنی باقی بماند. همواره تفاوت در عقیده‌ها وجود دارد؛ باید یاد بگیریم به آن احترام بگذاریم.
  • نقش مدیر به خود نگیرید. اگر رفتار ناشایستی را می‌بینید که ناقض این خط مشیٔ است، از برخورد مستقیم خودداری کنید و تنها آن‌را گزارش دهید.
  • از ارسال اسپم و مطالب تبلیغاتی خودداری کنید.
  • ارسال یا تهدید به ارسال اطلاعات هویتی شخصی مجاز نیست.
  • هر گونه مطلب که خشونت شدید را تصویرسازی کند ممنوع و فرای مرز این خط مشیٔ بوده و به اقدام مدیریتی خواهد انجامید.
  • ربات‌ها تا زمانی که اجازه صریح از تیم مدیریت دریافت نکنند، مجاز به فعالیت نیستند.

قوانین برای بوق‌های عمومی

  • بوق‌های عمومی علاوه بر قوانین قبلی می‌بایست در راستای این قوانین نیز باشند. بوق‌هایی که تقویت (بوست) می‌کنید نیز جزو بوق‌های عمومی قرار می‌گیرند.
  • درباره اقدامات مدیریتی در بوق‌های عمومی بحث نکنید. اگر با این‌که چطور یک مدیر این خط مشیٔ را اجرایی کرده مخالفت دارید، می‌توانید به تیم مدیریت پیام خصوصی دهید.
  • هر محتوای خفیف بزرگسالان می‌بایست دارای برچسب «اخطار محتوا» باشد.
  • در زبان‌هایی غیر از انگلیسی و فارسی بوق ارسال نکنید.

گزارش تخلفات

اگر متوجه شدید بوقی این خط مشیٔ را نقض می‌کند، لطفا آن‌را گزارش دهید. آسان است که گمان کنیم یک نفر از قبل آن‌را گزارش کرده اما ممکن است همه با همین فکر چیزی را گزارش نکنند. همچنین اگر شخصا با نوع توجهی که دریافت می‌کنید احساس راحتی ندارید، آن‌را به تیم مدیریت گزارش کنید.

بررسی همه

تیم مدیریت با هر گزارشی که دریافت می‌کند، رویکرد عمل‌گرا خواهد داشت. اگر ایشان احساس کنند یک بوق مشکل‌دار توسط خط مشیٔ مشخص نشده درحالی که برای خیار مناسب نیست، آن بوق حذف خواهد شد و با کاربر برخورد مناسب می‌شود.

ثبت‌نام

ثبت‌نام در خیار مبتنی بر تایید است. همه می‌توانند فرم ثبت‌نام که بخش «دلیل عضویت» دارد را پر کنند. مطلوب است بند کوتاهی در باب معرفی خودتان در فرم ثبت‌نام بنویسید.
