Description:
Welcome to woof.tech!

Running on woof'ing technology

Short introduction

This instance has been made to increase the options between queer and furry servers! We're aiming to be a nice and friendly instance 🐕!

Everyone who feels like they fit our environment is welcome, although this is an instance for queer, furry or tech people, anyone is welcome as long as they're respectful.

For questions please let me know over at @Purple, or use the email address located on this about page.

Staff

This instance is currently managed by the following team members:

Admin: 🐶 @Purple
Co-Admin: 🐺 @unlobito

Configuration

Character limit: 1500 Characters
Advanced Search: Supported (+ Extended search patch)
Post translation: Supported

Management and Rules

Our server rules are made to provide a guideline on how to behave on our instance, please check them when unsure about something. The rules may change from time to time, if noteworthy changes are in effect this will be communicated through announcements.

As this server is predominantly queer, we have a zero-tolerance policy for hate (especially homophobia and transphobia). If you feel like this may clash with your personal beliefs we'd prefer you finding a different instance.

Questions about our rules are always appreciated, don't hesitate to contact an Admin if anything is unclear.

Instance maintainability

I (@Purple) consider it important for an instance to be flexible and maintainable. Users of our instance rely on it being available and staying available in the foreseeable future and any doubt of this may hurt trust in this instance.

Because of this when setting up this instance I've made sure it's scalable, with minimal effort we can easily scale up to support thousands of users without major upgrades to how the infrastructure is set up.

Our current setup looks like this:

Server hosting:

We're currently hosting our instance on Hetzner's Cloud service. This allows us to easily scale up the amount of CPU cores or memory with downtime of less than a few minutes.

Our servers are located in Finland, Europe and currently exist out of 3 VMs for future-proofing and scalability. They have a combined 6 CPU Cores and 14GB of ram.

We can reasonably scale the main server up to 16 cores + 64GB ram before we should look into other options, it's unlikely we'd need to make major changes to our architecture until we hit a few thousand active users or more.

I'm a Linux System Administrator by trade with experience with scaling and optimisation, so this instance strongly benefits from my personal experience in this field :)

Storage hosting:

For our storage of our cache content, we use our own S3 solution hosted in The Netherlands. For user content, content we use Scaleway's S3. Using Scaleway allows us to pay only for the storage we use, with the added benefit of not having to worry about running out of space.

Using S3 means we can more easily move our server around if this happens to be needed, making a migration quick and painless. It also offloads the responsibility of serving image and video content away from our main server.

Our storage location for image and video content is The Netherlands, our storage location for backups is France as Scaleway offers additional data redundancy there.

CDN hosting:

Making sure our instance stays fast and responsive, we make use of Bunny.net's CDN service to serve our static image and video content. Especially users outside of Europe will benefit from this as it will provide significantly lower latency for popular cached content.

Data retention

Because of how federation works, your posts (even through deleted) may hang around on other servers. Although mastodon will inform those instances the post has been removed, we can't guarantee other instances successfully receive or honour this request. This rarely seems to be an issue, but it is something to keep in mind when posting anything to the internet.

When you remove a post the following happens on our side:

Text content

The post itself is removed from our database right away and is inaccessible for anyone including administrators. The only place it may stay around is our backups, which are permanently removed after 60 days. These backups are never accessed unless in a recovery scenario.

Timeline:
- Inaccessible (Through timeline): Right away
- Inaccessible (Through direct URL): Right away
- Permanently unrecoverable: 60 days

Image/Video content

Although the content is removed from our storage provider right away, it may stay available through our CDN for a prolonged amount of time for users who have the exact URL to the images. We're working on a solution to immediately remove the content from our CDN, but this currently is not possible.

The CDN will lose the content after it has not been accessed for a bit. However because the CDN caching servers will only remove content if it deems caching other files more important (more frequently accessed etc.), it is hard to tell the exact timeframe.

We will purge the cache a few times a year to allow all files to be refreshed, regardless of file popularity. However unless someone has been constantly refreshing the URL every couple of hours to keep it considered "HOT" on the CDN the file will be gone in a day.

Timeline:
- Inaccessible (Through timeline): Right away
- Inaccessible (Through direct URL): Usually: 4-48 hours, but up to 120 days - Permanently unrecoverable: Usually: 4-48 hours, but up to 120 days

Relays

We're currently connected to the following relays to improve and expand our federation with the rest of the network:

  • relay.awoo.today
  • relay.asonix.dog
  • relay.gay
  • relay.tiggi.es

Donations

Although we appreciate the generosity, we're currently not accepting donations. The operating costs are low enough to not warrant them for now. If this situation ever changes, an option for donating might become available in the future.

For any questions regarding this subject please contact @Purple
Short: Queer, tech and furry instance. Open to anyone that fits the atmosphere, come on in!

Description:
Photo taken by @mikeenerio.

About

This Mastodon server is free to use for Singaporeans local and abroad, or anyone who has accepted Singlish 😬.

How to use?

  • Simply post texts, links, pictures, videos, gifs or even a poll!
  • Only see posts from the people you follow.
Your privacy is important to us, please note, all posts including DMs are not end-to-end encrypted by design. Have fun and toot!

Follow @Mastodon for updates and announcements.

Server Info

This server is hosted in Singapore.
  • 4 vCPU
  • 8GB Memory
  • BackBlaze B2 Media Storage w/ Cloud Replication
  • Cloudflare CDN, DDOS & WAF Protection
  • SMTP2GO Email Delivery
  • Full-text search and Translation supported
  • Hourly Backups locally and remotely

Check out our Status Page and stats from FediDB.

Moderation

Moderators reserve the right to suspend/restrict Users who go against the rules of this server.
Please report any wrongdoings and we’ll do our best to investigate.

Mastodon Covenant

Our server meets the Mastodon Server Covenant.

Community Support & Sponsor(s)

We do not serve Ads or sell your data, we rely solely on your support and our Sponsor(s). You can support us by donating to Ko-Fi.

We would like to thank our sponsor(s) for keeping the lights running.

  • Sohwatt LLP

Bots, Companies & Brands

Please contact us @ enterprise@mastodon.sg.
Any creation without prior approval will result in account suspension.
Short:
Hosted in Singapore 🇸🇬
For Singaporeans local and abroad or friends of Singapore, welcome!

Description:
Welcome to a new community for all No Man's Sky fans! 🚀 Hosted by Assistant Apps.

Kzzt...Kzzt... We support a post limits of 1616 characters! 😎.

What is Mastodon?

You are likely coming from Twitter and that is ok! Welcome to a little part of the Fediverse. If you are not familiar with any of this, I would suggest having a look at some of these awesome pages.

docs.joinmastodon.org - https://axbom.com/fediverse

Sign-ups

  • Sign-ups are on an approval basis in order prevent bad actors/bots.
  • Please let us know in the request field that you play NMS, but even if you don't you are still welcome.
  • There are serval Invite Codes floating around in the wild, check with your favorite NMS Content Creators, and if they don't have one have then reach out to us.

Mastodon Covenant

We abide by the covenant set forth by the community, and open-source contributors, as listed at joinmastodon.org/covenant.

Moderation

  • We take the safety of our users very seriously, and review every report with respect to our rules, and in the best judgment of the mod/admin team.
  • At this time we do not publish what instances we defederate from but tend to lean towards the Tier 0 Oliphant.Social Shared Blocklist.
  • Our Mod team is pretty small at the moment and we ask you to give us some leeway in regards to response times.

Fun stuff 🥳

  • Checkout our list of emojis
  • We have various No Man's Sky bots to interact with!
    • @quicksilverCompanion (Tracks Community Mission Status)
    • @nada@ (Tracks NMS Game Updates)
    • @assistantnmstracker (Tracks multiple things, like new posts ie patch notes on the HG website)
    • @ariadne (Talk to Ariadne when they are not greeting new travelers on the Anomaly)
    • @TheRealAriadne (Talk to Ariadne when they are not greeting new travelers on the Anomaly)

Support the instance 💖

If you want to help support check out the AssistantApps Patreon you can also reach us at the AssistantApps Discord.

Contact

If you need to contact the admin team for any reason please reach out to:

  • Admin: Khaoz-Topsy @AssistantNMS/@khaoztopsy
  • Admin: Cyberpunk2350 @Cyberpunk2350

NOTE: This is a Fan Project and We are NOT affiliated with Hello Games.
Short:
A community for all No Man's Sky fans!🚀
We strive to keep this server safe & fun for all travelers!☄️

NOTE: This is a Fan Project & We are NOT affiliated with Hello Games

IMPRESSUM

Handelsregister FFM

Jugendschutzbeauftragter gemäß § 7 JMStV
Rechtsanwalt Marko Dörre
Marienstr. 8, D-10117 Berlin
Tel. 030 / 400 544-99
www.doerre.com
Datenschutzbeauftragte:
Christiane Meyer
E-Mail: datenschutz@ladies.de
Ver­ant­wort­li­che Per­sonen für die re­dak­tio­nel­len In­hal­te die­ser Seite iSd. § 55 Abs.2 RStV sind:
Sa­bi­ne Meyer, Wolf­gang Titsch (An­schrift s. o.)
Haftung für Inhalte

Als Diensteanbieter sind wir gemäß § 7 Abs.1 TMG für eigene Inhalte auf diesen Seiten nach den allgemeinen Gesetzen verantwortlich. Wir weisen jedoch darauf hin, dass die von uns zur Verfügung gestellten Beiträge keine juristische Fachberatung ersetzen. Es handelt sich dabei lediglich um allgemeine Informationen, deren Korrektheit, Vollständigkeit, Aktualität und/oder Qualität wir nicht gewähleisten oder zusichern können.

Nach §§ 8 bis 10 TMG sind wir als Diensteanbieter nicht verpflichtet, übermittelte oder gespeicherte, fremde Informationen zu überwachen oder nach Umständen zu forschen, die auf eine rechtswidrige Tätigkeit hinweisen. Verpflichtungen zur Entfernung oder Sperrung der Nutzung von Informationen nach den allgemeinen Gesetzen bleiben hiervon unberührt. Eine diesbezügliche Haftung ist jedoch erst ab dem Zeitpunkt der Kenntnis einer konkreten Rechtsverletzung möglich. Bei Bekanntwerden von entsprechenden Rechtsverletzungen werden wir diese Inhalte umgehend entfernen.

Haftung für Links

Unsere Angebote und Dienste enthalten u.a. Verweisziele ("Links") zu externen Webseiten Dritter, auf deren Inhalte wir keinen Einfluss haben. Deshalb können wir für diese fremden Inhalte sowie die rechtliche Korrektheit, Vollständigkeit und Verfügbarkeit keine Gewähr übernehmen. Für die Inhalte der verlinkten Seiten sowie entstehende Schäden, die aus der Nutzung oder Nichtnutzung solcher Art dargebotener Informationen entstehen, ist stets der jeweilige Anbieter oder der Betreiber der Seite, auf die verwiesen wurde, verantwortlich. Diese Einschränkung gilt gleichermaßen für Fremdeinträge in das Gästebuch.

Die verlinkten Seiten werden zum Zeitpunkt der Verlinkung auf mögliche Rechtsverstöße überprüft, insbesondere auf Verstöße zivilrechtlicher, strafrechtlicher und jugendschutzrechtlicher Art. Rechtswidrige Inhalte waren zum Zeitpunkt der Verlinkung nicht erkennbar. Eine permanente inhaltliche Kontrolle der verlinkten Seiten ist jedoch ohne konkrete Anhaltspunkte einer Rechtsverletzung nicht zumutbar. Bei Bekanntwerden von etwaigen Rechtsverletzungen werden wir pflichtgemäß handeln und derartige Links umgehend entfernen.

Urheberrecht

Die durch die Seitenbetreiber erstellten Inhalte und Werke auf diesen Seiten unterliegen dem deutschen Urheberrecht. Dies betrifft insbesondere Grafiken, Sounds, Tondokumente, Texte sowie gedruckte und elektronische Publikationen. Die Vervielfältigung, Bearbeitung, Verbreitung und jede Art der Verwertung außerhalb der Grenzen des Urheberrechtes bedürfen der schriftlichen Zustimmung des jeweiligen Urhebers bzw. Erstellers. Downloads und Kopien dieser Seite sind nur für den privaten Gebrauch gestattet. Der kommerzielle Gebrauch solcher Werke und Inhalte wird strikt untersagt.

Soweit die Inhalte auf dieser Seite nicht von unserer Redaktion erstellt wurden, werden die Urheberrechte Dritter beachtet. Vornehmlich werden Inhalte Dritter als geschützt und mit Urhebervermerk gekennzeichnet. Sollten Sie trotzdem auf eine Urheberrechtsverletzung aufmerksam werden, bitten wir um einen entsprechenden Hinweis. Sobald uns etwaige Urheberrechtsverstöße bekannt gemacht werden, werden wir derartige Inhalte umgehend von unserer Seite entfernen bzw. die Werke nach Rücksprache mit dem jeweiligen Urheber mit entsprechendem Urhebervermerk kennzeichnen.

Description:
Goonj India is an open, privacy conscious community focussed on Indians and India specific issues.

Goonj India is part of the Goonj network of community. Anyone can join and find the right community to participate.

Open

Goonj is open for everyone to join, but hate speech of any kind is prohibited. Goonj can be joined through any device through our web application. Goonj is open source and based on the popular Mastodon social network.

Privacy Conscious

Users can seamlessly download their entire account data and delete their accounts any time they want. No private information like Real Name, Date of Birth etc. is required to join Goonj. Goonj provides easy control to share your content with a limited audience or to a wider audience as required.

Code of Conduct

Try to be a good neighbour to everyone in the community. Please avoid all behaviour which can be considered spamming, scamming, ponography, NSFW content, advocacy of violence, ethnic/racial/homophobic slurs, harassment, or any other content/activity deemed against the law. Offending content will need to be removed by the user, and repeat offenders will be banned from the community.

We strive to be "work-friendly", so if you post anything that's allowable under our policy but may reasonably be considered objectionable, please use a CW (content warning) to tag it as such.

Moderation activities will be as transparent as possible, with rationales for each action. The community will have the opportunity to review and give input on actions, and the moderation team will be responsive to that.

* Nudity exceptions - the following are okay: Nudity in photos of paintings and sculptures; Breastfeeding (with content warning); Nudity in photos of political expression or significance (with content warning). Examples that don't qualify as exceptions: Nudity in digital art; Nudity with political text simply added to it; etc.


FAQ

How to invite people to follow you

Go to Invites. Check Invite to follow your account, and generate a link. People who sign up through the invite will automatically follow you!

How to enable/disable email notifications

Go to Notifications

Recommended: Enable all notifications to start with; then, if there are any you find you don't like, disable them.

How to export all your data

Go to Data export
Short: Goonj India is an open, privacy conscious community focussed on Indians and India specific issues.

Description:
Willkommen

Willkommen auf der Mastodon-Community des Animexx e.V.!

Wir sind ein Verein für alle deutschsprachigen Fans von Anime, Manga, Cosplay, japanischer Kultur, Fanart, Fanfiction und allem drum herum.

Unser Ziel ist es, die Community zusammen zu bringen. Das tun wir seit 2000 mit unserer Website www.animexx.de, auf unseren zahlreichen Events und jetzt auch im Fediverse.

Die Registrierung auf unserem Server ist für alle offen - auch für dich! Unsere Server-Regeln sind aber eine Voraussetzung.

Noch etwas: Blocks für komplette anderen Server oder Domains wird es hier nur in Ausnahmefällen geben. Hier sollen alle User weitestgehend frei anderen Fediverse-Accounts folgen können.

Animexx e.V.

Community-Website animexx.de

Über unseren Verein

Besucht auch unseren Discord-Server


Wir veranstalten unter anderem

Connichi - die große Convention in Wiesbaden

aniMUC - unsere zweite große Con vor den Toren Münchens

Die Mastodon-Instanz des Animexx e.V.

Die deutsche Community für Anime|Manga|Cosplay|Art|Japan|Events

Description:
기본 규칙

  • 인종 / 성 지향 및 정체성 / 장애 / 국적 등을 이유로 다른 사람을 차별하는 행위를 금지합니다.
  • 사이버 스토킹 및 위협 등의 행위는 금지됩니다.
  • CW 없이 성적이거나 폭력적인 컨텐츠를 올리는 행위를 금지합니다.
  • 스패밍 및 다른 사람의 글에 무차별적으로 반응하는 행위를 금지합니다.
  • 이 인스턴스를 포함한 SiFNet 서비스에 장애를 유발할 수 있는 행동은 계정 즉시 정지로 이어질 수 있습니다.

권고 사항 / Best practice

NOTE: 잦은 권고 사항 위반은 밴 사유가 될 수 있습니다.

  • 사려깊고 배려하는 분위기를 만들기 위해 노력해 주세요. 이 것에는 적절한 CW (콘텐츠 경고) 사용이 포함됩니다.
  • 다른 사람의 컨텐츠를 올릴 때는 출처를 표시해 주세요.
  • NSFW (성적인 컨텐츠나 고어 등) 컨텐츠의 경우, CW를 반드시 사용해 주세요
  • 토론 매너를 지켜 주세요. 상대방을 모욕하지 마세요.
  • 성별을 가려서 사람을 받는다거나 그러지 마세요. 이 세상의 성별은 두 가지가 아니며 상대방에게 상처가 될 수 있어요.

봇 오퍼레이터를 위한 가이드 / Guide for bot operators

  • 봇 계정은 자동화된 소프트웨어를 통해 사용자와 상호작용하는 계정입니다.
  • 봇 계정은 사용자를 먼저 팔로잉하거나, 멘션하거나, 기타 등의 방법으로 상호작용을 시작하면 안 됩니다.
  • 봇이 자동으로 올리는 메시지(툿)은 unlisted 상태로 올리는 것을 강력히 권고합니다.

출처 / Attribution

해당 조항들은 chaos.social 과 bsd.network 의 조항을 참조하였습니다.
이 글은 CC-BY (Attribution 4.0 International) 하에 공개됩니다.

Description:
About This Server

Ottawa.place is a Mastodon server running the Hometown fork, which is a version of Mastodon with an extra focus on local communities. It is currently administered by @leigh and @andrew. Follow @OttawaPlaceAdmin if you're interested in hearing about future opportunities to chip in and volunteer as the instance grows.

The greater Ottawa region exists on the traditional unceeded territory of the Kanienʼkehá꞉ka (Mohawk), Omàmìwininìwag (Algonquin), and Anishinabewaki ᐊᓂᔑᓈᐯᐗᑭ peoples. We are grateful to have the opportunity to provide this service to people present in this territory.

Nous voulons operer un serveur bilingue; les traductions sont en cours. Votre patience est appréciée à cet égard.

Parliament hill image in the server banner by Suwannee.payne, CC BY-SA 3.0, via Wikimedia Commons

Federation philosophy

We defederate from instances that engage in harassment or encourage hate speech.

Handling harassment

If you are being harassed, please report the user using the "…" button and then "Report." For urgent concerns, please DM a moderator.

If you engage in harassing behavior, the moderator may take any action they deem appropriate, such as a warning or an expulsion.

The above rules may change at any time, and you may be banned at any time based on the moderators' judgment.

File Limits

Photos have a maximum file size of 10MB and videos have a maximum file size of 40MB.

Data Location

Ottawa.place user data is stored within Canada, in a server in OVH's Montreal datacentre, along with Amazon Web Services' (AWS) Canada region. Media uploads are stored on AWS's global CDN. Encrypted daily database backups are stored in AWS S3. This may change from time to time but we will do our best to 1) keep things in Canada as much as possible and 2) keep users posted if we need to make big changes to how we store things.

Instance Continuity

If we ever decide to cease running this instance, in accordance with the Mastodon Server Covenant, we commit to a 3-month advance notice before turning off any infrastructure, to allow users to export their content and migrate to a new server.
Short:
Mastodon instance for residents of Ottawa, Gatineau, and surrounding regions.
Instance de Mastodon pour les résidents d'Ottawa, de Gatineau et des régions avoisinantes.

Su página principal es https://escepticos.es y puedes ver cómo contactar aquí: https://escepticos.es/contacto

Description:
We’re møving!

We’re moving to https://mastodon.Babb.no. In a few months we’ll shut this server down.

About this server

This is a Norwegian mastodon instance and safe haven for social exchange between tech people from the University of Oslo, Norway. Despite that, this site has no affiliation nor it belongs to the University of Oslo.

It is also opened for other tech people and/or friends from around the world.

The name "babb.be" is because of the love for good kebabs that we share at USIT (University Center for Information Technology at the University of Oslo. On our team, we call them affectionally "babb". Unfortunately, babb.no wasn't available, so the only one was .be. It came to us that "babbe" is used pejoratively for immigrants in Sweden - which is kinda ironic, since the admin of this site has indeed and proudly, a foreign background.

Mastodon Server Covenant

We adhere 100% to the Mastodon Server Covenant. No racism, gender discrimination or anti-semitism will be tolerated.

We have daily backups, and @Gaelle has also access to the server infrastructure in case of emergency.

Transparency

This server runs on a kubernetes cluster with 6 nodes, 3 masters and 3 workers. Each machine has 14gb ram, but we might upgrade them accordingly should there be need for that.

Relays

We joined the following relays:

  • https://relay.babb.be - a relay for Norwegian instances
  • https://relay.intahnet.co.uk
  • https://relay.berserker.town
  • https://relay.instancias-br.online
  • https://relay.beckmeyer.us

Contact

If you need to contact us, send us an e-mail or a toot to @admin.

Blocked servers/instances

We are replicating blocked instances from mastodon.social.
Short: This Norwegian Mastodon server is an unofficial meeting place for University of Oslo people, and more!

Description:
無論在海外定係在香港，有關生活/留學/工作/旅遊/旅居/問題，想識同路人想講故事想問想呻想分享想鬧想讚，我們都是香港人。

我的前生是 ⎡香港網台⎦ app。香港網台 app 在網台百花盛放之黃金年代 (2005-2017?) 擔任了向公眾推介的工作，把各個不同網台節目集合在一個方便使用的手機 app，聽眾可以選擇下載或直接收聽各台節目。

香港的網台界自 2015 年後慢慢走下坡。網台如政黨般經過無數分裂，剩下的主要用 YouTube 作廣播，賺取 YouTube 少許廣告費，網台 app 漸漸變成網台 YouTube 分類，我就開始思想新的傳訊方式。

自 2019 後，我們面對更加嚴苛嘅問題：FaceBook 只發放消息給少量人, YouTube 黃標； 網台界走得走，義士傑斯和快必就入獄。

在這個嚴苛嘅世代，我未有能力建設一個革命性的新平台，但在 Elon Musk 剛剛入主 Twitter 之後，我發現這個和我幻想世界接近一點的 OpenSource 萬象軟件，我就毫不猶疑地把這個建立起來。

這個《香港萬象》像當年⎡香港網台⎦ 一樣，會搜羅香港人有關的資訊，把內容加到平台中。如果閣下是我複製的對象而不想繼續的話，可以直接聯絡我，不過我更希望你可以加入我們直接發貼，無論在這個平台或其他萬象系統中。

我們雖然是香港人主導，但也歡迎所有人加入，新手可以先到右邊的『香港萬象本站』link 瀏覽我們的資訊。

》》》》》》》》》》》》》》》》》》》》》》》》》》》》》》

最後一點，我選了在歐洲／德國建立這個《香港萬象》伺服器，希望給用戶多一點的保障。同以前一樣，本站盡量黃而不同，資訊不表達本人或本網站立場。
Short:
無論在海外定係在香港，有關生活/留學/工作/旅遊/旅居/問題，想識同路人想講故事想問想呻想分享想鬧想讚，我們都是香港人。

我們的伺服器在德國，所有個人資料有 GDPR 保障。

Description:
Among the Mastodon universe, I've noticed few distinct types of instances.

  • There are the "flagship" general-interest instances. It is the goal of these instance operators to keep political strife to a minimum (within reason) to make the instance as welcoming as possible to as many users as possible. These tend to be fairly good about removing outright Nazis and hate speech, but politics is often treated as a potentially triggering subject (fair enough). In short, they are run by Liberals. They will embrace calls for solidarity, inclusion, and emancipation insofar as it doesn't undermine the established Liberal institutions. Anything going further seems to stand on shaky ground.

  • There are the special interest instances. Instances focused on subjects from comics to electronics to cooking to LGBTQIA+ and issues of intersectional oppression. I assume many of the operators and members of these instances would like to, more or less, remain out of the fray and focus on these interests. There is a reason their members chose these spaces instead of more mainstream or more explicitly political ones. While many of them may be operated or used by comrades, they don't seem like the correct place to go and talk about Communism 24/7 unless you have a credible reputation in that community.

  • Finally, there are the anti-capitalist instances. These instances are primarily focused on politics, and they are on the correct side of the defining struggle of our epoch - however - among them there is a disappointing amount of sectarianism. I will always assume the best of my comrades, but none of these places (at least the ones with open registration) seem like a good fit for me or many of my comrades from Hexbear.

So my goal here is to establish an anti-sectarian instance along the lines of Hexbear where Anarchists and Marxists are welcome. A space where the focus remains eternally on our leviathan enemy, bourgeois class society, the greatest existential threat to humanity and the planet. A place where a full spectrum of anti-capitalist tactics and theoretical perspectives can be entertained in good faith.
Short: This instance is intended to be a non-sectarian space for leftist discussion, along the lines of hexbear.net (no affiliation), but in a federated microblogging format.

Description:
About

tldr.nettime is an instance for artists, researchers, and activists interested in exploring the intersections of technology, culture, and politics.

It has grown out of nettime-l, one of the longest-running mailing lists on the net with a focus on the 'cultural politics of the internet'.

nettime.org

Server

tldr.nettime is based on Hometown, a fork of Mastodon. It's compatible with the wider fediverse, but it also offers two tweaks we hope will help make it particularly engaging and fostering a shared sense of place:

  • The character count per message is higher — 2000 chars at the moment.
  • You can choose whether your post is public or visible only on tldr's local timeline

We try to run a stable server, but this is a community effort, so we don't provide guarantees for uptime.

Funding

The server is run by care and free labor of everyone involved. To cover infrastructure cost, we need donations. If you value this instance and have some money to contribute, please do so.

The best way is to send money directly to our bank account.

Account holder: TLDR Association
IBAN: CH50 0900 0000 1607 0884 6
BIC: POFICHBEXXX

You can also a donation form (link to donorbox.org), though processing fees are considerably higher.

Guidelines

Please read the information below before signing up to and/or using tldr.nettime. If you don’t agree to the terms set out here, please do not use this server. It's that simple.

We have a commitment to critical analysis, experiments, mutual care, diversity, and anti-discriminatory practices. The instance is lightly moderated, on an account basis. In other words, we will ban accounts that don't share our commitment.

The community will give itself more detailed rules if necessary.

Language: There are no language rules on this server. English is de facto the main language, but feel free (even encouraged!) to post in other languages.

Content warnings: We do not require a content warning (CW). However, we ask that you be kind and considerate: include CWs if you believe your post may be distressing to others.

Bots: Bots are allowed. Try to make them fun.

Cross-posting: Cross-posting from Twitter, RSS, etc. is fine (and even encouraged if it helps you become more active here).

Topics: You do not need to remain permanently "on topic". The point of this community is to gather like-minded people who will make posts that are interesting to each other. But that doesn't mean that everything has to be about the 'cultural politics of the internet' (whatever that is....). This is a community to connect people, not enforce specific topics of discussion.

Self-promotion: There are many writers, artists, and other cultural producers on this server, and we are more than happy for you to promote your work from your personal account. We request, however, that you do so in a tasteful and not spammy manner.

(Guidelines adapted from zirk.us)

Impressum

This server is run by "TLDR Association", a non-profit association (based on Art. 60ff Swiss Civil Code), registered in Switzerland.

Postal Address:
TLDR Association
Avenue de France 41
1004 Lausanne
Switzerland

Email: tldr AT nettime.org
Short: tldr.nettime is an instance for artists, researchers, and activists interested in exploring the intersections of technology, culture, and politics.

Description:
gaybdsm.group is a Mastodon server where LGBTQ people into or curious about the world of BDSM can discuss and share topics, information, experiences, and even some stories, marks and bruises from scenes. This server is owned, funded, and operated by John @JcbtMI in my spare time.

After joining Mastodon, I quickly found that other servers have been reaching capacity and closing to new registrations. While the capacity of this server is not limitless, this is a way I can give back to the community and provide a safe space for people to immerse themselves in the BDSM world, make new connections, and maybe even make a few new friends or play buddies along the way.

While I am not yet an expert at Mastodon server administration, I sure will try my damn best to do a good job. I have a full-time job and also enjoy BDSM playtime of my own, some of which I get to record and publish videos, so I may not always be available to extinguish fires. My hope is the service which hosts this server is stable enough to run without much intervention.

Feel free to reach out to me via DM, toot or email with any questions or concerns.
Short: gaybdsm.group will be shutting down on May 31.

Description:
Sunet är en del av statliga Vetenskapsrådet och tillhandahåller IT-infrastruktur och digitala verktyg till lärosäten och andra myndigheter. Här testar vi vår Mastodonserver och den riktar sig specifikt till de som är knutna till högre utbildning och forskning.

Tillhör du ett lärosäte i Sverige kan du skapa ett konto på vår server. Kom ihåg att du behöver ange samma e-postadress som du har i lärosätets katalog när du skapar kontot.

Lösenordet som anges vid kontoskapandet behövs bara just där och då, sedan loggar du in via Single Sign-on med ditt konto från lärosätet och de inloggningsuppgifter du har där.

Observera att Mastodon inte är den officiella kontaktvägen in till myndigheten. Vill du komma i kontakt med Sunet gör du det enklast via info@sunet.se
Short: Vi testar en server för högre utbildning och forskning i Sverige. Tillhandahålls av Sunet (Swedish University Computer Network)

Description:
[DE]
Die fairmove.net Mastodon Instanz ist für Menschen und Organisationen, die sich virtuell und real gerne engagieren. Zum Beispiel für globale Gerechtigkeit, Klimaneutralität, Transparenz, offenen Zugang zu Wissen und Algorithmen oder demokratische Werte. Oder für tragfähige und gelingende Beziehungen, persönlich, in einer Initiative, politisch oder beruflich - lokal oder global.

Betreiberin ist die fairkom Gesellschaft, die in ihren Statuten als Ziel unter anderem die Anregung zum interaktiven Medienverhalten festgelegt hat. Dies erreichen wir mit Open Source Lösungen, Single-Sign-On, Föderation und einem engagierten Team in Österreich.

Die Registrierung erfolgt über den Login Button mit fairlogin. Da kannst du auch einen Benutzernamen festlegen, welcher dann auch für Mastodon verwendet wird. Bei der Registrierung gibt es ein Bilder-Captcha und drei Fragen, die Bots abhalten sollen. Ja nervt, aber ist gleich vorbei.

Diese Instanz ist besonders leistungsfähig. Sie wurde auf einem Kubernetes Cluster mit 6 Worker Nodes und einem externen Minio Storage mit grossem Cache installiert und skaliert daher auch gut, wenn es viele Anfragen und Zugriffe gibt. Auch hosten wir einen eigenen Übersetzungsservice mit LibreTranslate, der bei Beiträgen mit einer anderen Sprache aktiviert werden kann.

Wir finanzieren den Betrieb über den Verkauf von Servicepaketen, Spenden und Beratung und Implementierung von Open Source Lösungen. Wer fairmove.net regelmässig nutzt darf gerne ein fairapps basic oder pro Paket bestellen. Das verstehen wir auch unter fair 😉.

Auf fairapps.net finden sich weitere Alternativen zu GAFAM wie fair.tube, die Metasuchmaschine fairsuch.net die keine Werbung anzeigt oder Profile anlegt, fairchat, der Videokonferenzdienst fairmeeting oder die allseits beliebte faircloud. Im Fediverse ist fairmove.net eine mögliche Alternative zu Twitter und fair.tube funktioniert wie Youtube oder Vimeo, nur eben verteilt. Wir hosten alle Services in Europa datenschutzkonform und klimaneutral.

Übrigens: fairmove ist ein generisches Label für gutes Tun und darf auch für andere Projekte verwendet werden. Dazu haben wir 2019 die Labels Common License entwickelt.

Global denken, lokal handeln mit Menschen und Organisationen die etwas bewegen wollen 🚲🙂🚶‍♀️🌻🎤🚶‍♂️🥒⚒.

[EN]
The fairmove.net Mastodon instance is for people who like to engage virtually and in real life. For example for global justice, climate neutrality, transparency, open access to knowledge or democratic values. Or for successful relationships, personally, in an initiative, in politics or professionally - locally or globally.

Operator is the fairkom Gesellschaft, which has set as one of its goals in its statutes, the stimulation of interactive media behavior. We achieve this with open source solutions, single sign-on, federation and a dedicated team in Austria.

Registration is done via the login button with fairlogin. There you can also set your nickname. During registration you need to solve a captcha and answer three questions to keep bots away (yes that sucks, but will be done in a minute).

This instance runs on a Kubernetes cluster with six worker nodes and an external Minio storage with large cache, so it scales well when there are many requests and accesses. We also host and have integrated LibreTranslate to translate toots which are not in your default language.

We finance the operation by selling service packages, donations and consulting and implementation of open source solutions. If you use fairmove.net regularly please order a fairapps basic or pro package. This is also what we understand by fair 😉.

On fairapps.net you can find more alternatives to GAFAM like fair.tube, the meta search engine fairsuch.net which doesn't show ads or create profiles, fairchat, the video conferencing service fairmeeting or the ever popular faircloud. In the Fediverse, fairmove.net is a possible alternative to Twitter and fair.tube works like Youtube, just distributed. We host all services in Europe GDPR compliant and climate neutral.

By the way: fairmove is a generic label for doing good and may also be used for other projects. For this purpose, we have developed the Labels Common License in 2019.

With a passion to move and change: ourselves, organisations, our neighbourhood, the world 🚲🚶‍♀️🌻🎤🚶‍♂️🥒.
Short:
We do, host and support fair moves! 
▶ GDPR compliant | green hosting | free registration with fairlogin | translations
▶ Für Menschen und Organisationen, die etwas bewegen wollen.

Description:
Welcome to Okla.Social!

Okla.Social is a Mastodon instance for Oklahomans' and is administered by the same.

Funding

We welcome everyone but do ask, that if possible, please help contribute to the operating costs of the server. This server is administered by volunteers and as such, costs are paid directly by them. All proceeds will go towards the operating costs of the server and to help with the growth of it.

Mastodon Server Covenant

We are committed to the Mastodon Server Covenant which includes the following statements.

  • Active moderation against racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia Users must have the confidence that they are joining a safe space, free from white supremacy, anti-semitism and transphobia of other platforms.

  • Daily backups It is important for users to have the confidence that a trip over the power cable or a rogue bit flip will not erase all of their data. Having a backup strategy is a basic necessity of providing a public service.

  • At least one other person with emergency access to the server infrastructure Various circumstances can prevent the original owner of the Mastodon server from answering technical emergencies. For this reason, more than one person must have that capability.

  • Commitment to give users at least 3 months of advance warning in case of shutting down

Sometimes services shut down, it is the cycle of life. But users must have the confidence that their account will not disappear overnight, so that they have time to export their data and find another server.

The Team

@jeromyokc - Instance Operator/Admin (He/Him)

Server Status
Short: Come join those Okie's from Oklahoma! A regional instance for those from Oklahoma or just wanted to be associated with them.

Description:
Welcome to the Max Planck Society server on Mastodon! We provide a place for our MPG-family to discuss science, research work, tech, life, and more. First and foremost, we're about building community, and that doesn't always involve scientific discussion, so feel free to go off-topic and have fun!

Who's behind this?

The server is hosted by Max Planck Digital Library (MPDL). MPDL supports MPG scientists from all institutes with a broad service portfolio and provides easy access to data, scientific literature, commercial software licenses, scientific communication tools and services, and research-related software applications. MPDL created for the benefit of the MPG.

General info

MPDL operates this Mastodon instance for the Max Planck Society. All facilities and institutes of the MPG and their employees can use this instance.
Furthermore, users are responsible for their own content. If you are interested in using the Mastodon instance or have questions or reports about the content, please contact mastodon@mpdl.mpg.de. Please note that the MPDL does not guarantee the high availability of the instance.

Code of Conduct

In general: be excellent to each other and respect the rules. ♡

Keep in mind that our server's aim is community building and sharing of information, ideas, and interests in respect of each other.
The following guidelines are not a legal document, and the final interpretation is up to the administration of ; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies: The following types of content are not allowed: - Any illegal content and activity in the EU - Nudity, pornography, and sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions - Hate speech, racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, fatmisia, xenophobia and/or violent nationalism, or the advocation of all of the above will not be tolerated, and any account engaging in such acts will be suspended immediately - Threats of physical violence against any person, animal, or institution - Gore and graphic violence - Spam – No flooding the public timeline with excessive automated posts - Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources.

Also, any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, impede other users from utilizing the service, degrade the performance of the service, harass other users, or incite other users to perform any of the actions above, is disallowed.

These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

Reporting Harassment

To report harassment, please send an email to mastodon@mpdl.mpg.de. If you believe anyone is in physical danger or doing something against the law, please notify appropriate emergency services first by calling the relevant local authorities.

Policies

Your continued use of implies your agreement with our policies. If you disagree with our policies, please discontinue the use of our services.

Impressum

https://www.mpdl.mpg.de/impressum.html

E-Mail-Adresse: mastodon@mpdl.mpg.de
Short: The original server for the Max Planck Society maintained by the Max Planck Digital Library (MPDL). Join the MPG-family!

Description:
Paktodon.Asia is the online public square for the Global South – a safe 'azad' mastodon server (instance) for ordinary citizens, students, and activists, to share, learn, grow, and collaborate in. Though we are all pakistani, Paktodon.Asia is open to friends from across the world!

(Read more about how to sign-up at the bottom :D )

The Team:

Our Woman-led team are all part-time volunteers. If you wish have any questions, or would like to contribute or collaborate in any way, toot at our team accounts:

• Risham Waseem – Admin / 'Nigraan', @admin@paktodon.asia
(Co-Founder/Director of MaatiTv)

• Dr. Jibreel Sohail – Moderator / 'Chowkidar', @jibreel_sohail@paktodon.asia
(Medical Doctor)

• Community Moderator – TBD

• Official Correspondence Email – paktodon.asia@gmail.com

We will respond as soon as we can (after work!)

SUPPORT OUR INDEPENDENCE!

We are just a bunch of people personally trying to help. Running your own server for the public is expensive. Please support us in keeping Paktodon.Asia independent and online by donating:

• LiberaPay – donate

• DM on Insta –

Costs:
• Server Rental –
• Web Hosting –
• Mail Hosting –
(We aren't collecting donations yet, as of 2nd July 23)

Our Origin Story

With the ongoing climate-catastrophes and the implosion of vital social media companies, our team realized that our citizens and activists urgently needed a replacement that was more resilient, trustworthy, and sensitive to our needs and cultures - Paktodon.Asia.

The specific needs of both activists and ordinary citizens are never a priority for social media platforms:

What we see is decided by toxic algorithms devoted to commercial interests; Our security and freedoms are overlooked; Our mental health is never even an afterthought.

We intend to counter these challenges by building a tolerant, empathetic, and safe organic community where agency lies with the user.

This mastodon instance strives to be a space where people can come together, form community and join advocacy, create action for the climate fight and social injustices facing us, learn and grow;

or simply just be themselves!

Why Trust Paktodon?

Paktodon.Asia aims to bring our citizens’ voices online, under the premise of safety and trust.

How?

Simple,

we will vet every account joining our instance, whether they remain anonymous or use their real identity.

We will not keep any private data, but we will make sure that every account is a real genuine person (anonymous users), or are who they say they are (real identity users).

Honesty and trust immensely help improve the quality of online discourse.

If you see a user from Paktodon.Asia you can rest easy – they are a genuine account belonging to that person.

Assuring Safety

Paktodon.Asia pledges to follow the Mastodon 'Server Covenant', in addition to our own moderation 'Server Rules' (see below).

However, safety is always an ongoing task: please help our team by reporting any toots (posts) or behaviours you feel do not belong here.

Thanks to mastodon’s design, our Admins are able to use multiple tools to deal with such issues quickly, and will do so!

The Mastodon Advantages

Decentralized = Federated = OpenSource = Social Media

• Its decentralized servers are all community owned and volunteer run – it can never be bought or controlled.

• It is federated – all mastodon servers can interact, or choose to block others (like violent or extremist servers).

• It is fully open-source like the old internet – it is free from corporate influence, AI or surveillance tech.

• Chronological (instead of AI) feeds with active moderation guarantee a more relaxing experience online. You curate your own feed, and decide what you want to see!

• There are No Annoying Ads!

The Mastodon Apps

Although there are official apps, Paktodon.Asia recommends Tusky for android users, and Metatext for apple users, due to more features and better UI designs.

There are other great third-party apps as well, and if you would like us to mention them too, let us know! =)

How to Sign-up?

Once you fill out the sign-up form on Paktodon.Asia and submit it, our team will contact you through our correspondence email (paktodon.asia@gmail.com) with the subject "Manual Verification for Paktodon.Asia" to manually verify you.

After we have confirmed you are not a bot, we will immediately activate your account here.

We do this to keep our users safe from bots, harassers, imposters, and other malicious actors. We understand this might sound a bit tedious, but we firmly believe in preventing issues rather than a 'free-for-all' and 'ignore the problem' approach Twitter, Facebook, and other companies indulge in.

This allows us to guarantee Paktodon.Asia users a standard of safety and privacy unmatched by any mainstream social media platform.

We actively look out for you! O=)
Short: Paktodon is an Independent social-platform for the Global South – an ‘azad’ space for ordinary citizens, students, and activists to share, learn, grow, and collaborate in.

Description:
This is a mastodon server devoted to the JVM (Java) community. As such, it should be useful for developers using that platform and ideally it should be used to talk about our beloved programming language (Java, Kotlin, Scala, Groovy, Clojure... you name it). This is not a fixed rule: you won't be banned from the server if you talk about other topic, but a technical profile is desirable to have a interesting local timeline.

The server is operated by a bunch of volunteers, and it has some cost to keep the infrastructure running, so if you plan to use this server and think it's useful for you, any money contribution is welcome at https://opencollective.com/jvm-social
Short: This is a JVM technologies related mastodon server. Our goal is to have a place to talk about our beloved ecosystem.

Description:
A strange object in space and a space for strange objects

Fediverse instance run by @esther and @james

  • Blog - Updates from admins and mods
  • Status - Information on availability and outages
  • Donations - Help us keep the lights on

strangeobject.space is running on glitch-soc, a fork of Mastodon.

Rules

We acknowledge that rules will never be comprehensive or cover every possible situation. Our instance rules are meant to be respected closely in cases that they do cover and to inform how we act in cases where they aren't explicit. Always try to act in the spirit of these rules.

This instance is hosted in Germany. All content posted on strangeobject.space must abide by German laws and regulations regardless of our own rules.

General

Members must be 18 years old or older.

As members of strangeobject.space we accept these rules and commit to creating an inclusive and respectful environment for ourselves and others.

We do not tolerate oppression of people on the basis of who they are. This includes but is not limited to: gender, race, ethnicity, language, body size and shape, religion or spirituality, nationality, age, disability and sexual orientation.

We define oppression as any language or action that expresses, reinforces, upholds or sympathizes with any form of systemic social domination.

Examples of unacceptable behavior include:

  • harassment, both individual and coordinated
  • insults and derogatory language
  • trolling (trying to deliberately provoke someone)
  • threats
  • doxxing (publishing of personal information without consent)
  • spam

Bots, Automation and Organizations

Accounts on strangeobject.space are intended for human beings. Bots are generally not allowed on this instance. Exceptions must be explicitly allowed by the admins of the instance.

Tools that post on behalf on humans, like cross-posters that mirror content from other social media sites, are permitted but should be used with care and only replicate content that their owner has posted themselves (e.g. no retweets). All rules still apply in full to content that is posted through such a tool.

Organizations and institutions should generally not have accounts on strangeobject.space. Exceptions are possible but rare and need to be decided on by the moderators/admins.

Accessibility

Visual media that is posted to the public timeline should always have a text description that conveys its content accurately to someone who cannot see the image.

We avoid large clusters of non-text characters (e.g. Emoji and "glitchy text"), and refrain from using them in usernames at all unless we have actually tested how they are pronounced by a screen-reader and that it doesn't inhibit reading the timeline.

Nudity, Sex and Sex Work, Kink

Discussion and depiction of sexual, erotic, kinky and sex-work related content is explicitly allowed on strangeobject.space as long as it's not illegal in Germany.

Anything that falls into these categories should be posted with a content warning (CW) and media marked as sensitive when the post appears on a public timeline.

Other users should only be tagged in these posts if they have consented to it.

Content warnings

In addition to previous mentions of content warnings (CWs), the following types of content should be posted with a CW when they appear on the public timeline:

  • violence (depiction and graphic description)
  • self harm and suicide
  • dieting and eating disorders
  • citing/quoting content that would violate any of our rules, including screenshots of such content
  • visual media with rapid flashing/blinking

Creative Works

When posting works created by others (e.g. photos, artworks, comics, music, video, etc.), include attribution for the original artist/creator. If possible link back to their original post.

This rule does not apply to the citing of popular media, for example a screenshot or GIF from a movie, or things like memes.

Crypto

We don't tolerate promotion of any cryptocurrency, NFTs, de-fi, and related projects.

Violations, Conflict and Appeals

We strive to own our mistakes and to learn from them. When we receive feedback on our behaviour that we disagree with, our first reaction should be to listen. Many conflicts can be resolved by trying to see them from another person's perspective.

When directly engaging with each other isn't possible for any involved parties, the moderators/admins of strangeobject.space can intervene and will act in accordance with our rules.

Severe or repeated violations of our instance's rules can lead to freezing, limiting and suspending of a user's account.

Moderation decisions can be appealed to either via DM to @admin@strangeobject.space, or if that's not possible (e.g. after suspension) via email to mail@strangeobject.space. Appealing via the personal accounts of moderators or admins on this instance is unacceptable and will result in suspension.

Emoji attribution

Unfinished, further attributions to be added!

Asemoji - ScrumpDiddley Animated Spoons - @tiarel 35mm - @MattMaber Blobfox - Volpeon FediPact - FediPact

Description:
Masto BG е един от първите българоезични сървъри на децентрализираната социална мрежа Mastodon. Нашата цел е да създадем среда за българи, които искат да избягат от токсичността на корпоративните социални мрежи, най-вече Facebook.

Защо трябва да се откъснем от Facebook?

Доминацията на Facebook в България е безспорна. Към момента във Facebook има 4,3 милиона български потребители, което е около 65% от цялото население на страната.

Алгоритмите на Facebook насърчават разпространението на дезинформация, фалшиви новини и радикално съдържание, което дестабилизира нашето общество.

Изключително притеснителна е и тенденцията алгоритмите на Facebook да се експлоатират от руски агенти за разпространението на дезинформация, което във време на война е буквална заплаха за националната сигурност на България.

За жалост Meta са показали цялостно нежелание да адресират тези проблеми и вместо да ограничават разпространението на дестабилизиращо съдържание, техните алгоритми му дават тласък, докато същевременно модераторската политика заглушава автентични граждански гласове.

Защо Mastodon предоставя алтернатива?

Борбата с корпоративни гиганти като Meta е почти непосилна за държави като България. Произволът, който си позволяват тези големи компании, е заплаха за тъканта на обществата по света.

Mastodon е най-голямата децентрализирана социална мрежа, която не се притежава от нито една корпорация, а от хиляди администратори на сървъри по целия свят.

Разбира се, тези администратори могат да упражняват авторитарен контрол върху своите потребители. Но в Mastodon потребителят винаги има избор да се премести на друг сървър само с един клик и да запази всичките си последователи. Това значи, че сървър, който злоупотребява със своите модераторски правомощия ще бъде бързо напуснат от всичките си потребители. Никоя корпоративна социална мрежа не може да се похвали със същото.

От друга страна, на който и сървър да се намираш, ти си част от Fediverse, тоест всички сме на една мрежа, дори и да сме на различни сървъри. Всеки потребител може да следва потребители от всеки друг сървър и да споделя тяхното съдържание.

Това означава, че Mastodon ни предоставя алтернатива на централизираните социални мрежи. Тук можем да намерим баланса между свобода на словото и модерация на съдържанието.

Модераторска философия

Цялостният ни стремеж е да създадем общност, в която хората да могат да споделят мислите си, да водят конструктивни диалози и да си прекарват приятно, без да им бъдат насаждани постоянно гняв, страх, омраза.

Ако сте мили, учтиви, уравновесени и не разпространявате руска или фашистка пропаганда, няма нужда да се притеснявате от модераторската ни политика.

Информация за собственост

Masto BG е собственост на Блу Дот Технолоджис ЕООД, еднолично дружество, собственост на Благослав Михайлов, с ЕИК 204744767, седалище и адрес на управление град София, бул „Цариградско шосе“ №133.

Ако нашата общност се разрастне достатъчно, имаме пълното желание да обособим този сървър като сдружение, което членовете да издържат и да имат възможност да участват във взимането на решения, включително такива касаещи модераторската политика.
Short: Masto BG е един от първите българоезични сървъри. Нашата цел е да създадем среда за българи, които искат да избягат от токсичността на корпоративните социални мрежи, най-вече Facebook.

Description:
Musician.Social is an instance focused on Musicians and people who love music.

We are committed to the Mastodon Server Covenant.

We are hosted on Masto.host

Please consider supporting our Patreon here.

Note, if you had an account here BEFORE August 22nd, 2023, it is gone. Our previous hosting company crashed. AND the backups they had were not valid. Total failure. We are now on masto.host, and they know Mastodon hosting and backing it up.

If you create an account again with the same login, you WILL get your followers back. However, anything you posted or anyone you followed is gone.
Short: Mastodon site for Musicians and people into Music

Description:
RAP.SOCIAL?

rap.social is a customized Mastodon instance established in December of 2022.

WHY?

rap.social was built by a hip-hop head slash tech geek with the goals of:

  • contributing to the overall Mastodon network effect
  • providing a corporate-free, ad-free environment for myself & others
  • building a grassroots social network for music lovers, artists, ...

WHO?

Registrations are open to the public and posts do not need to be music related, however, please keep in mind the goals above. The best community will involve both diversity and culture fit.

QUESTIONS? SUGGESTIONS? HOLLER!

BDSM ist absolut unvernünftig und braucht auch im Fediverse einen Ort um sich zu entfalten.

Wir gehen hier positiv und vorurteilsfrei miteinander um. Wir kommunizieren und fühlen uns hier willkommen: Unabhängig von Kink, sexueller Identität, Herkunft...

Wir haben Stil und nutzen Inhaltswarnungen bei NSFW-Inhalten.

Consent muss ich hier nicht erklären. Der wird erwartet!
Short: BDSM ist absolut unvernünftig und braucht auch im Fediverse einen Ort um sich zu entfalten.

Description:
This server is an extension of the SNDevs community.

This is a place for people who share a common interest to gather and be themselves. While we are a community centered around the ServiceNow industry, you can participate and be a part of the server even if you don't necessarily post all ServiceNow content all the time.

Rules

The interpretation of the rules is ultimately up to the administration of the server. If you no longer wish to be a part of the server, you are able to move your account to a different server.

You consent to follow the community guidelines and rules listed below by having your account in or participating in this server.

Funding

We are funded through our Patreon.

Slack

Join slack through invite.sndevs.com.

Emojis

Check out our full Emoji list.

SNDevs Community Guidelines

We really like the Ubuntu Code of Conduct and GDG Community Guidelines and we've modeled our community guidelines based on them.

  1. Be nice. We are all a part of the same community, so be friendly, be welcoming, and be a nice person. Be someone that other people want to be around. We will likely run into each other more than once at Meetups and other events like Knowledge® and CreatorCon®. Leave a good impression.

  2. Be respectful and constructive. We are a very diverse group from numerous countries and backgrounds, so we are not going to agree all the time. Remember to be respectful and constructive with your communication to your fellow community member.

  3. Do not: get into flame wars, make personal attacks, or vent/rant unconstructively. Everyone should take responsibility for their community and take the initiative to diffuse tension and stop a potential flame war or negative conversation as early as possible.

  4. Be collaborative. Work together! We can and should learn a lot from each other. Share- knowledge, help each other out.

  5. Participate. This is YOUR community, so be a part of it! Join in on discussions, show up for in person meetings regularly, give constructive feedback, and offer to help implement that feedback!
Short: The largest independent ServiceNow developer community with over 11,000 registered members and 500 active daily users. SNDevs.com

Description:
Lanciano.it è la storia del web frentano dal 1998.

Qui è dove si "incontravano" online i ragazzi lancianesi prima dell'avvento dei social networks.

Dopo 1 milione e mezzo di messaggi scritti sul forum nel corso degli anni, oggi Lanciano.it si apre al futuro!

Accedi all'istanza Mastodon di Lanciano.it per iniziare ad esplorare il fediverso, il nuovo social network libero e decentralizzato.

Nessuna pubblicità, nessuna sponsorizzata, nessun algoritmo, nessun tracciamento, nessuna profilazione. Scegli tu cosa vedere e con chi interagire.

L'accesso al Social Club è riservato agli utenti di Lanciano.it. Se hai già un account su Lanciano.it ma non riesci ad accedere, leggi la guida all'autenticazione

Per maggiori informazioni sull'utilizzo quotidiano di Lanciano.it Social Club, trovi la guida su Lanciano.it Help'n Docs.

Segui anche l'hashtag LoSapeviChe con i tips di Sampei, e non esitare a chiedere se hai dei dubbi!
Short:
Lanciano.it è la community dove nei primi anni del 2000 i lancianesi già sperimentavano quello che sarebbe stato internet con i social.

Nel 2022 lanciano.it rinasce, ed entra nel fediverso.

I contenuti ritenuti inappropriati saranno eliminati e gli utenti ritenuti disturbatori verranno allontanati, ad insindacabile giudizio dei moderatori."}]

Description:
The Jazztodon instance is for jazz musicians, educators, managers, collectors, critics, publicists, publishers, students, broadcasters, and of course FANS of all types of jazz and related music.

If you'd like to help with the server expenses, it would be much appreciated. Please contact Allen Michie privately.

The Jazztodon instance is the home on Mastodon for jazz people! Join the discussion of all types of jazz and related music. 

Donations for server expenses: https://tinyurl.com/3sc2y2fs

Description:
Wir sind eine inklusive Mastodon-Community für alle Themen rund um Pen and Paper und Rollenspiel. Wir heißen alle willkommen, die Teil dieser Community sein möchten: Brett-, Rollen-, Gelegenheits- und Partyspielende, sowie Hobbyisten, LARPende, Spieledesignende und -verlegende, Rollenspielcharaktere, Künstler*innen, Autor*innen, Streamer*innen, Vlogger*innen und Podcastende, Rezensierende, Lego-Fans, Shop-Inhaber*innen und alle anderen Interessierten.

Wir möchten, dass dies ein angenehmer Raum für Menschen ist, die sich an Ideen und Meinungen anderer erfreuen und Spaß haben wollen. Wir arbeiten aktiv daran, hier eine Kultur von Freundlichkeit, Unterstützung und Respekt und insbesondere für marginalisierte Menschen einen möglichst entspannten Raum zu schaffen. Um das zu erreichen, werden die folgenden Regeln angewandt und durchgesetzt.

Über uns

Hier sind die wichtigsten Links, um uns etwas besser kennen zu lernen.

  • Unsere Vision
  • Lerne das Team kennen
  • Unser Moderationskonzept
  • Schreibe uns
  • Datenschutzerklärung
  • Impressum

Wir verpflichten uns den Regeln des Mastodon Covenant. Das heißt, dass wir

  • aktiv gegen Rassismus, Sexismus, Homo- und Transfeindlichkeit vorgehen
  • den Server täglich sichern
  • mehr als eine Person Zugriff auf unsere Serverinfrastruktur hat
  • versprechen mindestens 3 Monate Vorwarnzeit zu geben, falls wir beschließen die Instanz abzuschalten.

Darüber hinaus gelten die folgenden:

Regeln und Etikette

Herzlich willkommen! Wir laden Dich herzlich ein, hier mitzumachen und bitten Dich, ein paar Dinge zu beachten. Wenn du unsere Regeln nachvollziehen kannst und gut damit zurechtkommst, ist das großartig. Wenn Du etwas davon nicht verstehst, dann recherchiere selbst oder frage uns. Wenn Du die Regeln nicht verstehen willst, suchst Du Dir aber besser einen anderen Ort. Dieser Text ist nicht allumfassend – bitte versuche nicht, Regellücken zu finden und auszunutzen.

Sei du

Wir feiern unsere Vielfalt! Du brauchst Dich hier nicht zu verstellen. Sei Dir selbst treu und gib anderen den Raum, das Gleiche zu tun.

Dinge teilen

Sprich über Dinge, die Du vorhast oder fertig gestellt hast! Sprich mit anderen Leuten darüber, was sie vorhaben oder gemacht haben! Erstelle Dinge! Teile deinen Patreon, dein Crowdfunding oder deinen Shop! Poste deine Kunst! Empfehle oder booste Dinge, die du unterstützenswert findest! Bots sind willkommen, sofern sie sich an unseren Bot Leitfaden halten (s.u.).

Ein Ort zum Lernen und Wachsen

Wir nehmen uns Zeit, Regeln, Fachbegriffe oder Abkürzungen zu erklären, sind offen für Fragen und bieten unsere Hilfe an, wenn wir Kapazitäten dafür haben.

Wir fragen im Zweifelsfall nach (öffentlich oder privat), wie etwas gemeint ist, bevor wir darauf reagieren.

Wir üben konstruktive Kritik und bieten möglichst auch Lösungsvorschläge oder Alternativen an.

Wir geben einander (und uns selbst) Zeit, über Geschriebenes nachzudenken und erwarten keine sofortigen Antworten. Dies gilt insbesondere, wenn Konflikte entstehen.

Wir entschuldigen uns und ändern unser Verhalten, wenn wir Grenzen übertreten haben oder Regeln gebrochen haben.

Eine inklusive und rücksichtsvolle Umgebung schaffen

Wir gehen respekt- und rücksichtsvoll miteinander um. Wir gehen nicht davon aus, dass alle anderen dieselben Erfahrungen im Leben machen wie wir selbst.

Wir akzeptieren die Selbstdefinition aller Menschen. Dazu gehört auch, dass wir für sie die gewünschten Pronomen nutzen, sofern sie allgemein bekannt oder in deren Profil erkennbar sind.

Bitte verwende Bildbeschreibungen. Denke immer daran, dass viele Nutzer*innen darauf angewiesen sind und dass wir Hürden aus dem Weg räumen wollen, die es diesen Nutzer*innen unnötig schwer machen.

Verwende Inhaltswarnungen (Content-Warnungen; CWs) für sensible Inhalte. Was genau sensible Inhalte sind, ist schwer zu definieren und wir möchten keine Vorgaben machen. Aber wenn du vor dem Absenden eines Beitrages kurz nachdenkst, ob eine Content-Warnung sinnvoll sein könnte, tendiere eher zu "Ja" als zu "Nein". Es gibt einige geläufige Abkürzungen für Content-Warnungen, die du vielleicht übernehmen willst:

  • DEpol für politische Inhalten, die Deutschland betreffen, analog für andere Länder, zB ATpol, CHpol etc.
  • mh für Mental Health (psychische Gesundheit) Themen
  • alc für Alkohol
  • nsfw für Beiträge die Gewalt, Nacktheit, vulgäres thematisieren und meist grafisch Darstellen. Die Abkürzung steht für not safe for work, also "nicht für den Arbeitsplatz geeignet"

Menschen, die von Diskriminierungen betroffen sind, sind allerdings nicht verpflichtet, ihre Beiträge über diese Diskriminierungen mit Inhaltshinweisen zu versehen (freiwillige Kennzeichnungen sind natürlich trotzdem möglich).

Nutzt bei Bedarf bitte individuelle Filter oder schaltet einzelne Leute stumm, wenn ihr bestimmte Inhalte vorübergehend oder dauerhaft nicht sehen möchtet.

Umgang mit Benachteiligungen und Privilegien

Viele von uns sind in irgendeiner Form marginalisiert (d. h. strukturell benachteiligt) und von Diskriminierungen betroffen. Wir erfahren jedoch nicht alle dieselben Marginalisierungen. Oft haben wir gleichzeitig auch Privilegien im Vergleich zu anderen Menschen. Wir sind daher aufmerksam für unsere gesellschaftlichen Privilegien, das heißt: strukturellen Machtpositionen und dadurch ungleichen Zugang zu Ressourcen. Wir bemühen uns, bei unseren Aussagen und unserem Handeln diejenigen mitzudenken, die unsere jeweiligen Privilegien nicht teilen.

Menschen sind nicht verpflichtet, uns ihre Diskriminierungserfahrungen zu erklären. Wenn wir nicht wissen, wo wir uns zu einem Thema weiterbilden können, können wir allgemein nach Infoquellen fragen. Wer gerade Zeit und Kapazitäten hat, kann uns dann Dinge erklären oder mit Links o. ä. aushelfen. Es ist aber niemand verpflichtet, uns mit Weiterbildungsmaterial zu versorgen.

Kein Platz für Diskriminierung und Hass

Homo-, Bi- und Transfeindlichkeit und andere Formen von Queerfeindlichkeit, Rassismus, Behindertenfeindlichkeit, Sexismus und andere feindselige Einstellungen dieser Art akzeptieren wir hier nicht. Nazi oder TERF zu sein ist keine Meinung. Es ist beschissen, aggressiv und langweilig – geh damit woanders hin. Es steht Dir frei, Deine Meinung woanders zu äußern, wo niemand von uns Dich hören muss. Hier ist kein Platz für Hass. Dies wird von der Moderation streng durchgesetzt. Wir ermutigen unsere Community außerdem, Leute, die Hass verbreiten, individuell zu blocken.

Wenn wir feststellen, dass eine Instanz den Zweck hat oder massiv dazu genutzt wird, Leuten, die unserer Community Schaden zufügen, eine Heimat zu geben, werden wir darüber nachdenken, die ganze Instanz zu blocken ("deföderieren"). Das werden wir nicht leichtfertig und nur nach intensiver Abwägung tun. In der Regel sehen wir die individuelle Möglichkeit zu blocken, die alle einzelnen Anwender*innen haben, als ausreichend an.

Belästigungen werden nicht geduldet, unterdrückerisches Verhalten wird nicht toleriert. Wenn Du die Grenzen Anderer nicht anerkennst, werden wir ggf. zunächst versuchen, Dich freundlich aufzuklären. Wiederholte Verstöße gegen unseren Verhaltenskodex, unsere Regeln und Etikette werden allerdings nicht toleriert und können im Ernstfall zur Löschung des Accounts führen.

Persönliche Angriffe sind unerwünscht. Der Wunsch nach einem freundlichen Umgangston rechtfertigt jedoch kein Tone Policing, wenn marginalisierte Menschen auf Diskriminierung hinweisen oder sie kritisieren.

Halte dich ans Gesetz

Maßgeblich sind die Gesetze in Deutschland. Insbesondere Copyright-Verstöße werden nicht geduldet. Wir behalten uns vor, gesetzeswidrige Inhalte nicht zu löschen, sondern zu sichern und anzuzeigen.

Serversprachen sind Deutsch und Englisch

Wir bitten dich um Verständnis dafür, dass wir ausschließlich deutschsprachige und englischsprachige Inhalte akzeptieren können, um unserer Verantwortung gegenüber der Community gerecht zu werden. Anderssprachige Inhalte können wir schlicht nicht ausreichend verstehen, um sie im Zweifel prüfen zu können.

Moderation

Aktuell gehören dem Moderationsteam 5 (fünf) Personen an. Gib ihnen für Antworten und Aktionen bitte 24 Stunden Zeit. Dieser Server wird von Menschen in ihrer Freizeit betrieben. Hier findest du unser Moderationskonzept.

Um einen Beitrag zu melden, klick auf das Menü mit den 3 Punkten und dann auf "melden". Du kannst einen oder mehrere Beiträge auswählen. Bitte füge auch eine Notiz hinzu, um der Moderation mitzuteilen, warum du die Beiträge meldest.

Das letzte Wort hat das Moderationsteam.

Wenn du mit jemandem aus dem Moderationsteam ein Problem hast, wende dich an @spielleitung. Wenn du mit @spielleitung ein Problem hast, wende dich ans Moderationsteam @moderation. Wir verpflichten uns dazu, auch unser eigenes Verhalten kritisch zu hinterfragen und uns bei Bedarf gegenseitig zu moderieren.

Servermitteilungen

Du solltest @spielleitung folgen. Der Account ist hauptsächlich dazu da, Neuigkeiten und Ankündigungen zum Betrieb der Instanz zu melden und postet nur selten.

Auf den Schultern von Gigant*innen

pnpde.social nutzt freie Software und wir sind der Entwicklungscommunity dankbar, dass sie ihre Arbeit uns und anderen zur Verfügung stellen. Es sind zu viele, um sie hier alle zu würdigen - manche kennen wir selbst nicht. Es folgt eine Auswahl:

  • Mastodon
  • BookWyrm
  • YOURLS
  • BookStack
  • Framadate
  • FreeBeeGee
  • WBO
  • Etherpad
  • Zabbix
  • Ubuntu
  • MySQL
  • PostgreSQL

tabletop.social und Plotbunny Games

Diese Regeln basieren auf denen von tabletop.social und denen des Verlags-Discords von Plotbunny Games. Diese Vorlagen wurden mit der Erlaubnis der Verfassenden verwendet.

Game-Icons und Font-Awesome

Wir benutzen die Icons der Game-Icons.net Bibliothek, die unter einer Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported (CC BY 3.0) lizensiert sind und die Icons der Font-Awesome Bibliothek, die unter einer Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) lizensiert sind.

Bot Leitfaden

Wir möchten, dass unsere lokale Timeline für Menschen interessant ist, deshalb haben wir einige Sonderregeln für Bots formuliert.

  • Bots müssen in ihrem Profil als solche markiert sein ("Dieses Profil ist ein Bot" anhaken)
  • Im Profil des Bots muss die Person genannt sein, die ihn betreibt.
  • Bots, die öffentlich posten, dürfen dies nicht öfter als einmal pro Stunde tun. Bots die ungelistet posten, dürfen dies nicht öfter als viermal pro Stunde tun.
  • Bots dürfen keine anderen Accounts markieren, es sei denn, der andere Account hat dies initiiert.
  • Alle Regeln, die für normale User gelten, gelten auch für Bots.
  • Wir behalten uns vor, Bots besonders streng zu prüfen. Dies gilt insbesondere für Bots, die thematisch unpassend sind.
Short: Wir sind eine inklusive Mastodon-Community für alle Themen rund um Pen and Paper und Rollenspiel, oder kurz: #pnpde

Description:
Birdon.social is privately funded and operated for the benefit of the amateur and professional ornithological community and nature and wildlife lovers in general. The server is hosted in Germany.

Language

The main language used on the server is English and moderation in that language is fastest. However, no language is explicitly forbidden.

Reporting and moderation

When reporting accounts, please make sure to include at least a few posts that show rule-breaking behaviour, when applicable. If there is any additional context that might help make a decision, please also include it in the comment.
Short: A Mastodon server dedicated to bird and nature lovers.

Description:
Airwaves Social is a community of radio-related hobbyists & industry participants with sub-niches such as:

  • Flight Tracking & Decoding (ADS-B, ACARS, VDL, etc)
  • Amateur Radio
  • Scanners
  • Satellite Tracking & Decoding (CubeSats, AMsats, WX/weather, Iridium, etc)
  • FM/AM/RDS Broadcasting
  • SDR programs

and just about everything else on the airwaves.

Currently Airwaves Social is entirely funded by Airframes, but the intention is to support the broader radio community and accept all who wish to be here. Airframes is currently working on Airwaves OS, an open-source radio-focused appliance operation system for easily setting up decoders, visualizing locally, feeding, and beyond.

Have questions? DM to @kevin@airwaves.social if you can help.
Short:
The Airwaves Social mastodon server is radio hobby & industry focused on topics such as flight & ship tracking, amateur radio, satellites, and more.

Sponsored by Airframes, but an effort for all.

Description:
Super-Gay is a queer-oriented Mastodon. The goal is to provide a safe space for queer folk and allies.

Code of Conduct
Short Version
I try to handle moderation ASAP, but it may take a few hours to handle your request/report.

I am not a free speech absolutist, and there are instances available for that. I’m not interested in Nazis, TERFS, or hate speech of any sort, which I will define at my sole discretion. No homophobia, transphobia, queerphobia, racism allowed.

This instance is meant to be a friendly, welcoming space to all who are willing to reciprocate in helping to create that environment.

Long Version
The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of super-gay.co; I am here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:

  • Excessive advertising
  • Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
  • Untagged nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions
  • Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions
  • Racism or advocation of racism
  • Sexism or advocation of sexism
  • Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
  • Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:

  • Sexual depictions of children
  • Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service.

Content Warnings and Sensitive Media

The Content Warning (CW) policy is intended to make the server comfortable for the community.

Content Warnings are a feature of Mastodon that enable you to hide the body of a "toot" (post) behind a line of text. The intended use of this feature is to provide a way to discuss sensitive and/or potentially harmful topics without causing duress or harm to anyone who might stumble upon it, though content warnings may be used for a wide variety of reasons.

Images can be marked as sensitive. This is a feature which hides an image until a warning banner is clicked. Images may be marked as sensitive separately from Content Warnings, though using a Content Warning automatically marks the toot's images as sensitive.

Please note that our sensitive media rules apply to profile photos and headers as well. Since those images cannot be hidden behind sensitive media warnings, they are not allowed to contain content from enforced content warnings. We cannot enforce content warnings on users from other instances, but can help to manage content that you see when reported to instance moderators. Please be clear and accurate when labeling content warnings, to ensure that they follow both the letter and spirit of the enforcements that we have. Above all, try to be polite, and come from a place of mutual respect when discussing content warnings with others.

Enforced Content Warnings:

  • NSFW/sexual discussion and imagery must be behind descriptive CWs (nudity, sex, kink discussion, etc)
  • Sensitive imagery (please use your best judgement on what content that most other users would find sensitive, such as photos of surgeries, abuse, war, deceased individuals, etc)
  • Triggering topics (direct discussion of rape, trauma, abuse, suicide, transphobia, homophobia, etc.).
  • Drugs or drug use.

I do not allow the promotion, advertisement, or sale of NFTs on this instance. I do not allow content from this instance, including content and media uploaded by the community members, to be sold as NFTs.

Staff
This instance is administered by the site owner, @kilcannon.

Attribution
I leveraged a significant portion of tech.lgbt’s code of conduct to help frame super-gay.co’s user expectations. A big thank you for their efforts.

If you would like to expand this Mastodon instance to more users, consider helping cover the additional server costs here:
Sponsor A Queer
Short: A place for queer folk and allies to congregate.
